GS40caraka_u:14: sabhyāḥ sadguruvāksudhāsrutiparisphītaśrutīn asmi vo nālaṃ toṣayituṃ payodapayasā nāmbhonidhis tṛpyati /
GS40caraka_u:15: vyākhyābhāsarasaprakāśanam idaṃ tv asmin yadi prāpyate kvāpi kvāpi kaṇo guṇasya tadasau karṇe kṣaṇaṃ dhīyatām // 6
GS40caraka_u:17: samprati vartamānālpāyurmedhasāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na samyagarthādhigamaḥ tadanadhigamācca
GS40caraka_u:23: nanu prayojanābhidhānaṃ śāstrapravṛttyarthamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktaṃ yato na prayojanābhidhānamātreṇa
GS40caraka_u:26: atha manyase āptaprayojanābhidhānametadato'tra yathārthatvaṃ nanu bho kathamayaṃ
GS40caraka_u:27: prayojanābhidhāyī āptaḥ tadabhihitaśāstrasya yathārthatvāditi cet hanta na yāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:28: prayojanavattāvadhāraṇaṃ na tāvacchāstrapravṛttiḥ na yāvacchāstrapravṛttir na tāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:29: yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ na yāvacchāstrasya yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ na tāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:31: iti cakrakamāpadyate atha manyase mā bhavatu prayojanavattāvadhāraṇam artharūpaprayojanavattāsaṃdeha
GS40caraka_u:32: eva pravartako bhaviṣyati kṛṣyādāv api hi pravṛttir arthasaṃdehādeva na hi tatra
GS40caraka_u:36: naivaṃ nahi sāmānyena prayojanasaṃdehaḥ prayojanaviśeṣārthinaṃ tathā pravartayati
GS40caraka_u:38: viśeṣaviṣayasmaraṇamantarā bhavati ato ye tāvad anavadhṛtāgniveśaprāmāṇyās teṣāṃ
GS40caraka_u:39: dhātusāmyasādhanamidaṃ śāstraṃ na vetyevam ākāraviśeṣasaṃdehotpādanārthaṃ prayojanaviśeṣābhidhānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:42: prayojanābhidhāyivākye tu svalpaprayatnabodhye prayojanasāmānyasaṃdehādeva pravṛttirupapannā na punaranekasaṃvatsarakleśabodhye śāstre // 13
GS40caraka_u:43: tadevaṃ yaducyate prayojanābhidhāyivākyapravṛttāv api prayojanamabhidhātavyaṃ tathā cānavasthā iti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 14
GS40caraka_u:47: granthādau maṅgalasevānirastāntarāyāṇāṃ granthakartṛśrotḥṇām avighneneṣṭalābho bhavatīti yuktaṃ maṅgalopādānam // 16
GS40caraka_u:48: athaśabdasya maṅgalatve smṛtir oṃkāraś cāthaśabdaśca dvāv etau brahmaṇaḥ purā // 17
GS40caraka_u:49: kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tena māṅgalikāv ubhau iti // 18
GS40caraka_u:51: yathā atha śabdānuśāsanam athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ vai ityādau // 20
GS40caraka_u:53: eva anyathā śiṣṭācāralaṅghanena śiṣṭatvameva na syād vyākhyānāntarāyabhayaśca tathā
GS40caraka_u:55: yathā ca gurvājñālābhānantaram etat tantrakaraṇaṃ tathā atha maitrīparaḥ puṇyam ityādau sphuṭameva // 22
GS40caraka_u:56: granthakaraṇe ca gurvanumatipratipādanena granthasyopādeyatā pradarśitā bhavati // 23
GS40caraka_u:57: yat punaḥ śiṣyapraśnānantaryārthatvam athaśabdasya varṇyate tanna māṃ dhinoti nahi
GS40caraka_u:58: śiṣyān puro vyavasthāpya śāstraṃ kriyate śrotṛbuddhisthīkāre tu śāstrakaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:60: ataḥśabdo 'dhikāraprāgavadhyupadarśakaḥ ata ūrdhvaṃ yad upadekṣyāmo dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:61: taditi yadi vā hetau yena brahmādipraṇītāyurvedatantrāṇām uktena nyāyenotsambandhatvam
GS40caraka_u:62: iva ato hetor dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti yojanīyam // 25
GS40caraka_u:63: dīrghaṃjīvitīyam ityatra dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn astīti matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor luk ca iti chapratyayaḥ // 26
GS40caraka_u:64: yadi vā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto grantho 'dhyāyarūpastantrarūpo vā ityasyāṃ vivakṣāyām adhikṛtya kṛte granthe ityadhikārāt śiśukrandayamasabha ityādinā chaḥ // 27
GS40caraka_u:66: atra ca satyapi śabdāntare dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdenaiva saṃjñā kṛtā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdasyaiva pravacanādau niveśāt praśastatvācca // 29
GS40caraka_u:67: dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn asti iti dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto vā ityanayā vyutpattyā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaśabdas tantre 'dhyāye ca pravartanīyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:68: tena dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma ityanena tantraṃ prati vyākhyānapratijñā labdhā
GS40caraka_u:69: bhavati punar dīrghaṃjīvitīyam iti padam āvartyādhyāyapadasamabhivyāhṛtam adhyāyavyākhyānapratijñāṃ lambhayati // 31
GS40caraka_u:70: dṛṣṭaṃ cāvṛtya padasya yojanaṃ yathā apāmārgataṇḍulīye gaurave śirasaḥ śūle pīnase ityādau śirasa iti padaṃ gaurave ityanena yujyate āvṛtya śūle ityanena ca // 32
GS40caraka_u:71: ataśca yaducyate akṛtatantrapratijñasyādhyāyapratijñā ūnakāyamāneti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 33
GS40caraka_u:72: yadi vā adhyāyapratijñaivāstu tayaiva tantrapratijñāpyarthalabdhaiva na hy adhyāyas
GS40caraka_u:73: tantravyatiriktaḥ tenāvayavavyākhyāne tantrasyāpyavayavino vyākhyā bhavatyeva yathā
GS40caraka_u:75: avayavāntaravyākhyānapratijñā tu na labhyate tāṃ tu pratyadhyāyameva kariṣyati // 35
GS40caraka_u:76: adhyāyamiti adhipūrvādiṅaḥ iṅaśca iti karmaṇi ghañā sādhyam // 36
GS40caraka_u:78: na cānayā vyutpattyā prakaraṇacatuṣkasthānādiṣvatiprasaṅgaḥ yato yogarūḍheyam adhyāyasaṃjñādhyāyasya
GS40caraka_u:79: prakaraṇasamūhaviśeṣa eva dīrghaṃjīvitīyādilakṣaṇe paṅkajaśabdavadvartate na yogamātreṇa vartate // 38
GS40caraka_u:80: vakṣyati hi adhikṛtyeyamadhyāyanāmasaṃjñā pratiṣṭhitā iti nāmasaṃjñā yogarūḍhasaṃjñetyarthaḥ // 39
GS40caraka_u:86: cakṣiṅo hi prayoge'nicchato 'pi vyākhyātuḥ kriyāphalasambandhasya durnivāratvena svaritañita ityādinātmanepadaṃ syāditi // 45
GS40caraka_u:88: āṅayaṃ kriyāyoge ye tu maryādāyām abhividhau vā āṅprayogaṃ manyante teṣām abhiprāyaṃ na vidmaḥ // 47
GS40caraka_u:89: yato maryādāyāmabhividhau cāṅaḥ prātipadikena yogaḥ syāt yathā āsamudrakṣitīśānām āpāṭalīputrād vṛṣṭo deva ityādau ihāpi ca tathā // 48
GS40caraka_u:90: kriyāyogavirahe upasargāḥ kriyāyoge iti niyamād āṅa upasargatvaṃ na syāt tataścānupasargeṇāṅā vyavadhānād ver upasargasya prayogo na syāt //
GS40caraka_u:91: yenāvyavahitaḥ sajātīyavyavahito vā dhātor upasargo bhavati // 50
GS40caraka_u:92: vyāṅor ubhayor apyanupasargatve tatsambandhocitabhūriprātipadikakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ syāt tasmāt kriyāyogitvam evāṅo nyāyyam // 51
GS40caraka_u:93: atha ataḥ dīrghaṃ jīvitīyam adhyāyaṃ vi ā khyāsyāma ityaṣṭapadatvam // 52]
GS40caraka_u:97: yato na tāvad bheṣajādīnām aśeṣaviśeṣapratyakṣajñeyaḥ sarvapadārthānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:98: pratyakṣāviṣayatvāt anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tu sarvapadārthāvadhāraṇaṃ duṣkarameva yata
GS40caraka_u:99: ekam eva madhu svarūpeṇa jīvayati mārayati coṣṇaṃ samaghṛtaṃ ca kaphaprakṛterhitamahitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:100: vātaprakṛteḥ anūpe sātmyamasātmyaṃ marau śīte sevyamasevyaṃ grīṣme hitam avṛddhe
GS40caraka_u:101: vṛddhe cāhitam alpaṃ guṇakaram ābādhakaram atyupayuktam āmatāṃ gatam udare upakramavirodhitvād
GS40caraka_u:102: ativibhramakaraṃ kākamācīyuktaṃ pakvanikucena ca sahopayuktaṃ maraṇāya athavā balavarṇavīryatejaupaghātāya
GS40caraka_u:103: bhavati ityevamādi tattad yuktaṃ tattacchataśaḥ karoti ata evaikasyaiva madhuno rūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:104: yadānena prakāreṇa duradhigamaṃ tadātra kaiva kathā nikhilapadārthāśeṣaviśeṣajñānasya
GS40caraka_u:105: ajānaṃśca vyācakṣāṇaḥ kathamupādeyavacana iti kṛtvā guror āptāt pratipannaṃ pratipādayiṣyāma
GS40caraka_u:106: iti darśayan tāmimāṃ śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣur gurūktānuvādarūpatāṃ svagranthasya darśayannāha
GS40caraka_u:108: atra itiśabdo vakṣyamāṇārthaparāmarśakaḥ haśabdo'vadhāraṇe yathā na ha vai saśarīrasya priyāpriyayorapahatirastīti atra na heti naivetyarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:109: atra smāha iti smaśabdaprayogena bhūtamātra eva liḍarthe laṭ sme iti laṭ na bhūtānadyatanaparokṣe ātreyopadeśasyāgniveśaṃ pratyaparokṣatvāt
GS40caraka_u:110: yathā ca bhūtamātre liḍ bhavati tathāca darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:111: bhagaṃ pūjitaṃ jñānaṃ tadvān yathoktam utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim // 5
GS40caraka_u:112: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti yadi vā bhagaśabdaḥ samastaiśvaryamāhātmyādivacanaḥ yathoktam aiśvaryasya samagrasya vīryasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:115: atrānye varṇayanti caturvidhaṃ sūtraṃ bhavati gurusūtraṃ śiṣyasūtraṃ pratisaṃskartṛsūtram ekīyasūtraṃ ceti // 9
GS40caraka_u:116: tatra gurusūtraṃ yathā naitad buddhimatā draṣṭavyam agniveśa ityādi pratisaṃskartṛsūtraṃ
GS40caraka_u:117: yathā tamuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ ityādi śiṣyasūtraṃ yathā naitāni bhagavan pañcakaṣāyaśatāni
GS40caraka_u:118: pūryante ityādi ekīyasūtraṃ yathā kumārasya śiraḥ pūrvamabhinirvartata iti kumāraśirā
GS40caraka_u:122: itiśabdena ca prakāravācinā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti parāmṛśyate tenāha smeti bhūtānadyatanaparokṣa eva bhavati pratisaṃskartāraṃ pratyātreyopadeśasya parokṣatvāt // 12
GS40caraka_u:123: anena ca nyāyena tamuvāca bhagavānātreya ityādāv api liḍvidhir upapanno bhavati // 13
GS40caraka_u:124: suśrute ca yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ iti pratisaṃskartṛsūtramiti kṛtvā ṭīkākṛtā liḍvidhir upapāditaḥ iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:125: atra brūmaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ śiṣyasyāgniveśasya vyākhyānānadhikārādidaṃ guroḥ sūtraṃ
GS40caraka_u:126: tanna nahi jātyā gurutvam asti yataḥ sa evātreyaḥ svagurum apekṣya śiṣyaḥ agniveśādīn
GS40caraka_u:127: apekṣya guruḥ evamagniveśo 'pi granthakaraṇakāle svabuddhisthīkṛtāñśiṣyān prati gururiti
GS40caraka_u:130: tatra vicāryaṃ kim idaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtraṃ pūrvavākyaikatāpannaṃ na vā yadyekavākyatāpannaṃ
GS40caraka_u:131: tadā suśrute tathā vyākhyāsyāmo yathovāca dhanvantarir iti yojanīyaṃ tathāca tathā
GS40caraka_u:132: vyākhyāsyāma iti kriyaikavākyatāpannam uvācetipadaṃ na bhinnakartṛkaṃ bhavitum arhati
GS40caraka_u:133: tathā ca kuto liḍvidhiḥ atha naikatāpannaṃ tadā gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastītivannārthasaṃgatiḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:134: kiṃca jatūkarṇādau pratisaṃskartṛśrutigandho 'pi nāsti tat kathaṃ nānāśrutaparipūrṇakaṇṭhaḥ śiṣyo jatūkarṇaḥ prāñjalir adhigamyovāca ityādau liḍvidhiḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:135: anena nyāyena carake 'pi pratisaṃskartṛsūtrapakṣe liḍvidhirnāsti tasmāccarake 'gniveśaḥ
GS40caraka_u:136: suśrute suśruta eva sūtrāṇāṃ praṇetā kvacit kiṃcidarthaṃ stotuṃ nindituṃ vākhyāyikārūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:137: purākalpaṃ darśayan kimapi sūtraṃ gurūktānuvādarūpatayā kimapyekīyamatānuvādarūpatayā
GS40caraka_u:138: likhati pratisaṃskartā tv ayaṃ granthaṃ pūrayati tadādyagranthakartṛtayaiva // 18
GS40caraka_u:139: liḍvidhistu bhūtānadyatanamātra eva chandovihito bhāṣāyāmapi varṇanīyaḥ anyathā uvāceti
GS40caraka_u:140: padaṃ jatūkarṇādau na syāt tathā ca harivaṃśe dhanyopākhyāne māmuvāca iti tathā ahamuvāca
GS40caraka_u:141: iti ca na syāt yathā sa māmuvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam // 19
GS40caraka_u:142: kimāścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaścāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho iti tathā svyambhuvacanāt so 'haṃ vedān vai samupasthitaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:144: yadapi iti ha smāha ityatra itiśabdena pūrvasūtraṃ parāmṛśyate tanna yena dīrghaṃjīvitīyādisūtramātrasya
GS40caraka_u:145: tadarthasya vā gurūktatvapratipādane sati naivottaratrābhidheyābhidhānena nikhilatantrasya
GS40caraka_u:147: bhavati tu bhāvayituṃ yathā purā vyākhyātaṃ tasmāttadeva nyāyyamiti // 23
GS40caraka_u:148: agniveśasya vyākhyāsyāma iti bahuvacanam ekasminn apy asmadaḥ prayogādbahuvacanaprayogasya sādhutvāt sādhu hi vadanti vaktāro vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ iti // 24
GS40caraka_u:149: bhagavānātreya ityatra tv ekavacananirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ bhagavānityanenaivātreyasya gurorgauravasya darśitatvāt // 25]
GS40caraka_u:153: jagrāha nikhilenādāv aśvinau tu punas tataḥ // Car_1,1.4
GS40caraka_u:159: sametāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ pārśve himavataḥ śubhe // Car_1,1.7
GS40caraka_u:161: ātreyo gautamaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ pulastyo nārado'sitaḥ // Car_1,1.8
GS40caraka_u:167: baḍiśaḥ śaralomā ca kāpyakātyāyanāv ubhau // Car_1,1.11
GS40caraka_u:169: śarkarākṣo hiraṇyākṣo lokākṣaḥ paiṅgireva ca // Car_1,1.12
GS40caraka_u:177: bahvṛṣīṇām atra kīrtanaṃ granthādau pāpakṣayahetutvena tathāyurvedasyaivaṃvidhamahāpuruṣasevitatvena sevyatvopadarśanārthaṃ ceti // 2
GS40caraka_u:178: eṣu ca madhye kecid yāyāvarāḥ kecicchālīnāḥ kecidayonijāḥ evaṃprakārāśca sarve mīlitā boddhavyāḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:179: bhikṣurityātreyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati hi tanneti bhikṣur ātreyaḥ iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:189: atha te śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ dadṛśurdhyānacakṣuṣā // Car_1,1.17
GS40caraka_u:192: dhāraṇāddharmaḥ sa cātmasamavetaḥ kāryadarśanānumeyaḥ arthaḥ suvarṇādiḥ kāmyata ita kāmo vanitāpariṣvaṅgādiḥ mokṣaḥ saṃsāravimokṣaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:195: uttamamiti pradhānaṃ tenārogyaṃ caturvarge pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ rogagṛhītasya kvacidapi puruṣārthe 'samarthatvād ityuktam // 4
GS40caraka_u:196: tasyāpahartāra iti ārogyasyāpahartāraḥ idam eva ca rogāṇām ārogyāpaharaṇaṃ yad anarthalābhaḥ
GS40caraka_u:197: na punar utpanno rogaḥ paścād ārogyam apaharati bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparābhāvātmakatvāt // 5
GS40caraka_u:198: śreyaso jīvitasya ceti śreyovajjīvitaṃ hitatvena sukhatvena cārthe daśamahāmūlīye
GS40caraka_u:199: vakṣyamāṇaṃ tasya jīvitasyāpahartāra iti yojanīyam aśreyojīvitamahitatvena duḥkhahetutayā
GS40caraka_u:201: atra sukhitajīvitopaghāto dharmādyupaghātenaiva labdhaḥ tena vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ śreyaḥśabdena
GS40caraka_u:202: sāmānye nābhyudayavācinā dharmādayo 'bhidhīyante jīvitaśabdena ca jīvitamātraṃ yato
GS40caraka_u:203: jīvitaṃ svarūpeṇaiva sarvaprāṇināṃ nirupādhyupādeyaṃ vacanaṃ hi ācakame ca brahmaṇa
GS40caraka_u:205: yattvatyantaduḥkhagṛhītasya jīvitaṃ jihāsitaṃ tatra duḥkhasyātyantajihāsitasyānyathā hātum aśakyatvāt priyamapi jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchati na svarūpeṇa
GS40caraka_u:211: dhyānaṃ samādhiviśeṣaḥ tadupalabdhisādhanatvāccakṣur iva dhyānacakṣuḥ tena sa vakṣyati śamopāyaṃ yathāvad amaraprabhuḥ iti dhyānacakṣuṣā dadṛśuriti yojanā // 14]
GS40caraka_u:212: kaḥ sahasrākṣabhavanaṃ gacchet praṣṭuṃ śacīpatim // Car_1,1.18
GS40caraka_u:218: provāca vinayāddhīmān ṛṣīṇāṃ vākyam uttamam // Car_1,1.21
GS40caraka_u:224: athaiteṣu madhye bharadvājaḥ katham indram upāgamad ityāha ka ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:225: śacīpatim ityanena śacīsambhogavyāsaktam apyaham upāsituṃ kṣama iti bharadvājo darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:229: yathā subhikṣam ityāgataḥ yasmāt subhikṣaṃ tasmādāgata ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:230: niyojita iti caurādiko ṇica na hetau // 7
GS40caraka_u:231: anena prakaraṇena bharadvājasyāyurvedāgame viśeṣeṇārthitvānna preraṇamiti darśitaṃ bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:232: provāceti samyaguvāca na tu praśabdaḥ prapañcārthaḥ padairalpair ityuktatvāt // 9
GS40caraka_u:233: kasmāt padair alpair uvācetyāha matiṃ buddhvā vipulām iti yasmād vipulamatiṃ bharadvājaṃ
GS40caraka_u:234: pratipannavān tasmāt padair alpair uvāceti bhāvaḥ matiś ca bahuviṣayatvenopacārād
GS40caraka_u:237: atra cendreṇa divyadṛśā bharadvājābhiprāyam agrata eva buddhvāyurveda upadiṣṭaḥ tena
GS40caraka_u:238: bharadvājasyendrapṛcchādīha na darśitaṃ kiṃvā bhūtam apīndrapṛcchādi granthavistarabhayād
GS40caraka_u:241: trisūtraṃ śāśvataṃ puṇyaṃ bubudhe yaṃ pitāmahaḥ // Car_1,1.24
GS40caraka_u:244: hetuliṅgauṣadhajñānamiti hetvādīni jñāyante 'neneti hetuliṅgauṣadhajñānaṃ yāvac cāyurvedavācyaṃ tāvaddhetvādyantarbhūtam ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:245: hetugrahaṇena saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭavyādhihetugrahaṇaṃ liṅgagrahaṇena ca vyādher ārogyasya
GS40caraka_u:246: ca kṛtsnaṃ liṅgamucyate tena vyādhyārogye 'pi liṅgaśabdavācye yatastābhyāmapi hi
GS40caraka_u:247: talliṅgaṃ liṅgyata eva vakṣyati hi viṣamārambhamūlānāṃ jvara eko hi lakṣaṇam // 3
GS40caraka_u:248: viṣamārambhamūlādyair jvara eko nigadyate ityādi auṣadhagrahaṇena ca sarvapathyāvarodhaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:251: kimanyo'yaṃ hetuliṅgauṣadhajñānarūpa āyurvedo brahmabuddhādāyurvedād utānanya ityāha trisūtram ityādi // 7
GS40caraka_u:252: pitāmaho'pi yaṃ trisūtraṃ bubudhe tamindraḥ provāca // 8
GS40caraka_u:253: trīṇi hetvādīni sūtryante yasmin yena vā tantrisūtram // 9
GS40caraka_u:255: etena taṃ yathā brahmā trisūtraṃ bubudhe tathaiva hetuliṅgauṣadhajñānam indraḥ provācetyaviplutamāgamaṃ darśayati // 11
GS40caraka_u:260: yathāvadacirāt sarvaṃ bubudhe tanmanā muniḥ // Car_1,1.25
GS40caraka_u:264: athoddiṣṭam āyurvedaṃ kathaṃ gṛhītavān bharadvāja ityāha so 'nantetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:265: avidyamānāv antapārau yasyāsāv anantapāraḥ atra pāraśabdena gobalīvardanyāyenādir
GS40caraka_u:266: ucyate pāraśabdo hy ubhayor api nadīkūlayor vivakṣāvaśād vartate kiṃvā ananto mokṣaḥ
GS40caraka_u:268: vakṣyati hi cikitsā tu naiṣṭhikī yā vinopadhām iti // 3
GS40caraka_u:270: trayo hetvādayaḥ skandharūpā yasya sa triskandhaḥ skandhaśca sthūlāvayavaḥ pravibhāgo vā // 5
GS40caraka_u:273: etena yasmādayaṃ mahāmatis tanmanāḥ muniśca tenānantapāramapyāyurvedaṃ hetvādiskandhatrayamālambanaṃ kṛtvā yathāvadacirādeva pratipannavān ityāśayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:275: atra ca yathā brahmā trisūtraṃ bubudhe yathā cendro hetuliṅgauṣadhajñānaṃ provāca
GS40caraka_u:276: tathaiva bharadvājo'pi triskandhaṃ taṃ bubudhe ityanenāyurvedasyāviplutāgamatvam
GS40caraka_u:280: āyuḥśabdaścāyuḥkāraṇe rasāyanajñāne boddhavyaḥ yenottarakālaṃ hi rasāyanopayogād
GS40caraka_u:281: ayaṃ bharadvājo'mitamāyuravāpsyati na ṛṣibhya āyurvedakathanāt pūrvaṃ rasāyanamācarati
GS40caraka_u:284: tacceti śrutaṃ yadā tamiti pāṭhaḥ tadā tam āyurvedam // 14
GS40caraka_u:290: sāmānyaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ ca guṇān dravyāṇi karma ca // Car_1,1.28
GS40caraka_u:292: lebhire paramaṃ śarma jīvitaṃ cāpyanitvaram // Car_1,1.29
GS40caraka_u:295: jñānārthaṃ jñānarūpaṃ vā cakṣur jñānacakṣuḥ tena jñānacakṣuṣā // 2
GS40caraka_u:296: gṛhītena tenāyurvedena kiṃ dadṛśurityāha sāmānyaṃ cetyādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:297: eṣāṃ cottaratra lakṣaṇaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ padārthānāṃ viśvarūpāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati tenaitat tatraiva vyākaraṇīyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:309: atra kecidbharadvājātreyayoraikyaṃ manyante tanna bharadvājasaṃjñayā ātreyasya kvacid
GS40caraka_u:310: api tantrapradeśe 'kīrtanāt hārīte cātreyādigurutayā bharadvāja uktaḥ śakrād aham
GS40caraka_u:311: adhītavān ityādinā mattaḥ punarasaṃkhyeyās trisūtraṃ triprayojanam // 2
GS40caraka_u:314: vāgbhaṭena tu yaduktaṃ brahmā smṛtvāyuṣo vedaṃ prajāpatim ajigrahat // 5
GS40caraka_u:315: so 'śvinau tau sahasrākṣaṃ so 'triputrādikān munīn vā ityanenātreyasyendraśiṣyatvaṃ tadāyurvedasamutthānīyarasāyanapāde ādiśabdena vakṣyamāṇendraśiṣyatāyogāt samarthanīyam // 6
GS40caraka_u:316: tatra hīndreṇa punarmaharṣīṇām āyurveda upadiṣṭa iti vaktavyam // 7
GS40caraka_u:317: maitrīparo maitrīpradhānaḥ maitrī ca sarvaprāṇiṣvātmanīva buddhiḥ // 8]
GS40caraka_u:319: tantrasya kartā prathamam agniveśo yato 'bhavat // Car_1,1.32
GS40caraka_u:320: atha bhelādayaś cakruḥ svaṃ svaṃ tantraṃ kṛtāni ca /
GS40caraka_u:323: yathāvat sūtritam iti prahṛṣṭās te 'numenire // Car_1,1.34
GS40caraka_u:325: sādhu bhūteṣvanukrośa ityuccair abruvan samam // Car_1,1.35
GS40caraka_u:326: taṃ puṇyaṃ śuśruvuḥ śabdaṃ divi devarṣayaḥ sthitāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:327: sāmarāḥ paramarṣīṇāṃ śrutvā mumudire param // Car_1,1.36
GS40caraka_u:328: aho sādhviti nirghoṣo lokāṃs trīn anvavādayat /
GS40caraka_u:330: śivo vāyur vavau sarvā bhābhir unmīlitā diśaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:331: nipetuḥ sajalāś caiva divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ // Car_1,1.38
GS40caraka_u:333: buddhiḥ siddhiḥ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kīrtiḥ kṣamādayaḥ // Car_1,1.39
GS40caraka_u:335: bhavāya bhūtasaṃghānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ bhuvi lebhire // Car_1,1.40
GS40caraka_u:336: hitāhitaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham āyus tasya hitāhitam /
GS40caraka_u:337: mānaṃ ca tacca yatroktam āyurvedaḥ sa ucyate // Car_1,1.41
GS40caraka_u:339: nityagaś cānubandhaś ca paryāyair āyur ucyate // Car_1,1.42
GS40caraka_u:347: pūrvādhyāye rogāḥ svarūpamārgabāhyakāraṇabheṣajair abhihitāḥ upayuktajñānās tatkāraṇavātādayo
GS40caraka_u:348: bahuvācyatvān noktāḥ ataḥ samprati pṛthakprakaraṇe te 'bhidhīyante vātakalākalīye
GS40caraka_u:350: kalā guṇaḥ yaduktaṃ ṣoḍaśakalam iti akalā guṇaviruddho doṣaḥ tena vātakalākalīyo
GS40caraka_u:351: vātaguṇadoṣīya ityarthaḥ yadi vā kalā sūkṣmo bhāgas tasyāpi kalā kalākalā tasyāpi
GS40caraka_u:353: vātakalākalājñānamadhikṛtya parasparamatāni jijñāsamānāḥ samupaviśya maharṣayaḥ papracchuranyo'nyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:354: kiṃguṇo vāyuḥ kimasya prakopaṇam upaśamanāni vāsya kāni kathaṃ cainam asaṃghātavantam
GS40caraka_u:355: anavasthitam anāsādya prakopaṇapraśamanāni prakopayanti praśamayanti vā kāni cāsya
GS40caraka_u:356: kupitākupitasya śarīrāśarīracarasya śarīreṣu carataḥ karmāṇi bahiḥśarīrebhyo veti // Car_1,12.3
GS40caraka_u:362: atrovāca kuśaḥ sāṃkṛtyāyanaḥ rūkṣalaghuśītadāruṇakharaviśadāḥ ṣaḍime vātaguṇā bhavanti // Car_1,12.4
GS40caraka_u:364: rūkṣādayo bhāvapradhānāḥ tena rūkṣatvādayo guṇā mantavyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:365: dāruṇatvaṃ calatvaṃ calatvāt evaṃ dīrghaṃjīvitīyoktaṃ calatvamuktaṃ bhavati yadi vā dāruṇatvaṃ śoṣaṇatvātkāṭhinyaṃ karotīti /]
GS40caraka_u:366: tacchrutvā vākyaṃ kumāraśirā bharadvāja uvāca evametadyathā bhagavānāha eta eva vātaguṇā
GS40caraka_u:367: bhavanti sa tv evaṃguṇair evaṃdravyair evamprabhāvaiśca karmabhirabhyasyamānair vāyuḥ
GS40caraka_u:368: prakopamāpadyate samānaguṇābhyāso hi dhātūnāṃ vṛddhikāraṇamiti // Car_1,12.5
GS40caraka_u:371: evamprabhāvairiti prabhāvād raukṣyādikārakair dhāvanajāgaraṇādibhiḥ prabhāvābhidhānaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ nirguṇatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:373: tacchrutvā vākyaṃ kāṅkāyano vāhlīkabhiṣag uvāca evametadyathā bhagavānāha etānyeva
GS40caraka_u:374: vātaprakopaṇāni bhavanti ato viparītāni vātasya praśamanāni bhavanti prakopaṇaviparyayo
GS40caraka_u:376: tacchrutvā vākyaṃ baḍiśo dhāmārgava uvāca evametadyathā bhagavānāha etānyeva vātaprakopapraśamanāni bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:377: yathā hy enam asaṃghātam anavasthitamanāsādya prakopaṇapraśamanāni prakopayanti praśamayanti
GS40caraka_u:379: śarīrāṇāṃ tathāvidheṣu śarīreṣu vāyurāśrayaṃ gatvāpyāyamānaḥ prakopamāpadyate vātapraśamanāni
GS40caraka_u:389: etenaitaduktaṃ bhavati yadyapi vāyunā vātakāraṇānāṃ vātaśamanānāṃ vā tathā sambandho
GS40caraka_u:390: nāsti tathāpi śarīrasambaddhais tair vātasya śarīracāriṇaḥ sambandho bhavati tataśca
GS40caraka_u:391: vātasya samānaguṇayogādvṛddhir viparītaguṇayogācca hrāsa upapanna eveti // 1]
GS40caraka_u:392: tacchrutvā baḍiśavacanam avitatham ṛṣigaṇair anumatamuvāca vāyorvido rājarṣiḥ evametat sarvam anapavādaṃ yathā bhagavānāha /
GS40caraka_u:393: yāni tu khalu vāyoḥ kupitākupitasya śarīrāśarīracarasya śarīreṣu carataḥ karmāṇi
GS40caraka_u:394: bahiḥśarīrebhyo vā bhavanti teṣāmavayavān pratyakṣānumānopadeśaiḥ sādhayitvā namaskṛtya
GS40caraka_u:396: pravartakaś ceṣṭānām uccāvacānāṃ niyantā praṇetā ca manasaḥ sarvendriyāṇām udyojakaḥ
GS40caraka_u:397: sarvendriyānām abhivoḍhā sarvaśarīradhātuvyūhakaraḥ saṃdhānakaraḥ śarīrasya pravartako
GS40caraka_u:398: vācaḥ prakṛtiḥ sparśaśabdayoḥ śrotrasparśanayormūlaṃ harṣotsāhayor yoniḥ samīraṇo'gneḥ
GS40caraka_u:399: doṣasaṃśoṣaṇaḥ kṣeptā bahirmalānāṃ sthūlāṇusrotasāṃ bhettā kartā garbhākṛtīnām āyuṣo'nuvṛttipratyayabhūto bhavatyakupitaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:400: kupitastu khalu śarīre śarīraṃ nānāvidhairvikārair upatapati balavarṇasukhāyuṣām
GS40caraka_u:401: upaghātāya mano vyāharṣayati sarvendriyāṇy upahanti vinihanti garbhān vikṛtimāpādayaty
GS40caraka_u:402: atikālaṃ vā dhārayati bhayaśokamohadainyātipralāpāñ janayati prāṇāṃścoparuṇaddhi /
GS40caraka_u:403: prakṛtibhūtasya khalvasya loke carataḥ karmāṇīmāni bhavanti tadyathā dharaṇīdhāraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:405: apāṃ visargaḥ pravartanaṃ srotasāṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ cābhinirvartanam udbhedanaṃ caudbhidānām
GS40caraka_u:406: ṛtūnāṃ pravibhāgaḥ vibhāgo dhātūnāṃ dhātumānasaṃsthānavyaktiḥ bījābhisaṃstāraḥ śasyābhivardhanam
GS40caraka_u:408: prakupitasya khalvasya lokeṣu carataḥ karmāṇīmāni bhavanti tadyathā śikhariśikharāvamathanam
GS40caraka_u:409: unmathanamanokahānām utpīḍanaṃ sāgarāṇām udvartanaṃ sarasāṃ pratisaraṇamāpagānām
GS40caraka_u:411: vyāpādanaṃ ca ṣaṇṇāmṛtūnāṃ śasyānāmasaṃghātaḥ bhūtānāṃ copasargaḥ bhāvānāṃ cābhāvakaraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:412: caturyugāntakarāṇāṃ meghasūryānalānilānāṃ visargaḥ sa hi bhagavān prabhavaścāvyayaśca
GS40caraka_u:413: bhūtānāṃ bhāvābhāvakaraḥ sukhāsukhayor vidhātā mṛtyuḥ yamaḥ niyantā prajāpatiḥ aditiḥ
GS40caraka_u:414: viśvakarmā viśvarūpaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvatantrāṇāṃ vidhātā bhāvānāmaṇuḥ vibhuḥ viṣṇuḥ
GS40caraka_u:417: śarīrāśarīracarasyeti vātasvarūpakathanaṃ tena śarīreṣu carata iti bahiḥ śarīrebhyo veti ca punaruktaṃ na bhavati // 1
GS40caraka_u:421: tantraṃ śarīraṃ yad uktaṃ tantrayantreṣu bhinneṣu tamo'ntyaṃ pravivikṣatām iti tadeva yantraṃ yadi vā tantrasya yantraṃ saṃdhayaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:423: ceṣṭāviśeṣaṇam uccāvacānāṃ vividhānām ityarthaḥ kiṃvā śubhāśubhānāmityarthaḥ // 7
GS40caraka_u:424: niyantā anīpsite viṣaye pravartamānasya manasaḥ praṇetā ca manasa evepsite 'rthe // 8
GS40caraka_u:425: udyojakaḥ prerakaḥ kiṃvā udyogakāraka iti pāṭhaḥ so 'pyabhinnārthaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:426: abhivoḍhevābhivoḍhā sarvendriyārthagrāhakatvena taccāsya vāyumayena sparśanendriyeṇa sarvendriyāṇāṃ vyāpakatvāt pūrvādhyāyapratipāditena nyāyena boddhavyam // 10
GS40caraka_u:428: prakṛtiḥ kāraṇaṃ śabdakāraṇatvaṃ ca vāyornityam ākāśānupraveśāt uktaṃ hi khādīnyabhidhāya teṣāmekaguṇaḥ pūrvo guṇavṛddhiḥ pare pare iti // 12
GS40caraka_u:429: tathā punaruktaṃ khādīnyabhidhāya viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇa iti // 13
GS40caraka_u:430: śravaṇamūlatvaṃ vāyoḥ karṇaśaṣkulīracanāviśeṣe vyāpriyamāṇatvāt mūlaṃ pradhānakāraṇam // 14
GS40caraka_u:437: garbhāniti vikṛtim āpādayatyatikālaṃ dhārayatītyanena ca sambadhyate // 21
GS40caraka_u:441: dhātūnāmiti pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhātavaḥ kāryadravyāṇi prastarādīni mānaṃ parimāṇaṃ saṃsthānamākṛtiḥ tayorvyaktirabhivyaktiḥ tatra kāraṇamiti yāvat
GS40caraka_u:443: avikledaḥ pākakālād arvāg aviklinnatvam upaśoṣaṇaṃ ca pākena yavādīnāmārdrāṇāmeva avikledopaśoṣaṇe śasyānāmeva // 27
GS40caraka_u:444: avaikārikavikāreṇa sarvasminneva jagati prakṛtirūpe kāraṇatvaṃ brūte // 28
GS40caraka_u:449: visarjanaṃ visargaḥ sa ca pṛthaṅnīhārādibhiḥ sambadhyate nīhāraḥ śiśirasamūhaḥ nirhrādo meghaṃ vinā garjitam aśaniḥ vajrabhedo'gniḥ // 33
GS40caraka_u:453: vāyur iha devatārūpo'bhipretaḥ tena tasya bhūtalacaturyugāntakarānilakaraṇamaviruddham evaṃ yadanyad apy anupapadyamānaṃ vāyos tadapi devatārūpatvenaiva samādheyam // 37
GS40caraka_u:454: samprati sāmānyena punaḥ kupitākupitasya vāyoḥ svarūpamucyate sa hi bhagavānityādi // 38
GS40caraka_u:459: sarvatantrāṇāṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ tantraśabdaḥ karmavacano'pyasti yaduktaṃ vastistantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāmityarthaḥ // 43]
GS40caraka_u:460: tacchrutvā vāyorvidavaco marīciruvāca yadyapyevam etat kimarthasyāsya vacane vijñāne vā sāmarthyamasti bhiṣagvidyāyāṃ bhiṣagvidyām adhikṛtyeyaṃ kathā pravṛtteti // Car_1,12.9
GS40caraka_u:461: vāyorvida uvāca bhiṣak pavanam atibalam atiparuṣam atiśīghrakāriṇam ātyayikaṃ cen
GS40caraka_u:462: nānuniśāmyet sahasā prakupitam atiprayataḥ kathamagre'bhirakṣitumabhidhāsyati prāgevainam
GS40caraka_u:463: atyayabhayāt vāyoryathārthā stutir api bhavatyārogyāya balavarṇavivṛddhaye varcasvitvāyopacayāya
GS40caraka_u:465: marīciruvāca agnireva śarīre pittāntargataḥ kupitākupitaḥ śubhāśubhāni karoti tadyathā
GS40caraka_u:466: paktimapaktiṃ darśanamadarśanaṃ mātrāmātratvam ūṣmaṇaḥ prakṛtivikṛtivarṇau śauryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:467: bhayaṃ krodhaṃ harṣaṃ mohaṃ prasādam ityevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.11
GS40caraka_u:469: pittāntargata iti vacanena śarīre jvālādiyuktavahniniṣedhena pittoṣmarūpasya vahneḥ
GS40caraka_u:470: sadbhāvaṃ darśayati na tu pittādabhedaṃ pitte nāgnimāndyasya grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇatvāt
GS40caraka_u:472: paktimapaktimiti avikṛtivikṛtibhedena pācakasyāgneḥ karma darśanādarśane netragatasyālocakasya
GS40caraka_u:473: ūṣmaṇo mātrāmātratvaṃ varṇabhedau ca tvaggatasya bhrājakasya bhayaśauryādayo hṛdayasthasya
GS40caraka_u:474: sādhakasya rañjakasya tu bahiḥsphuṭakāryādarśanād udāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:475: tacchrutvā marīcivacaḥ kāpya uvāca soma eva śarīre śleṣmāntargataḥ kupitākupitaḥ
GS40caraka_u:476: śubhāśubhāni karoti tadyathā dārḍhyaṃ śaithilyamupacayaṃ kārśyam utsāhamālasyaṃ vṛṣatāṃ
GS40caraka_u:477: klībatāṃ jñānamajñānaṃ buddhiṃ mohamevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.12
GS40caraka_u:480: tacchrutvā kāpyavaco bhagavān punarvasurātreya uvāca sarva eva bhavantaḥ samyag āhur
GS40caraka_u:481: anyatraikāntikavacanāt sarva eva khalu vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakṛtibhūtāḥ puruṣamavyāpannendriyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:482: balavarṇasukhopapannam āyuṣā mahatopapādayanti samyagevācaritā dharmārthakāmā iva
GS40caraka_u:483: niḥśreyasena mahatā puruṣamiha cāmuṣmiṃś ca loke vikṛtāstvenaṃ mahatā viparyayeṇopapādayanti
GS40caraka_u:484: kratavas traya iva vikṛtimāpannā lokamaśubhenopaghātakāla iti // Car_1,12.13
GS40caraka_u:485: tadṛṣayaḥ sarva evānumenire vacanamātreyasya bhagavato'bhinananduś ceti // Car_1,12.14
GS40caraka_u:488: guṇāḥ ṣaḍ dvividho hetur vividhaṃ karma yat punaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:489: vāyoścaturvidhaṃ karma pṛthak ca kaphapittayoḥ // Car_1,12.16
GS40caraka_u:499: tatrāpi vipākādīnāmapi rasenaiva prāyo lakṣaṇīyatvādrasaprakaraṇam ādau kṛtam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:502: yaḥ kumāraśirā nāma bharadvājaḥ sa cānaghaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:503: śrīmān vāyorvidaścaiva rājā matimatāṃ varaḥ // Car_1,26.4
GS40caraka_u:512: rasenāhāraviniścayo rasāhāraviniścayaḥ kiṃvā ayaṃ rasaviniścayaḥ tathā paraṃ cāto vipākānām ityādirāhāraviniścayaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:513: eka eva rasa ityuvāca bhadrakāpyaḥ yaṃ pañcānām indriyārthānām anyatamaṃ jihvāvaiṣayikaṃ bhāvamācakṣate kuśalāḥ sa punarudakādananya iti /
GS40caraka_u:514: dvau rasāv iti śākunteyo brāhmaṇaḥ chedanīya upaśamanīyaśceti /
GS40caraka_u:515: trayo rasā iti pūrṇākṣo maudgalyaḥ chedanīyopaśamanīyasādhāraṇā iti /
GS40caraka_u:516: catvāro rasā iti hiraṇyākṣaḥ kauśikaḥ svādurhitaśca svādur ahitaś cāsvādur hitaścāsvādur ahitaśceti /
GS40caraka_u:517: pañca rasā iti kumāraśirā bharadvājaḥ bhaumaudakāgneyavāyavyāntarikṣāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:521: aparisaṃkhyeyā rasā iti kāṅkāyano vāhlīkabhiṣak āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādaviśeṣāṇām aparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // Car_1,26.8
GS40caraka_u:525: anyatamam iti ekam anyaśabdo hy ayamekavacanaḥ yathānyo dakṣiṇena gato 'nya uttareṇa eka ityarthaḥ tam appratyayaśca svārthikaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:528: udakādananya iti rasodakayor ekatvakhyāpanārthaṃ pūrvapakṣatvād aduṣṭam // 6
GS40caraka_u:530: hi rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātram ityādivacanena guṇāvyatiriktaṃ dravyamiti bruvate // 8
GS40caraka_u:533: sādhāraṇa ityāgneyasaumyasāmānyād ubhayor api laṅghanabṛṃhaṇayoḥ kartā parasparavirodhādakartā vā // 11
GS40caraka_u:534: svāduriti abhīṣṭaḥ hita iti āyatāv anapakārī // 12
GS40caraka_u:535: āśrīyata ityāśrayo dravyaṃ guṇāḥ snigdhagurvādayaḥ karma dhātuvardhanakṣapaṇādi saṃsvādaḥ rasānām avāntarabhedaḥ eṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānām ityarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:536: tatra dravyabhedād ādhārabhedenāśritasyāpi rasasya bhedo bhavati āśrayo hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇabhedācca kāryabhedo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 14
GS40caraka_u:538: tataś ca kāryabhedādavaśyaṃ kāraṇabheda iti pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:539: saṃsvādabhedastu ekasyām api madhurajātāv ikṣukṣīraguḍādigataḥ pratyakṣameva bhedo
GS40caraka_u:540: dṛśyate sa tu saṃsvādabhedaḥ svasaṃvedya eva yaduktam ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat // 17
GS40caraka_u:542: ṣaḍeva rasā ityuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ punarvasuḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:543: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ yonirudakaṃ chedanopaśamane dve karmaṇī tayor miśrībhāvāt sādhāraṇatvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:544: svādvasvādutā bhaktiḥ hitāhitau prabhāvau pañcamahābhūtavikārās tv āśrayāḥ prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśāḥ
GS40caraka_u:545: teṣvāśrayeṣu dravyasaṃjñakeṣu guṇā gurulaghuśītoṣṇasnigdharūkṣādyāḥ kṣaraṇāt kṣāraḥ
GS40caraka_u:546: nāsau rasaḥ dravyaṃ tadanekarasasamutpannam anekarasaṃ kaṭukalavaṇabhūyiṣṭham anekendriyārthasamanvitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:547: karaṇābhinirvṛttam avyaktībhāvastu khalu rasānāṃ prakṛtau bhavatyanurase 'nurasasamanvite
GS40caraka_u:548: vā dravye aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ punas teṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvānna
GS40caraka_u:549: yuktam ekaiko 'pi hy eṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣān āśrayate viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt
GS40caraka_u:550: na ca tasmād anyatvam upapadyate parasārasaṃsṛṣṭabhūyiṣṭhatvānna caiṣām abhinirvṛtter
GS40caraka_u:551: guṇaprakṛtīnām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ bhavati tasmānna saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ karmopadiśanti buddhimantaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:552: taccaiva kāraṇamapekṣamāṇāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇapṛthaktvam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.9
GS40caraka_u:556: yoniḥ ādhārakāraṇaṃ kāryakāraṇayośca bhedāt siddha udakādrasabhedaḥ pratyakṣa eveti bhāvaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:557: kṣitivyatiriktam udakameva yathā rasayonistathā rasanārtho rasastasya ityādau vivṛtameva dīrghaṃjīvitīye // 4
GS40caraka_u:558: tayormiśrībhāvāditi karmaṇor amūrtayor miśrībhāvānupapattau tadādhārayor dravyayor miśrībhāvāditi boddhavyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:561: tena yo yamicchati sa tasya svādurasvāduritara iti puruṣāpekṣau dharmau na rasabhedakāryāv ityarthaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:562: pañcamahābhūtetyādau tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe tena āśrayā eva na rasā ityarthaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:563: kiṃbhūtā bhaumādayo bhūtavikārā āśrayā ityāha prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśā iti vaśaśabdo 'dhīnārthaḥ sa ca prakṛtyādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ yojyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:564: tatra prakṛtivaśā yathā mudgāḥ kaṣāyā madhurāśca santaḥ prakṛtyā laghavaḥ etaddhi
GS40caraka_u:565: lāghavaṃ na rasavaśaṃ tathāhi sati kaṣāyamadhuratvād gurutvaṃ syāt vikṛtivaśaṃ ca
GS40caraka_u:566: vrīher lājānāṃ laghutvaṃ tathā saktusiddhapiṇḍakānāṃ ca gurutvaṃ vicāraṇā vicāro
GS40caraka_u:567: dravyāntarasaṃyoga ityarthaḥ tena vicāraṇāvaśaṃ yathā madhusarpiṣī saṃyukte viṣaṃ
GS40caraka_u:568: tathā viṣaṃ cāgadasaṃyuktaṃ svakāryavyatiriktakāryakāri deśo dvividho bhūmir āturaśca
GS40caraka_u:569: tatra bhūmau śvetakāpotī valmīkādhirūḍhā viṣaharī tathā himavati bheṣajāni mahāguṇāni
GS40caraka_u:570: bhavanti śarīradeśe yathā sakthimāṃsād gurutaraṃ skandhakroḍaśiraspadām ityādi kālavaśaṃ
GS40caraka_u:571: tu yathā mūlakamadhikṛtyoktaṃ tadbālaṃ doṣaharaṃ vṛddhaṃ tridoṣaṃ tathā yathartupuṣpaphalam
GS40caraka_u:573: atra caikaprakaraṇoktā ye 'nuktās te cakārāt svabhāvādiṣvevāntarbhāvanīyāḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:574: yaduktaṃ caraḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ svabhāvo dhātavaḥ kriyāḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:575: liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃskāro mātrā cāsmin parīkṣyate iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:576: tatra caraśarīrāvayavadhātūnāṃ deśena grahaṇaṃ mātrā vicāre praviśati śeṣaṃ svabhāve
GS40caraka_u:577: tathā rasavimāne vakṣyamāṇaṃ cātrāpraviṣṭam āhāraviśeṣāyatanam antarbhāvanīyaṃ yathāsambhavam // 15
GS40caraka_u:578: snigdharūkṣādyā ityatrādigrahaṇenānuktā api tīkṣṇamṛdvādayo na rasāḥ kiṃtu dravyaguṇāḥ pṛthageveti darśayati // 16
GS40caraka_u:579: kṣaraṇāt adhogamanakriyāyogāt kṣāro dravyaṃ nāsau rasaḥ rasasya hi niṣkriyasya kriyānupapannetyarthaḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:580: kṣaraṇaṃ ca kṣārasya pānīyayuktasyādhogamanena vadanti hi laukikāḥ kṣāraṃ srāvayāmaḥ iti śāstraṃ ca chittvā chittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣaratvāt kṣārayatyadhaḥ iti // 18
GS40caraka_u:581: hetvantaram āha dravyaṃ tadanekarasotpannam iti anekarasebhyo muṣkakāpāmārgādibhya
GS40caraka_u:582: utpannam anekarasotpannaṃ yataś cānekarasotpannam ata evānekarasaṃ kāraṇaguṇānuvidhāyitvāt
GS40caraka_u:587: kṣāro hi sparśena gandhena cānvitaḥ tena dravyaṃ rase hi guṇe na sparśo nāpi gandha iti bhāvaḥ // 23
GS40caraka_u:588: hetvantaramāha karaṇābhinirvṛttamiti karaṇena bhasmaparisrāvaṇādinābhinirvṛttaṃ kṛtam ityarthaḥ na raso 'nena prakāreṇa kriyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:590: avyaktībhāva ityabhūtatadbhāve cvipratyayena rasānāṃ madhurādīnāṃ vyaktānām eva kvacidādhāre 'vyaktatvaṃ nānyo madhurādibhyo 'vyaktarasa ityarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:594: avyaktatvaṃ ca rasasāmānyamātropalabdhir madhurādiviśeṣaśūnyā sā ca jale bhavati
GS40caraka_u:595: yata uktaṃ jalaguṇakathane suśrute vyaktarasatā rasadoṣaḥ iti ihāpi ca avyaktarasaṃ
GS40caraka_u:596: ca iti vakṣyati loke'pi cāvyaktarasaṃ dravyamāsvādya vaktāro vadanti jalasyevāsya
GS40caraka_u:597: raso na kaścin madhurādir vyakta iti // 30
GS40caraka_u:599: yathā dūrād avijñāyamānaviśeṣavarṇe vastuni rūpasāmānyapratītir bhavati na śuklatvādiviśeṣabuddhiḥ
GS40caraka_u:602: yaduktaṃ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyānuraso madhuraḥ kaphapittahā iti // 33
GS40caraka_u:603: anurasasamanvita iti sarvānurasayukte yathā viṣe vacanaṃ hi uṣṇam anirdeśyarasam ityādi // 34
GS40caraka_u:604: kiṃvā aṇurasasamanvite iti pāṭhas tena aṇurasenaikena maricena śarkarāpānake kaṭutvam avyaktaṃ syāt // 35
GS40caraka_u:606: teṣāmiti rasānām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ na yuktam āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāmiti āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānām viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi āśrayādibhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt
GS40caraka_u:608: eṣāmāśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānāṃ viśeṣān ekaiko 'pi madhurādir āśrayate na ca tasmād āśrayādibhedād anyatvam āśritasya madhurāder bhavati // 39
GS40caraka_u:609: evaṃ manyate yadyapi śālimudgaghṛtakṣīrādayo madhurasyāśrayā bhinnāḥ tathāpi tatra madhuratvajātyākrānta eka eva raso bhavati balākākṣīrakārpāsādiṣu śuklavarṇa iva // 40
GS40caraka_u:610: tathā guṇānāṃ gurupicchilasnigdhādīnāmanyatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ vā rasādivardhanāyurjananavarṇakaratvādīnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:611: bhinnatve satyapi na madhurarasasyānyatvaṃ yata eka eva madhuras tattadguṇayukto
GS40caraka_u:613: tathā madhurasyāvāntarāsvādabhede 'pi madhuratvajātyanatikramaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇāvāntarabhede yathā kṛṣṇatvānatikramaḥ // 42
GS40caraka_u:614: nanu maivaṃ bhavatv aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogāt tu ya āsvādaviśeṣaḥ
GS40caraka_u:615: sa kāryaviśeṣakaro 'pi na hi yanmadhurāmlena kriyate tanmadhureṇa vāmlena vā śakyam
GS40caraka_u:617: saṃsṛṣṭam iti bhāve ktaḥ tena parasparasaṃsargabhūyiṣṭhatvād eṣāṃ madhurādīnām abhinirvṛtterna
GS40caraka_u:618: guṇaprakṛtīnām asaṃkhyeyatvam iti yojanā ayamarthaḥ yadyapi rasāḥ parasparasaṃsargeṇātibhūyasā
GS40caraka_u:619: yuktāḥ santo 'bhinirvṛttā dvirasādau dravye bhavanti tathāpi na teṣāṃ guṇā gurulaghvādayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:620: prakṛtayo vā madhurādīnāṃ yā yā āyuṣyatvarasābhivardhakatvādyās tā asaṃkhyeyā bhavanti
GS40caraka_u:621: kiṃtu ya eva madhurādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtayaśca uddiṣṭāsta eva miśrā bhavanti // 44
GS40caraka_u:622: kiṃvā guṇaprakṛtīnāmiti madhurādiṣaḍguṇasvarūpāṇām ityarthaḥ tena rasasya rasāntarasaṃsarge doṣāṇāmiva doṣāntarasaṃsarge rasānāṃ nāparisaṃkhyeyatvam ityarthaḥ // 45
GS40caraka_u:623: prakṛtiśabdena karma vocyate tena guṇakarmaṇām ityarthaḥ // 46
GS40caraka_u:625: yata eva heto rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ nānye guṇakarmaṇī bhavataḥ ata eva saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthakkarma śāstrāntare 'pi noktam ityāha tasmād ityādi
GS40caraka_u:626: karmaśabdeneha gauravalāghavādikārakā gurutvādayo rasaraktādijananādayaś cāpi boddhavyāḥ // 49
GS40caraka_u:627: na kevalam anyaśāstrakārai rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ karma nopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃtu vayamapi nopadekṣyāma ityāha taccaivetyādi // 50
GS40caraka_u:630: tatra lakṣyate yena tallakṣaṇam atastu madhuro rasaḥ ityādinā granthena tathā snehanaprīṇanahlādana ityādinā ca yadvācyaṃ tat sarvaṃ gṛhyate
GS40caraka_u:631: kiṃvā lakṣaṇaśabdena madhuro rasa ityādigranthavācyaṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate pṛthaktvaṃ ca rasabhedajñānārthaṃ yad vakṣyati snehanaprīṇana ityādi tad gṛhyate // 54]
GS40caraka_u:632: agre tu tāvad dravyabhedam abhipretya kiṃcid abhidhāsyāmaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:633: sarvaṃ dravyaṃ pāñcabhautikamasminnarthe taccetanāvadacenaṃ ca tasya guṇāḥ śabdādayo gurvādayaś ca dravāntāḥ karma pañcavidhamuktaṃ vamanādi
GS40caraka_u:636: raseṣu vācyeṣu dravyabhedam abhipretya pratipādanīyatayā parigṛhya rasānāṃ dravyajñānādhīnajñānatvād dravyābhidhānam agre kṛtam ityarthaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:637: kiṃciditi āyurvedopayogidravyasvarūpaṃ na sarvam aprasaṅgadoṣād iti bhāvaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:640: dravāntā iti vacanena pūrvoktān viṃśatiguṇān āha // 5
GS40caraka_u:641: atra ca paratvāparatvādīnām ihānabhidhānena cikitsāyāṃ paratvādīnām aprādhānyaṃ darśayati
GS40caraka_u:643: te pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ śabdādivat sāṃsiddhikāḥ kiṃ tarhy ādheyāḥ ata iha naisargikaguṇakathane noktāḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:653: bahulaśabdo gurvādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate kiṃvā gandhenaiva yato gandhaguṇabahulā
GS40caraka_u:654: pṛthivyeva bhavati ata eva dravyāntaralakṣaṇe 'pi vaiśeṣikaguṇo 'nta eva paṭhyate
GS40caraka_u:655: rasaguṇabahulāni ityādi tena tatrāpi rasādibhir eva bahulaśabdo yojyaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:660: prabhā varṇaprakāśinī dīptiḥ yaduktaṃ varṇamākrāmati chāyā prabhā varṇaprakāśikā ityādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:663: atrākāśabāhulyaṃ dravyasya pṛthivyādibhūtāntarālpatvena bhūrivyaktākāśatvena ca jñeyaṃ yadeva bhūriśuṣiraṃ tannābhasaṃ kiṃvā ākāśaguṇabahulatvena nābhasaṃ dravyam ityucyate // 9]
GS40caraka_u:664: anenopadeśena nānauṣadhibhūtaṃ jagati kiṃcid dravyam upalabhyate tāṃ tāṃ yuktim arthaṃ ca taṃ tam abhipretya // Car_1,26.12
GS40caraka_u:666: aneneti pratiniyatadravyaguṇopadeśena yat pārthivādi dravyaṃ yadguṇaṃ tadguṇe dehe saṃpādye tad bheṣajaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:667: tacca pārthivādi dravyaṃ na sarvathā na ca sarvasmin vyādhau bheṣajamityāha tāṃ tāṃ yuktim ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:668: yuktim iti upāyam arthamiti prayojanam abhipretyeti adhikṛtya tena kenacidupāyena kvacit prayojane kiṃcid dravyamauṣadhaṃ bhavati na sarvatra
GS40caraka_u:669: tena yaducyate vairodhikānāṃ sarvadāpathyatvena nānauṣadhaṃ dravyam iti vaco virodhi
GS40caraka_u:670: tanna bhavati vairodhikāni hi saṃyogasaṃskāradeśakālādyapekṣāṇi bhavanti vairodhikasaṃyogādyabhāve
GS40caraka_u:672: yānyapi sarvadāpi svabhāvādeva viṣamandakādīnyapathyāni tānyapy upāyayuktāni kvacit pathyāni bhavanti yathā udare viṣasya tilaṃ dadyāt ityādi
GS40caraka_u:673: yattu tṛṇapāṃśuprabhṛtīni nopayujyante ato na tāni bheṣajānītyucyate tanna teṣāmapi bheṣajasvedādyupāyatvena bheṣajatvāt // 6]
GS40caraka_u:674: na tu kevalaṃ guṇaprabhāvādeva dravyāṇi kārmukāṇi bhavanti dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvād
GS40caraka_u:675: guṇaprabhāvād dravyaguṇaprabhāvāc ca tasmiṃstasmin kāle tattadadhikaraṇam āsādya
GS40caraka_u:676: tāṃ tāṃ ca yuktimarthaṃ ca taṃ tamabhipretya yat kurvanti tat karma yena kurvanti
GS40caraka_u:677: tadvīryaṃ yatra kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ yadā kurvanti sa kālaḥ yathā kurvanti sa
GS40caraka_u:678: upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti tat phalam // Car_1,26.13
GS40caraka_u:680: pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ gurukharādiguṇayogād bheṣajatvam uktaṃ tena guṇaprabhāvādeva bheṣajaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha na tu kevalam ityādi
GS40caraka_u:681: dravyaprabhāvād yathā dantyā virecakatvaṃ tathā maṇīnāṃ viṣādihantṛtvam ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:682: guṇaprabhāvādyathā jvare tiktako rasaḥ śīte 'gnir ityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:683: dravyaguṇaprabhāvād yathā kṛṣṇājinasyoparīti atrāpi kṛṣṇatvaṃ guṇo'jinaṃ ca dravyamabhipretaṃ
GS40caraka_u:684: yathā vā maṇḍalair jātarūpasya tasyā eva payaḥ śṛtam tatra maṇḍalaguṇayuktasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:687: tāṃ tāṃ yuktimāsādyeti tāṃ tāṃ yojanāṃ prāpya // 6
GS40caraka_u:688: yat kurvantītyādāv udāharaṇaṃ yathā śirovirecanadravyāṇi yacchirovirecanaṃ kurvanti
GS40caraka_u:689: tac chirovirecanaṃ karma yenoṣṇatvādikāraṇena śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadvīryaṃ vīryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:690: śaktiḥ sā ca dravyasya guṇasya vā yatra śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ śiraḥ
GS40caraka_u:691: nānyatrādhikaraṇe śirovirecanadravyaṃ prabhavatītyarthaḥ yadeti vasantādau śirogauravādiyukte
GS40caraka_u:692: ca kāle etenākāle śīte śirovirecanaṃ stabdhatvānna kārmukaṃ kiṃtu svakāla eva yathā
GS40caraka_u:693: yena prakāreṇa pradhamanāvapīḍanādinā tathā prasāritāṅgamuttānaṃ śayane saṃstarāstṛte // 7
GS40caraka_u:694: īṣat pralambaśirasaṃ saṃveśya cāvṛtekṣaṇam ityādinā vidhinā kurvanti sa upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti śirogauravaśūlādyuparamaṃ tat phalaṃ phalam uddeśyam
GS40caraka_u:695: karma kāryaṃ sādhanam uddeśyaṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ yathā yāganiṣpādyo dharmaḥ kāryatayā karma tajjanyastu svargādir uddeśyaḥ phalam evaṃ vamanādiṣvapi karmādhikaraṇādyunneyam // 9]
GS40caraka_u:696: bhedaś caiṣāṃ triṣaṣṭividhavikalpo dravyadeśakālaprabhāvād bhavati tam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.14
GS40caraka_u:698: samprati dravyam abhidhāya vikṛtānāṃ rasānām eva bhedam āha bhedaś caiṣām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:699: prabhāvaśabdo dravyadeśakālaiḥ pratyekaṃ yujyate tatra dravyaprabhāvād yathā somaguṇātirekān
GS40caraka_u:700: madhuraḥ ityādi deśaprabhāvād yathā himavati drākṣādāḍimādīni madhurāṇi bhavantyanyatrāmlānītyādi
GS40caraka_u:701: kālaprabhāvādyathā bālāmraṃ sakaṣāyaṃ taruṇamamlaṃ pakvaṃ madhuraṃ tathā hemante
GS40caraka_u:703: agnisaṃyogādayo ye 'nye rasahetavas te 'pi kāle dravye vāntarbhāvanīyāḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:705: yānti pañcadaśaitāni dravyāṇi dvirasāni tu // Car_1,26.15
GS40caraka_u:708: tatra svādoramlādiyogāt pañca śeṣair iti āditvenopayuktād anyaiḥ tenāmlasya lavaṇādiyogāc
GS40caraka_u:709: catvāri evaṃ lavaṇasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi kaṭukasya tiktakaṣāyayogād dve tiktasya
GS40caraka_u:712: madhurasya tathāmlasya lavaṇasya kaṭos tathā // Car_1,26.16
GS40caraka_u:716: madhurasyāmlādirasacatuṣṭayena pṛthag ityekaikaśo yuktasya śeṣairlavaṇādibhir yogo
GS40caraka_u:717: bhavati tatra madhurasyāmlayuktasya śeṣalavaṇādiyogāc catvāri tathā madhurasya lavaṇayuktasya
GS40caraka_u:718: kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭuyuktasya tiktādiyogād dve tathā tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād
GS40caraka_u:720: evamamlasyādisthitasya lavaṇayuktasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭukayuktasya śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve evaṃ tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād ekam evam amlasya ṣaṭ // 3
GS40caraka_u:721: anenaiva nyāyena lavaṇasya trīṇi kaṭoś caikameva evaṃ militvā trirasāni viṃśatiḥ // 4]
GS40caraka_u:722: vakṣyante tu catuṣkeṇa dravyāṇi daśa pañca ca // Car_1,26.17
GS40caraka_u:726: yuktau śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ yātaḥ svādūṣaṇau tathā // Car_1,26.19
GS40caraka_u:728: yātaḥ śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ śeṣairamlakaṭū tathā // Car_1,26.20
GS40caraka_u:731: catūrase svādvamlāv ādisthitau lavaṇādibhir ekaikaśyena yuktau śeṣaiḥ kaṭvādibhir yogāt ṣaḍ bhavanti // 1
GS40caraka_u:732: svādulavaṇau sahitau ādisthitau kaṭvādibhiriti kaṭutiktābhyāṃ pṛthagyuktau śeṣair iti tiktakaṣāyābhyāṃ teneha bahuvacanaṃ jātau boddhavyam evaṃ trīṇi // 2
GS40caraka_u:735: amlalavaṇau saṃyuktau kaṭunā sahitau śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve tathāmlalavaṇau tiktayuktau śeṣayogād ekam // 5
GS40caraka_u:740: ṣaṭ caivaikarasāni syur ekaṃ ṣaḍrasameva tu /
GS40caraka_u:743: atra ca rasānāṃ guṇatvenaikasmin dravye samavāyo yogaśabdenocyate // 2]
GS40caraka_u:746: rasāstaratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi // Car_1,26.23
GS40caraka_u:748: rasasaṃsargasya prakārāntareṇāsaṃkhyeyatām āha triṣaṣṭiḥ syād ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:750: atra ca triṣaṣṭyātmakarase rasānurasakalpanā nāsti kevale madhurādau tadabhāvāt tena yathāsambhavaṃ saptapañcāśatsaṃyogaviṣayaṃ rasānurasakalpanaṃ jñeyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:752: prakārāntareṇāpy asaṃkhyeyatām āha rasās taratamābhyām ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:754: kiṃvā rasānurasatvenaiva yāsaṃkhyeyatā tatraivāyaṃ hetuḥ rasās taratamābhyāmityādiḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:758: evamasaṃkhyeyatve'pi triṣaṣṭividhaiva kalpanā cikitsāvyavahārārtham ihācāryaiḥ kalpitetyāha saṃyogā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:759: tatra yogyatvād iti tatra svasthāturahitacikitsāprayoge 'natisaṃkṣepavistararūpatayā hitatvād ityarthaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:760: kvacideko rasaḥ kalpyaḥ saṃyuktāś ca rasāḥ kvacit /
GS40caraka_u:763: rasān ekaikaśo vāpi kalpayanti gadān prati // Car_1,26.26
GS40caraka_u:767: etadeva saṃyuktāsaṃyuktarasakalpanaṃ bhinnarasadravyamelakād vānekarasaikadravyaprayogād ekarasadravyaprayogādvā bhavatīti darśayannāha dravyāṇītyādi
GS40caraka_u:768: dvirasādīni utpattisiddhadvirasatrirasādīni dvirasaṃ yathā kaṣāyamadhuro mudgaḥ trirasaṃ yathā madhurāmlakaṣāyaṃ ca viṣṭambhi guru śītalam //
GS40caraka_u:769: pittaśleṣmaharaṃ bhavyam ityādi catūrasas tilaḥ yad uktaṃ snigdhoṣṇamadhuras tiktaḥ
GS40caraka_u:770: kaṣāyaḥ kaṭukas tilaḥ pañcarasaṃ tv āmalakaṃ harītakī ca śivā pañcarasā ityādivacanāt
GS40caraka_u:771: vyaktaṣaḍrasaṃ tu dravyam ihānuktaṃ viṣaṃ tv avyaktaṣaḍrasasaṃyuktaṃ hārīte tv eṇamāṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:774: tathā saṃyuktāṃśca rasāniti ekaikarasādidravyamelakāt saṃyuktān rasān ekaikaśaḥ kalpayanti prayojayanti // 7
GS40caraka_u:775: gadān pratīti prādhānyena tena svasthavṛtte 'pi boddhavyaṃ kiṃvā dvirasādibhedo gada
GS40caraka_u:776: eva svasthe tu sarvarasaprayoga eva yaduktaṃ samasarvarasaṃ sātmyaṃ samadhātoḥ praśasyate iti // 8
GS40caraka_u:777: evaṃ ca vyākhyāne sati kvacideko rasa ityādinā samamasya na paunaruktyam // 9
GS40caraka_u:778: kiṃvā kvacid eko rasaḥ ityādinā svamatam uktam atraivārthe dravyāṇi dvirasādīni ityādinācāryāntarasammatiṃ
GS40caraka_u:779: darśayati ata evānyācāryāntarābhiprāyeṇa kalpayantītyuktaṃ tena na paunaruktyam // 10]
GS40caraka_u:781: na sa muhyed vikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣu // Car_1,26.27
GS40caraka_u:784: atra rasavikalpajñānādeva vyādhihetudravyajñānaṃ kṛtsnamavaruddhaṃ rasajñānenaiva prāyaḥ sakaladravyaguṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:785: doṣavikalpajñānācca liṅgajñānaṃ yāvaddhi liṅgaṃ tat sarvaṃ doṣavikalpasambaddham // 3
GS40caraka_u:786: rasadoṣavikalpajñānāt tu bheṣajajñānaṃ yato rasataḥ svarūpajñānaṃ bheṣajadravyasya doṣataśca bheṣajaprayogaviṣayavijñānam // 4
GS40caraka_u:787: kiṃvā rasavikalpāc ca tathā doṣavikalpāc ca hetvādijñānaṃ pṛthageva vaktavyaṃ rasabhedāddhi tatkāryaṃ liṅgamapi jñāyate hetubheṣajavijñānaṃ tu // 5
GS40caraka_u:788: rasabhedavijñānādeva vaktavyaṃ yato rasabhedavad dravyameva vikārāṇāṃ heturbheṣajaṃ
GS40caraka_u:789: ca bhavatīti evaṃ doṣabhedaṃ jñātvā ca tasya samānaṃ hetuṃ pratyeti doṣavirodhi ca
GS40caraka_u:791: tad yuktam uktaṃ na sa muhyedvikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣviti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:792: vyaktaḥ śuṣkasya cādau ca raso dravyasya lakṣyate /
GS40caraka_u:793: viparyayeṇānuraso raso nāsti hi saptamaḥ // Car_1,26.28
GS40caraka_u:796: śuṣkasya ceti cakārād ārdrasya ca ādau ceti cakārādante ca tena śuṣkasya vārdrasya
GS40caraka_u:797: vā prathamajihvāsambandhe vāsvādānte vā yo vyaktatvena madhuro 'yam amlo 'yam ityādinā
GS40caraka_u:798: vikalpena gṛhyate sa vyaktaḥ yas tūktāvasthācatuṣṭaye 'pi vyakto nopalabhyate kiṃ
GS40caraka_u:799: tarhy avyapadeśyatayā chāyāmātreṇa kāryadarśanena vā mīyate so 'nurasa iti vākyārthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:800: yataśca madhurādaya eva vyaktatvāvyaktatvābhyāṃ rasānurasarūpāḥ ato'vyakto nāma saptamo raso nāsti // 3
GS40caraka_u:801: ayaṃ cārthaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣiddho 'pyanuguṇaspaṣṭahetuprāptyā punar niṣidhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:802: anye tv āhuḥ śuṣkasya cetyanena yasya dravyasya śuṣkasya cārdrasya copayogaḥ tatra
GS40caraka_u:803: śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ yo 'vyaktaḥ sa rasa ucyate yastvārdrāvasthāyāṃ vyaktaḥ san śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:805: yathā pippalyā ārdrāyā madhuro raso vyaktaḥ śuṣkāyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukaḥ tena kaṭuka
GS40caraka_u:806: eva rasaḥ pippalyāḥ madhurastvanurasaḥ yastu drākṣādīnām ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:807: ca madhura eva tatra vipratipattirapi nāsti tena tatra madhura eva rasaḥ nityārdraprayojyānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:808: tu kāñjikatakrādīnāmādau vyakto ya upalabhyate rasaḥ anu copalabhyate yaḥ so 'nuraso
GS40caraka_u:809: yuktas tiktatvādiḥ tathā ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāviparīto yaḥ pippalyā iva madhuraḥ so 'nurasa iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:810: kiṃtv ārdrāpi pippalī madhurarasaiveti paśyāmaḥ yato vakṣyati śleṣmalā madhurā cārdrā
GS40caraka_u:811: gurvī snigdhā ca pippalī iti madhurasya tatrānurasatve gurutvaśleṣmakartṛtvāny anupapannāni
GS40caraka_u:812: tena ārdrā pippalī vyaktamadhurarasaiva śuṣkā tu madhurānuraseti yuktam // 7]
GS40caraka_u:813: parāparatve yuktiśca saṃkhyā saṃyoga eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:814: vibhāgaśca pṛthaktvaṃ ca parimāṇamathāpi ca // Car_1,26.29
GS40caraka_u:818: parāparatve yuktiśca yojanā yā tu yujyate // Car_1,26.31
GS40caraka_u:819: saṃkhyā syādgaṇitaṃ yogaḥ saha saṃyoga ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:826: cikitsā yair aviditair na yathāvat pravartate // Car_1,26.35
GS40caraka_u:828: samprati pūrvoktagurvādiguṇātiriktān paratvāparatvādīn daśa guṇān rasadharmatvenopadeṣṭavyānāha paretyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:831: tatra deśo maruḥ paraḥ anūpo 'paraḥ kālo visargaḥ paraḥ ādānamaparaḥ vayastaruṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:832: param aparam itaran mānaṃ ca śarīrasya yathā vakṣyamāṇaṃ śarīre paraṃ tato'nyadaparaṃ
GS40caraka_u:833: pākavīryarasāstu ye yasya yoginaste taṃ prati parāḥ ayaugikās tv aparāḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:835: kiṃvā paratvāparatve vaiśeṣikokte jñeye tatra deśāpekṣayā saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhinam
GS40caraka_u:836: apekṣya vidūradeśasambandhini paratvaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhini cāparatvaṃ bhavati
GS40caraka_u:837: evaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭakālāpekṣayā ca sthavire paratvaṃ yūni cāparatvaṃ bhavati // 6
GS40caraka_u:838: vayaḥprabhṛtiṣu paratvāparatvaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ kāladeśakṛtam evehopayogād upacaritam apyabhihitaṃ yato na guṇe mānādau guṇāntarasambhavaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:839: yuktiścetyādau yojanā doṣādyapekṣayā bheṣajasya samīcīnakalpanā ata evoktaṃ yā tu
GS40caraka_u:840: yujyate yā kalpanā yaugikī bhavati sā tu yuktir ucyate ayaugikī tu kalpanāpi satī
GS40caraka_u:846: saheti militānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ yogaḥ prāptirityarthaḥ sahetyanenehākiṃcitkaraṃ parasparasaṃyogaṃ nirākaroti // 13
GS40caraka_u:848: tatra dvaṃdvakarmajo yathā yudhyamānayor meṣayoḥ sarvakarmajo yathā bhāṇḍe prakṣipyamāṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ bahulamāṣakriyā yogajaḥ ekakarmajo yathā vṛkṣavāyasayoḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:852: vibhaktimeva vivṛṇoti viyoga iti saṃyogasya vigamo viyogaḥ // 19
GS40caraka_u:853: tat kiṃ saṃyogābhāva eva viyoga ityāha bhāgaśo graha iti // 20
GS40caraka_u:854: vibhāgaśo vibhaktatvena grahaṇaṃ yato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ tena vibhaktirityeṣā bhāvarūpā pratītir na saṃyogābhāvamātraṃ bhavati kiṃtarhi bhāvarūpavibhāgaguṇayuktā ityarthaḥ // 21
GS40caraka_u:855: pṛthaktvaṃ tu idaṃ dravyaṃ paṭalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭāt pṛthag ityādikā buddhiryato bhavati tat pṛthaktvaṃ bhavati // 22
GS40caraka_u:857: tatra yat sarvathāsaṃyujyamānayoriva meruhimācalayoḥ pṛthaktvam etadasaṃyoga ityanenoktam // 24
GS40caraka_u:858: tathā saṃyujyamānānāmapi pṛthaktvaṃ vijātīyānāṃ mahiṣavarāhādīnāṃ tadāha vailakṣaṇyamityādi // 25
GS40caraka_u:860: tathaikajātīyānāmapy avilakṣaṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bhavatītyāha anekateti // 27
GS40caraka_u:861: ekajātīyeṣu hi saṃyukteṣu na vailakṣaṇyaṃ nāpyasaṃyogaḥ atha cānekatā pṛthaktvarūpā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 28
GS40caraka_u:862: kiṃvā pṛthaktvaṃ guṇāntaramicchan lokavyavahārārtham asaṃyogavailakṣaṇyānekatārūpameva yathodāhṛtaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ darśayati // 29
GS40caraka_u:864: karaṇaṃ guṇāntarādhāyakatvaṃ saṃskaraṇamityarthaḥ yadvakṣyati saṃskāro hi guṇāntarādhānamucyate iti // 30
GS40caraka_u:866: abhyasanameva lokaprasiddhābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ vivṛṇoti śīlanaṃ satatakriyeti yaṃ lokāḥ śīlanasatatakriyābhyām abhidadhati so 'bhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ
GS40caraka_u:867: ayaṃ ca saṃyogasaṃskāraviśeṣarūpo 'pi viśeṣeṇa cikitsopayuktatvāt pṛthagucyate // 33
GS40caraka_u:868: na yathāvat pravartata iti vacanena śabdādiṣu ca gurvādiṣu ca parādīnāmaprādhānyaṃ sūcayati // 34]
GS40caraka_u:872: samprati rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogo guṇa uktaḥ tathāgre ca snigdhatvādirguṇo vācyaḥ sa ca guṇarūparase na sambhavatīti yathā rasānāṃ guṇanirdeśo boddhavyas tadāha guṇā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:873: guṇā guṇāśrayā noktā iti dīrghaṃjīvitīye samavāyī tu niśceṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ guṇaḥ ityanena // 2
GS40caraka_u:874: rasaguṇāniti rase snigdhādīn guṇān nirdiṣṭān tad rasādhāradravyaguṇān eva vidyāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:875: nanu yadi dravyaguṇā eva te tat kimiti rasaguṇatvenocyanta ityāha karturityādi karturiti tantrakartuḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:876: abhiprāyā iti tatra tatropacāreṇa tathā sāmānyaśabdādiprayogeṇa tantrakaraṇabuddhayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:877: sāmānyaśabdopacārādiprayogaś ca prakaraṇādivaśād eva sphuṭatvāt tathā prayojanavaśāc ca kriyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:878: tacca prakaraṇādi ataśca prakṛtaṃ buddhvā ityādau darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:879: iha ca dravyaguṇānāṃ raseṣu yadupacaraṇaṃ tasyāyamabhiprāyo yat madhurādinirdeśenaiva
GS40caraka_u:880: snigdhaśītādiguṇā api prāyo madhurādyavyabhicāriṇo dravye nirdiṣṭā bhavantīti na
GS40caraka_u:881: madhuratvaṃ nirdiśya snigdhatvādipratipādanaṃ punaḥ pṛthak kriyata iti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:885: abhiprāyapṛthaktve sati yathā grantho boddhavyas tadāha ataś cetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:886: tatra prakṛtaṃ buddhvā yathā kṣārāḥ kṣīraṃ phalaṃ puṣpam ityatrodbhidagaṇasya prakṛtatvāt kṣīramiti snuhyādikṣīram eva kṣīraśabdena vadet //
GS40caraka_u:887: deśāntaraṃ buddhveti yathā śirasi śodhane 'bhidhīyamāne krimivyādhau iti tacchirogatakrimivyādhāv eva bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:888: kālāntare yathā vamanakāle 'bhihitaṃ pratigrahāṃś copahārayed iti tatra pratigrahaśabdena pātramucyate na tu grahaṇaṃ pratigrahaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:889: tantrakartur abhiprāyān iti yathoktaṃ raseṣu guṇāropaṇe tad boddhavyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:892: yadyapi prakṛtādayo 'pi tantrakartur abhiprāyā eva tathāpi yatra prakṛtatvādi na sphuṭaṃ pratīyate tatra tantrakartur abhiprāyatvena boddhavyam
GS40caraka_u:894: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ saṃkhyātāśca yathā rasāḥ // Car_1,26.38
GS40caraka_u:897: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavā iti pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ santo yathoktena prakāreṇa somaguṇātirekāt ityādinā yathā ṣaṭ saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaṭsaṃkhyāparicchinnā bhavanti tathā vakṣyāmīti yojanā // 2]
GS40caraka_u:898: saumyāḥ khalvāpo'ntarikṣaprabhavāḥ prakṛtiśītā laghvyaś cāvyaktarasāśca tāstvantarikṣādbhraśyamānā
GS40caraka_u:899: bhraṣṭāśca pañcamahāguṇasamanvitā jaṅgamasthāvarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrtīr abhiprīṇayanti
GS40caraka_u:900: tāsu mūrtiṣu ṣaḍ abhimūrchanti rasāḥ // Car_1,26.39
GS40caraka_u:902: samprati rasānām ādikāraṇameva tāvad āha saumyā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:904: bhraśyamānā iti vadatā bhūmisambandhavyatirekeṇāntarīkṣeritaiḥ pṛthivyādiparamāṇvādibhiḥ sambandho rasārambhako bhavatīti darśyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:908: atra cāntarīkṣamudakaṃ rasakāraṇatve pradhānatvāduktaṃ tena kṣitistham api sthāvarajaṅgamotpattau rasakāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva // 7]
GS40caraka_u:909: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ somaguṇātirekānmadhuro rasaḥ pṛthivyagnibhūyiṣṭhatvādamlaḥ salilāgnibhūyiṣṭhatvāl
GS40caraka_u:910: lavaṇaḥ vāyvagnibhūyiṣṭhatvātkaṭukaḥ vāyvākāśātiriktatvāt tiktaḥ pavanapṛthivīvyatirekāt kaṣāya iti /
GS40caraka_u:911: evameṣāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvam upapannaṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣān mahābhūtānāṃ bhūtānāmiva sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:912: nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣāḥ ṣaḍṛtukatvācca kālasyopapanno mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣaḥ // Car_1,26.40
GS40caraka_u:914: somaguṇātirekāditi atirekaśabdena sarveṣveva raseṣu sarvabhūtasāṃnidhyam asti kvacit
GS40caraka_u:915: tu kasyacid bhūtaguṇasyātirekād rasaviśeṣe bhavatīti darśayati etacca madhuraṃ prati
GS40caraka_u:916: abguṇātiriktatvaṃ viśeṣotpattau kāraṇatvena jñeyaṃ yaccādhārakāraṇatvam apāṃ tat
GS40caraka_u:919: lavaṇastu suśrute pṛthivyagnyatirekāt paṭhitaḥ asmiṃś ca virodhe kāryavirodho nāstyeva // 3
GS40caraka_u:920: nanu uṣṇaśītābhyāmagnisalilābhyāṃ kṛtasya lavaṇasyāpy uṣṇaśītatvena bhavitavyaṃ tal
GS40caraka_u:921: lavaṇaṃ katham uṣṇaṃ bhavati naivaṃ yato bhūtānām ayaṃ svabhāvo yat kenacit prakāreṇa
GS40caraka_u:922: saṃniviṣṭāḥ kaṃcid guṇam ārabhante na sarvam // 4
GS40caraka_u:923: yathā makuṣṭhake 'dbhir madhuro rasaḥ kriyate na snehaḥ tathā saindhave vahnināpi noṣṇatvam ārabhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:924: ayaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'dṛṣṭaprabhāvakṛta eva sa ca saṃniveśaḥ kāryadarśanenonneyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:925: tena yatra kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra kalpyate yathā lavaṇe uṣṇatvād agnir viṣyanditvācca jalamanumīyate // 7
GS40caraka_u:927: etena yaducyate toyavat pṛthivyādayo'pi kimiti pṛthagrasāntaraṃ na kurvanti tathā
GS40caraka_u:928: toyavātādisaṃyogādibhyaḥ kimiti rasāntarāṇi notpadyanta iti tadapi bhūtasvabhāvāparyanuyogād eva pratyuktam // 9
GS40caraka_u:929: iha ca kāraṇatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ rasasya madhuratvādiviśeṣa eva nimittakāraṇarūpam ucyate tena nīrasānām api hi dahanādīnāṃ kāraṇatvamupapannam eva vyutpāditam // 10
GS40caraka_u:931: rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt somaguṇātirekapṛthivyagnyatirekādeḥ ṣaḍutpādakāraṇādupapannaṃ ṣaḍbhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ ṣaṭ kāryāṇi bhavantīti yuktameveti bhāvaḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:932: bhūtānāṃ yathā nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣā mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt tathā rasānām apīti // 13
GS40caraka_u:933: bhūtānāṃ yathoktānām atirekaviśeṣahetum āha ṣaḍṛtukatvād ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:934: ṣaḍṛtukatvena kālo nānāhemantādirūpatayā kaṃcidbhūtaviśeṣaṃ kvacidvardhayati sa cātmakāryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:935: rasaṃ puṣṭaṃ karoti yathā hemantakāle somaguṇātireko bhavati śiśire vāyvākāśātirekaḥ
GS40caraka_u:936: evaṃ tasyāśitīyoktarasotpādakrameṇa vasantādāv api bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ ṣaḍṛtukācceti
GS40caraka_u:937: cakāreṇāhorātrakṛto 'pi bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ tathādṛṣṭakṛtaś ca tena hemantādāv api
GS40caraka_u:939: yadyapi ca ṛtubhede'pi bhūtotkarṣaviśeṣa eva kāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tāv etāv arkavāyū ityādi
GS40caraka_u:940: tathāpi bījāṅkurakāryakāraṇabhāvavat saṃsārānāditayaiva bhūtaviśeṣartvoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vācyaḥ // 16]
GS40caraka_u:941: tatrāgnimārutātmakā rasāḥ prāyeṇordhvabhājaḥ lāghavādutplavanatvāc ca vāyorūrdhvajvalanatvācca
GS40caraka_u:942: vahneḥ salilapṛthivyātmakāstu prāyeṇādhobhājaḥ pṛthivyā gurutvān nimnagatvāc codakasya
GS40caraka_u:948: plavanatvāditi gatimattvāt yadyapi gatiradho'pi syāt tathāpi laghutvaparigatagatir iha vāyorūrdhvam eva gamanaṃ karoti yathā śālmalītulānām
GS40caraka_u:949: hetvantaram āha ūrdhvajvalanatvāc cāgneriti agner apyūrdhvagatitvād ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:951: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāmekaikasya yathādravyaṃ guṇakarmāṇyanuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.42
GS40caraka_u:953: yathādravyamiti yadyasya rasasya dravyam ādhāras tadanatikrameṇa // 1
GS40caraka_u:954: etena rasānāṃ guṇakarmaṇī rasādhāre dravye boddhavye iti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:957: tvacyaḥ keśyaḥ kaṇṭhyo balyaḥ prīṇano jīvanastarpaṇo bṛṃhaṇaḥ sthairyakaraḥ kṣīṇakṣatasaṃdhānakaro
GS40caraka_u:962: madhura ādāv ucyate praśastāyuṣyādiguṇatayā prāyaḥ prāṇipriyatayā ca // 2
GS40caraka_u:966: kṣīṇasya saṃdhānakaro dhātupoṣakatvena kiṃvā kṣīṇaścāsau kṣataśceti tena kṣīṇakṣatasya uraḥkṣataṃ saṃdadhāti // 6
GS40caraka_u:968: yaduktaṃ mūtre 'bhidhāvanti pipīlikāśca iti tathā riṣṭe vakṣyati yasmin gṛdhnanti makṣikāḥ iti anena ca madhuratvaṃ jñāyate // 8
GS40caraka_u:969: akṣyāmayenaivābhiṣyande labdhe viśeṣopādānārthaṃ punarvacanaṃ kiṃvā abhiṣyando nāsādiṣvapi jñeyaḥ // 9]
GS40caraka_u:970: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamānaḥ sthaulyaṃ mārdavam ālasyam atisvapnaṃ
GS40caraka_u:973: ityevaṃprabhṛtīn kaphajān vikārānupajanayati amlo raso bhaktaṃ rocayati agniṃ dīpayati
GS40caraka_u:974: dehaṃ bṛṃhayati ūrjayati mano bodhayati indriyāṇi dṛḍhīkaroti balaṃ vardhayati vātamanulomayati
GS40caraka_u:975: hṛdayaṃ tarpayati āsyamāsrāvayati bhuktamapakarṣayati kledayati jarayati prīṇayati
GS40caraka_u:979: bhuktam apakarṣayatīti sārayati kledayati tathā jarayati bhuktameva // 2
GS40caraka_u:980: avamūtritaṃ mūtraviṣairjantubhiḥ parisarpitaṃ ca sparśaviśeṣaiḥ kāraṇḍādibhiḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:981: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno dantān harṣayati tarṣayati saṃmīlayatyakṣiṇī
GS40caraka_u:982: saṃvejayati lomāni kaphaṃ vilāpayati pittamabhivardhayati raktaṃ dūṣayati māṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:983: vidahati kāyaṃ śithilīkaroti kṣīṇakṣatakṛśadurbalānāṃ śvayathum āpādayati api ca
GS40caraka_u:985: pācayatyāgneyasvabhāvāt paridahati kaṇṭhamuro hṛdayaṃ ca lavaṇo rasaḥ pācanaḥ kledano
GS40caraka_u:986: dīpanaścyāvanaśchedano bhedanas tīkṣṇaḥ saro vikāsy adhaḥsraṃsy avakāśakaro vātaharaḥ
GS40caraka_u:988: viṣyandayati mārgān viśodhayati sarvaśarīrāvayavān mṛdūkaroti rocayatyāhāram āhārayogī
GS40caraka_u:993: sarvarasapratyanīkabhūta iti yatra mātrātirikto lavaṇo bhavati tatra nānyo rasa upalakṣyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:997: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyartham upayujyamānaḥ pittaṃ kopayati raktaṃ vardhayati tarṣayati
GS40caraka_u:998: mūrchayati tāpayati dārayati kuṣṇāti māṃsāni pragālayati kuṣṭhāni viṣaṃ vardhayati
GS40caraka_u:999: śophān sphoṭayati dantāṃścyāvayati puṃstvamupahanti indriyāṇyuparuṇaddhi valipalitakhālityamāpādayati
GS40caraka_u:1001: kaṭuko raso vaktraṃ śodhayati agniṃ dīpayati bhuktaṃ śoṣayati ghrāṇamāsrāvayati cakṣurvirecayati
GS40caraka_u:1003: rocayatyaśanaṃ kaṇḍūrvināśayati vraṇān avasādayati krimīn hinasti māṃsaṃ vilikhati
GS40caraka_u:1004: śoṇitasaṃghātaṃ bhinatti bandhāṃśchinatti mārgān vivṛṇoti śleṣmāṇaṃ śamayati laghuruṣṇo rūkṣaśca /
GS40caraka_u:1005: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno vipākaprabhāvāt puṃstvamupahanti rasavīryaprabhāvānmohayanti
GS40caraka_u:1006: glāpayati sādayati karśayati mūrchayati namayati tamayati bhramayati kaṇṭhaṃ paridahati
GS40caraka_u:1007: śarīratāpamupajanayati balaṃ kṣiṇoti tṛṣṇāṃ janayati api ca vāyvagniguṇabāhulyād
GS40caraka_u:1009: upajanayati tikto rasaḥ svayamarociṣṇur apyarocakaghno viṣaghnaḥ krimighno mūrchādāhakaṇḍūkuṣṭhatṛṣṇāpraśamanas
GS40caraka_u:1010: tvaṅmāṃsayoḥ sthirīkaraṇo jvaraghno dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ stanyaśodhano lekhanaḥ kledamedovasāmajjalasīkāpūyasvedamūtrapurīṣapittaśleṣmopaśoṣaṇo
GS40caraka_u:1012: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno raukṣyāt kharaviṣadasvabhāvāc ca rasarudhiramāṃsamedo'sthimajjaśukrāṇy
GS40caraka_u:1013: ucchoṣayati srotasāṃ kharatvamupapādayati balam ādatte karśayati glapayati mohayati
GS40caraka_u:1014: bhramayati vadanam upaśoṣayati aparāṃśca vātavikārānupajanayati kaṣāyo rasaḥ saṃśamanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1015: saṃgrāhī saṃdhānakaraḥ pīḍano ropaṇaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ stambhanaḥ śleṣmaraktapittapraśamanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1017: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāna āsyaṃ śoṣayati hṛdayaṃ pīḍayati udaram
GS40caraka_u:1018: ādhmāpayati vācaṃ nigṛhṇāti srotāṃsy avabadhnāti śyāvatvamāpādayati puṃstvamupahanti
GS40caraka_u:1019: viṣṭabhya jarāṃ gacchati vātamūtrapurīṣaretāṃsyavagṛhṇāti karśayati glapayati tarṣayati
GS40caraka_u:1022: vipākasya prabhāvo vipākaprabhāvaḥ vipākaśca kaṭūnāṃ kaṭureva rasasya vīryasya ca prabhāvo rasavīryaprabhāvaḥ ayaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra hetuḥ
GS40caraka_u:1024: atra ca vipākaprabhāvādikathanam udāharaṇārthaṃ tena madhurādiṣu vipākādikāryam unneyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1030: ityevamete ṣaḍrasāḥ pṛthaktvenaikatvena vā mātraśaḥ samyagupayujyamānā upakārāya
GS40caraka_u:1031: bhavantyadhyātmalokasya apakārakarāḥ punarato'nyathā bhavantyupayujyamānāḥ tān vidvānupakārārthameva
GS40caraka_u:1040: śītaṃ vīryeṇa yad dravyaṃ madhuraṃ rasapākayoḥ /
GS40caraka_u:1041: tayoramlaṃ yaduṣṇaṃ ca yaddravyaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ // Car_1,26.45
GS40caraka_u:1043: samprati rasadvāreṇaiva dravyāṇāṃ vīryam āha śītamityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1044: yaddravyaṃ rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tacchītaṃ vīryeṇa jñeyaṃ tathā tayoriti rasapākayor
GS40caraka_u:1045: yadamlaṃ dravyaṃ taduṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa tathā yacca dravyaṃ tayoriti rasapākayoḥ kaṭukam
GS40caraka_u:1046: uktaṃ taccoṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa bhavati iti śeṣaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:1047: kiṃvā yaccoṣṇaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ iti pāṭhaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:1048: tatra yadrasato madhuraṃ tad vīryataḥ śītamiti vaktavye yad rasapākayor iti karoti
GS40caraka_u:1049: tan madhurarasocitapākasyaiva madhuradravyasya śītavīryatāprāptyartham evam amlakaṭukayor api vācyam // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1052: yathā payo yathā sarpir yathā vā cavyacitrakau /
GS40caraka_u:1055: teṣām iti madhurapākādīnāṃ rasopadeśeneti rasamātrakathanenaiva yato vipāko 'pi rasata eva prāyo jñāyate yad vakṣyati kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ vipākaḥ prāyaśaḥ kaṭur ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1057: vīryato'viparītānāṃ rasadvārā vīryajñānaṃ na tu rasaviruddhavīryāṇāṃ mahāpañcamūlādīnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1058: na kevalaṃ rasena kiṃ tarhi pākataśca ya upadekṣyate guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śukrahā baddhaviṇmūtro
GS40caraka_u:1059: vipāko vātalaḥ kaṭuḥ ityādinā sa ca vīryato 'viruddhānāṃ vijñeyaḥ yadi tatra vīryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1060: virodhi bhavati tadā vipāko'pi yathoktaguṇakarī na syāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:1061: kiṃvā pākataścāviparītānāṃ rasopadeśena guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śītoṣṇalakṣaṇo nirdeśyaḥ yasyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukāyā api viparītamadhurapākitvaṃ na tatra kaṭu rasatvenoṣṇatvam ityarthaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:1062: asmiṃśca pakṣe upadekṣyate iti yathā payaḥ ityādinā sambadhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:1066: samprati madhuratiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ śītatvaṃ tathā kaṭvamlalavaṇānāṃ coṣṇatvaṃ tathā kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1067: cāvṛṣyatvamityādayo rasadvāreṇa dravyāṇāṃ ye guṇā uktāstadapavādam āha teṣāmityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1068: rasopadeśena rasaguṇakathanadvāreṇa dravyāṇāṃ yaḥ śītoṣṇādiguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ sa
GS40caraka_u:1069: vīryataḥ pākataścāviparītānāṃ teṣāṃ vakṣyamāṇakṣīrādidravyāṇāmeva nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1072: upadekṣyata iti yathā paya ityādibhiḥ sambadhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:1073: etāni hi dravyaguṇakathanaprasaṅge rasāviparītavīryavipākatayaivopadeṣṭavyānīti rasānurūpaguṇatvam eṣāṃ jñātavyam ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:1074: idaṃ tūdāharaṇaikadeśamātraṃ tenāparāṇy apyevaṃjātīyāny udāhartavyānītyāha evamādīnītyādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:1076: madhuraṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ syāt kaṣāyaṃ tiktameva ca /
GS40caraka_u:1081: samprati yatra viruddhavīryatvena rasenoṣṇatvādi na nirdeśyaṃ tad āha madhuram ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1082: kiṃcit kaṣāyaṃ coṣṇaṃ tiktaṃ coṣṇam iti yojanā kaṣāyatiktalavaṇānām udāharaṇam asūtritānām api prakaraṇāt kṛtam // 2
GS40caraka_u:1084: etacca tiktasya kaṣāyasya coṣṇatāyām udāharaṇam abjānūpāmiṣaṃ tu madhurasyoṣṇavīryatve // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1085: kiṃcidamlaṃ hi saṃgrāhi kiṃcidamlaṃ bhinatti ca /
GS40caraka_u:1086: yathā kapitthaṃ saṃgrāhi bhedi cāmalakaṃ tathā // Car_1,26.50
GS40caraka_u:1088: kaṣāyaḥ stambhanaḥ śītaḥ so 'bhayāyām ato'nyathā // Car_1,26.51
GS40caraka_u:1090: dṛṣṭaṃ tulyarase'pyevaṃ dravye dravye guṇāntaram // Car_1,26.52
GS40caraka_u:1092: vīryaprasaṅgād anyam apyamlādīnāṃ viruddhaguṇam āha kiṃcid ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1093: abhayāyām ato'nyatheti abhayāyāṃ kaṣāyo raso bhedanaś coṣṇaś cetyarthaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:1096: madhyo'mlaḥ kaṭukaś cāntyaḥ snigdhānāṃ madhuraḥ paraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:1101: kecil laghūnām avaramicchanti lavaṇaṃ rasam // Car_1,26.56
GS40caraka_u:1105: raukṣyeṇa kaṣāya uttama iti rūkṣatamaḥ tikto rūkṣaḥ kaṭustu madhyo rūkṣataraḥ evam anyatrāpi // 2
GS40caraka_u:1109: amlāt kaṭur ityādau amlātkaṭurlaghuḥ tataḥ kaṭukād uttamāt tikto laghutvenottamottamaḥ uttamāt kaṭukāduttama uttamottamaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:1112: etena gaurave lāghave cāvaratvaṃ lavaṇasya svīkurvan gaurave 'vara ityanenāmlakaṭutiktebhyo
GS40caraka_u:1113: gurutvaṃ svīkaroti lavaṇasya lāghave cāvara ityanenāmlādapi laghuno 'lpaṃ lāghavaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1115: na ca vācyam amle pṛthivī kāraṇaṃ lavaṇe tu toyaṃ tataḥ pṛthivyapekṣayā toyajanyasya
GS40caraka_u:1116: lavaṇasyaiva lāghavamucitamiti yato na niveśena gauravalāghave śakyete 'vadhārayituṃ
GS40caraka_u:1118: paraṃ cāto vipākānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sampravakṣyate // Car_1,26.57
GS40caraka_u:1124: kaṭukādiśabdena ca tadādhāraṃ dravyamucyate yato na rasāḥ pacyante kiṃtu dravyam eva // 3
GS40caraka_u:1126: vipākalakṣaṇaṃ tu jaṭharāgniyogād āhārasya niṣṭhākāle yo guṇa utpadyate sa vipākaḥ vacanaṃ hi /
GS40caraka_u:1129: madhuro lavaṇāmlau ca snigdhabhāvāt trayo rasāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:1130: vātamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ prāyo mokṣe sukhā matāḥ // Car_1,26.59
GS40caraka_u:1134: samprati vakṣyamāṇavipākalakṣaṇe madhurāmlapākayor vātamūtrapurīṣān avarodhakatve tathā kaṭorvipākasya vātamūtrapurīṣavibandhakatve hetum āha madhura ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1135: atra madhurāmlalavaṇā niṣṭhāpākaṃ gatā api santaḥ snehaguṇayogād vātapurīṣāṇāṃ visargaṃ sukhena kurvantīti vākyārthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:1141: teṣāṃ guruḥ syānmadhuraḥ kaṭukāmlāv ato 'nyathā // Car_1,26.62
GS40caraka_u:1143: samprati vipākalakṣaṇaṃ hetuvyutpāditaṃ śukrahatvādiviśeṣayuktaṃ vaktum āha śukrahetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1148: samprati yathoktavipākalakṣaṇānāṃ dravyabhede kvacidalpatvaṃ kvacinmadhyatvaṃ kvacic cotkṛṣṭatvaṃ yathā bhavati tad āha vipāketyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1149: vipākalakṣaṇasyālpamadhyabhūyiṣṭhatām upalakṣayet prati prati dravyāṇāṃ guṇavaiśeṣyāddhetor ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:1150: etena dravyeṣu yad guṇavaiśeṣyaṃ madhuratvamadhurataratvamadhuratamatvādi tato hetor vipākānāmalpatvādayo viśeṣā bhavantītyuktaṃ bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:1151: atra kecidbruvate pratirasaṃ pāko bhavati yathā madhurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇmadhurādayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1152: pākā iti kecid bruvate balavatāṃ rasānāmabalavanto rasā vaśatāṃ yānti tataś cānavasthitaḥ pākaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:1153: tatraitaddvitayamapi pāke vyavasthākaraṇam anādṛtya suśrutena dvividhaḥ pāko madhuraḥ kaṭuś cāṅgīkṛtaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:1154: dvaividhyaṃ ca pañcabhūtātmake dravye gurubhūtapṛthivītoyātirekānmadhuraḥ pāko bhavati
GS40caraka_u:1155: śeṣalaghubhūtātirekāt tu kaṭukaḥ pāko bhavati yaduktaṃ dravyeṣu pacyamāneṣu yeṣv
GS40caraka_u:1160: pratirasapāke tathānavasthitapāke ca dravyaṃ rasaguṇenaiva tulyaṃ pākāvasthāyāmapi
GS40caraka_u:1161: bhavati tena na kaścidviśeṣo vipākena tatra bodhyata iti suśrutena tatpakṣadvayam
GS40caraka_u:1163: tṛtīyāmlapākanirāsastu doṣam āvahati yato vrīhikulatthādīnām amlapākatayā pittakartṛtvamupalabhyate
GS40caraka_u:1164: atha manyase vrīhyāder uṣṇavīryatvena tatra pittakartṛtvaṃ tanna madhurasya vrīhestanmate
GS40caraka_u:1167: kiṃca amlapākatvād vrīhyādeḥ pittamamlaguṇamutpadyate yadi tu tad uṣṇavīryatākṛtaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1168: syāttadā kaṭuguṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ pittaṃ syāt dṛśyate ca vrīhibhakṣaṇād amlodgārādināmlaguṇabhūyiṣṭhataiveti // 12
GS40caraka_u:1169: kiṃca pṛthivīsomaguṇātirekān madhuraḥ pāko bhavati vāyvagnyākāśātirekācca kaṭur bhavatīti
GS40caraka_u:1170: pakṣe yadā vyāmiśraguṇātirekatā bhavati tadā somāgnyātmakasyāmlasyotpādaḥ kathaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1172: athavā tantrakārayoḥ kim anayor anena vacanamātravirodhena kartavyaṃ yato yadamlapākaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1173: carako brūte tatsuśrutena vīryoṣṇam iti kṛtvā samādhīyate tena na kaścid dravyaguṇe virodhaḥ // 14
GS40caraka_u:1174: yattu suśrute'mlapākanirāsārthaṃ dūṣaṇam ucyate pittaṃ hi vidagdhamamlatāmupaiti ityādinā tadanabhyupagamādeva nirastam // 15
GS40caraka_u:1175: nanu lavaṇasya madhurapākitve pittaraktādikartṛtvamanupapannaṃ tathā tiktakaṣāyayoḥ
GS40caraka_u:1176: kaṭupākitve pittahantṛtvamanupapannaṃ naivaṃ satyapi lavaṇasya madhurapākitve tatra
GS40caraka_u:1177: lavaṇarasa uṣṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ yadasti tena tat pittaraktādikārakaṃ vipākastu tatra pittaraktaharaṇalakṣaṇe
GS40caraka_u:1178: kārye bādhitaḥ san sṛṣṭaviṇmūtra ityādinā lakṣaṇena lakṣyata eva // 16
GS40caraka_u:1179: etena yaducyate lavaṇe madhuro vipākaścedrasavīryābhyāṃ bādhitaḥ san svakāryakaro na bhavati tatkiṃ tenopadiṣṭeneti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 17
GS40caraka_u:1180: yato'styeva sṛṣṭaviṇmūtratādinā tatra lavaṇe madhuravipākitvaṃ lakṣaṇīyam // 18
GS40caraka_u:1182: anye tv etaddoṣabhayāl lavaṇo'pyamlaṃ pacyata iti vyākhyānayanti lavaṇastathetyatra tathāśabdena viprakṛṣṭasyāmlamityasya karṣaṇāditi // 20
GS40caraka_u:1183: tanna kaṭvādīnāṃ kaṭurvipāko'mlo'mlasya śeṣayor madhuraḥ iti jatūkarṇavacanāt // 21
GS40caraka_u:1184: naca vācyaṃ kasmāt traya eva vipākā bhavanti na punastiktādayo'pīti yato bhūtasvabhāva evaiṣaḥ yena madhurādayas traya eva bhavanti bhūtasvabhāvāś cāparyanuyojyāḥ // 22
GS40caraka_u:1185: nanu yaśca rasaviparītaḥ pāko yathā lavaṇasya madhuraḥ tiktakaṣāyayoś ca kaṭuḥ sa
GS40caraka_u:1186: ucyatāṃ yastu samānaguṇo madhurasya madhuro'mlasyāmlaḥ kaṭukasya vā kaṭukaḥ tatkathane
GS40caraka_u:1187: kiṃ prayojanaṃ yato rasaguṇair eva tatra vipākaguṇo'pi jñāsyate // 23
GS40caraka_u:1188: naivaṃ yena lavaṇādivad visadṛśarasāntarotpādaśaṅkānirārāsārtham api tatrānuguṇo'pi
GS40caraka_u:1189: vipāko vaktavya eva vipākajaśca rasa āhārapariṇāmānte bhavati prākṛtastu raso vipākaviruddhaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1190: pariṇāmakālaṃ varjayitvā jñeyaḥ tena pippalyāḥ kaṭukarasatvam ādau kaṇṭhasthaśleṣmakṣapaṇamukhaśodhanādikartṛtvena
GS40caraka_u:1191: saprayojanaṃ madhuravipākatvaṃ tu pariṇāmena vṛṣyatvādijñāpanena saprayojanam // 24
GS40caraka_u:1192: tathā yatra vipākasya rasāḥ samānaguṇatayānuguṇā bhavanti tatra balavat kāryaṃ bhavati viparyaye tu durbalam iti jñeyam // 25
GS40caraka_u:1193: etacca pākatrayaṃ dravyaniyataṃ tena grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇāhārāvasthāpākādbhinnam
GS40caraka_u:1194: eva tatra hy aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāmeva rasānām avasthāvaśāt trayaḥ pākā vācyāḥ annasya
GS40caraka_u:1198: śītoṣṇamiti vīryaṃ tu kriyate yena yā kriyā /
GS40caraka_u:1199: nāvīryaṃ kurute kiṃcit sarvā vīryakṛtā kriyā // Car_1,26.65
GS40caraka_u:1203: vaidyake hi rasavipākaprabhāvavyatirikte prabhūtakāryakāriṇi guṇe vīryamiti saṃjñā
GS40caraka_u:1204: tenāṣṭavidhavīryavādimate picchilaviśadādayo guṇā na rasādiviparītaṃ kāryaṃ prāyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1205: kurvanti tena teṣāṃ rasādyupadeśenaiva grahaṇaṃ mṛdvādīnāṃ tu rasādyabhibhāvakatvamasti
GS40caraka_u:1206: yathā pippalyāṃ kaṭurasakāryaṃ pittakopanamabhibhūya tadgate mṛduśītavīrye pittameva
GS40caraka_u:1207: śamayatīti tathā kaṣāye tiktānurase mahati pañcamūle tatkāryaṃ vātakopanam abhibhūyoṣṇena
GS40caraka_u:1208: vīryeṇa tadviruddhaṃ vātaśamanameva kriyate tathā madhure'pīkṣau śītavīryatvena vātavṛddhir ityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:1209: yaduktaṃ suśrute etāni khalu vīryāṇi svabalaguṇotkarṣād rasam abhibhūyātmakarma darśayanti ityādi // 4
GS40caraka_u:1210: śītoṣṇavīryavādimataṃ tv agnīṣomīyatvāj jagataḥ śītoṣṇayoreva prādhānyājjñeyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:1214: etacca matadvayam apyācāryasya paribhāṣāsiddhamanumatameva yenottaratra rasavīryavipākānāṃ sāmānyaṃ yatra lakṣyate ityādau pāribhāṣikam eva vīryaṃ nirdekṣyati // 7
GS40caraka_u:1215: pāribhāṣikavīryasaṃjñāparityāgena tu śaktiparyāyasya vīryasya lakṣaṇamāha vīryaṃ tv ityādi // 8
GS40caraka_u:1217: yeneti rasena vā vipākena vā prabhāvena vā gurvādiparādibhirvā guṇairyā kriyā tarpaṇahlādanaśamanādirūpā kriyate tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tad rasādi vīryam // 10
GS40caraka_u:1218: ata evoktaṃ suśrute yena kurvanti tadvīryam iti // 11
GS40caraka_u:1219: atraiva lokaprasiddhām upapattim āha nāvīryam ityādi // 12
GS40caraka_u:1225: rasādīnāmekadravyaniviṣṭānāṃ bhedena nārthaṃ lakṣaṇamāha raso nipāta ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1227: karmaniṣṭhayeti karmaṇo niṣṭhā niṣpattiḥ karmaniṣṭhā kriyāparisamāptiḥ rasopayoge
GS40caraka_u:1228: sati yo 'ntyāhārapariṇāmakṛtaḥ karmaviśeṣaḥ kaphaśukrābhivṛddhyādilakṣaṇaḥ tena vipāko niścīyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:1229: adhīvāsaḥ sahāvasthānaṃ yāvad adhīvāsāditi yāvaccharīranivāsāt etacca vipākātpūrvaṃ nipātāccordhvaṃ jñeyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:1230: nipātācceti śarīrasaṃyogamātrāt tena kiṃcid vīryam adhīvāsād upalabhyate yathānūpamāṃsāder
GS40caraka_u:1231: uṣṇatvaṃ kiṃcic ca nipātādeva labhyate yathā marīcādīnāṃ tīkṣṇatvādi kiṃcic ca nipātādhīvāsābhyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1233: etena rasaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva vipākastu nityaparokṣaḥ tatkāryeṇānumīyate vīryaṃ tu kiṃcidanumānena
GS40caraka_u:1234: yathā saindhavagataṃ śaityam ānūpamāṃsagataṃ vā auṣṇyaṃ kiṃcic ca vīryaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva
GS40caraka_u:1235: yathā rājikāgatam auṣṇyaṃ ghrāṇena picchilaviśadasnigdharūkṣādayaḥ cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1237: etacca vīryaṃ sahajaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca jñeyam // 7
GS40caraka_u:1238: etacca yathāsambhavaṃ gurulaghvādiṣu vīryeṣu lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:1242: viśeṣaḥ karmaṇāṃ caiva prabhāvastasya sa smṛtaḥ // Car_1,26.67
GS40caraka_u:1247: sāmānyaṃ lakṣyata ityanena rasādikāryatvena yannāvadhārayituṃ śakyate kāryaṃ tat
GS40caraka_u:1248: prabhāvakṛtam iti sūcayati ata evoktaṃprabhāvo 'cintya ucyate rasavīryavipākakāryatayācintya ityarthaḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:1254: tat prabhāvakṛtaṃ teṣāṃ prabhāvo'cintya ucyate // Car_1,26.70
GS40caraka_u:1256: kiṃcidrasena kurute karma vīryeṇa cāparam // Car_1,26.71
GS40caraka_u:1257: dravyaṃ guṇena pākena prabhāveṇa ca kiṃcana /
GS40caraka_u:1261: asyaiva durabhigamatvād udāharaṇāni bahūnyāha kaṭuka ityādinā // 1
GS40caraka_u:1264: ūrdhvānulomikamiti yugapad ubhayabhāgaharaṃ kiṃvā ūrdhvaharaṃ tathānulomaharaṃ ca // 4
GS40caraka_u:1266: etaccodāharaṇamātraṃ tena jīvanamedhyādidravyasya rasādyacintyaṃ sarvaṃ prabhāva iti jñeyam // 6
GS40caraka_u:1267: prabhāvaśceha dravyaśaktir abhipretā sā ca dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ dantītvādiyuktā
GS40caraka_u:1268: vyaktireva yataḥ śaktirhi svarūpameva bhāvānāṃ nātiriktaṃ kiṃciddharmāntaram evaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1269: pradeśāntaroktaguṇaprabhāvādiṣvapi vācyam yathoktaṃ dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvādguṇaprabhāvām ityādi // 7
GS40caraka_u:1270: na ca vācyaṃ dantyādiḥ svarūpata eva virecayati tena kimiti jalādyupahatā dantī na
GS40caraka_u:1273: naiyāyikaśaktivāde yā ca viṣasya viṣaghnatve upapattir uktā ūrdhvādhogāmitvavirodhalakṣaṇā sāntarbhāgatvāt prabhāvād eva bhavati // 9
GS40caraka_u:1281: yaḥ śīghraṃ lavaṇo jñeyaḥ sa vidāhānmukhasya ca // Car_1,26.76
GS40caraka_u:1283: vidahanmukhanāsākṣi saṃsrāvī sa kaṭuḥ smṛtaḥ // Car_1,26.77
GS40caraka_u:1284: pratihanti nipāte yo rasanaṃ svadate na ca /
GS40caraka_u:1287: badhnātīva ca yaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ kaṣāyaḥ sa vikāsyapi // Car_1,26.79
GS40caraka_u:1292: vikāsīti hṛdayavikasanaśīla uktaṃ hi suśrute hṛdayaṃ pīḍayati iti // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1293: evamuktavantaṃ bhagavantamātreyamagniveśa uvāca bhagavan śrutametadavitatham arthasampadyuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1294: bhagavato yathāvad dravyaguṇakarmādhikāre vacaḥ paraṃ tv āhāravikārāṇāṃ vairodhikānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1298: śarīradhātuvirodhaṃ kurvantīti vairodhikāḥ lakṣyate vairodhikamaneneti lakṣaṇaṃ vairodhikābhidhāyako grantha eva // 2
GS40caraka_u:1300: tam uvāca bhagavān ātreyaḥ dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtāni dravyāṇi dehadhātubhirvirodham
GS40caraka_u:1301: āpadyante parasparaguṇaviruddhāni kānicit kānicit saṃyogāt saṃskārād aparāṇi deśakālamātrādibhiś
GS40caraka_u:1304: dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtānīti dehadhātūnāṃ rasādīnāṃ vātādīnāṃ ca prakṛtisthānāṃ pratyanīkasvarūpāṇi // 1
GS40caraka_u:1305: virodhamāpadyanta iti dehadhātūnāṃ virodhamācaranti dūṣayantīti yāvat // 2
GS40caraka_u:1306: yathābhūtāni dravyāṇi dehadhātubhirvirodhamāpadyante tadāha parasparaviruddhāni kānicid ityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:1307: tatra parasparaguṇaviruddhāni yathā na matsyān payasābhyavaharet ubhayaṃ hy etad ityādinoktāni // 4
GS40caraka_u:1308: saṃyogaviruddhaṃ yathā tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣa ityādinoktaṃ yat saṃskārādiviruddhaguṇakathanaṃ vinā sāhityamātreṇa viruddham ucyate tat saṃyogaviruddham // 5
GS40caraka_u:1309: matsyapayasos tu yadyapi sahopayogo viruddhatvenoktaḥ tathāpyasau guṇaviruddhatvena kathita iti guṇavirodhakasyaivodāharaṇam /
