GS40caraka_u:1310: virodhaśca viruddhaguṇatve satyapi kvacid eva dravyaprabhāvād bhavati tena ṣaḍrasāhāropayoge madhurāmlayor viruddhaśītoṣṇavīryayor virodho nodbhāvanīyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1311: saṃskārato viruddhaṃ yathā na kapotān sarṣapatailabhṛṣṭān ityādi // 7
GS40caraka_u:1313: tatra bhūmiviruddhaṃ yathā tadeva bhasmapāṃśuparidhvastam kiṃvā yat kiṃcidagocarabhṛtaṃ taddeśaviruddhaṃ śarīraviruddhaṃ yathā uṣṇārtasya madhu maraṇāya // 9
GS40caraka_u:1318: tatra yānyāhāramadhikṛtya bhūyiṣṭham upayujyante teṣām ekadeśaṃ vairodhikam adhikṛtyopadekṣyāmaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1319: na matsyān payasā sahābhyavaharet ubhayaṃ hy etanmadhuraṃ madhuravipākaṃ mahābhiṣyandi
GS40caraka_u:1321: tanniśamyātreyavacanamanu bhadrakāpyo 'gniveśam uvāca sarvāneva matsyān payasā sahābhyavahared
GS40caraka_u:1322: anyatraikasmāc cilicimāt sa punaḥ śakalī lohitanayanaḥ sarvato lohitarājī rohitākāraḥ
GS40caraka_u:1323: prāyo bhūmau carati taṃ cet payasā sahābhyavaharenniḥsaṃśayaṃ śoṇitajānāṃ vibandhajānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:1327: śītoṣṇatvāditi payaḥ śītam uṣṇavīryāśca matsyāḥ śeṣaṃ madhuratvādi samānam // 2
GS40caraka_u:1329: sa punaḥ śakalī ityādinā nāndiniḥ iti khyāto matsya ucyate // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1330: neti bhagavānātreyaḥ sarvāneva matsyānna payasā sahābhyavaharedviśeṣatastu cilicimaṃ sa hi mahābhiṣyanditvāt sthūlalakṣaṇatarān etān vyādhīn upajanayatyāmaviṣam udīrayati ca /
GS40caraka_u:1331: grāmyānūpaudakapiśitāni ca madhutilaguḍapayomāṣamūlakabisair virūḍhadhānyairvā naikadhyamadyāt tanmūlaṃ hi bādhiryāndhyavepathujāḍyakalamūkatāmaiṇmiṇyam athavā maraṇamāpnoti /
GS40caraka_u:1332: na pauṣkaraṃ rohiṇīkaṃ śākaṃ kapotān vā sarṣapatailabhraṣṭān madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavaharet
GS40caraka_u:1336: na jātukaśākaṃ na nikucaṃ pakvaṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahopayojyam etaddhi maraṇāyāthavā balavarṇatejovīryoparodhāyālaghuvyādhaye ṣāṇḍhyāya ceti /
GS40caraka_u:1337: tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣasūpaguḍasarpirbhiḥ sahopayojyaṃ vairodhikatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:1339: cānyāni dravyāṇi sarvaṃ cāmlaṃ dravamadravaṃ ca payasā saha viruddham /
GS40caraka_u:1341: padmottarikāśākaṃ śārkaro maireyo madhu ca sahopayuktaṃ viruddhaṃ vātaṃ cātikopayati /
GS40caraka_u:1345: balākā vāruṇyā saha kulmāṣairapi viruddhā saiva śūkaravasāparibhṛṣṭā sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1346: mayūramāṃsam eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktam eraṇḍāgnipluṣṭam eraṇḍatailayuktaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1347: hāridrakamāṃsaṃ hāridrasīsakāvasaktaṃ hāridrāgnipluṣṭaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati tadeva bhasmapāṃśuparidhvastaṃ sakṣaudraṃ sadyo maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1348: matsyanistālanasiddhāḥ pippalyastathā kākamācī madhu ca maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1349: madhu coṣṇam uṣṇārtasya ca madhu maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1350: madhusarpiṣī samadhṛte cāntarikṣaṃ samadhṛtaṃ madhu puṣkarabījaṃ madhu pītvoṣṇodakaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1351: bhallātakoṣṇodakaṃ takrasiddhaḥ kampillakaḥ paryuṣitā kākamācī aṅgāraśūlyo bhāsaśceti viruddhāni /
GS40caraka_u:1356: pauṣkarādīnāṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavahāro viruddhaḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṣkaratratrarūpaṃ śākaṃ rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī // 3
GS40caraka_u:1361: tathāmletyādau amlagrahaṇena labdhānāpy amlāmrātakādīnām abhidhānaṃ viśeṣavirodhasūcanārtham // 6
GS40caraka_u:1363: bhavati hi prakaraṇād ekadeśe 'pi sarvavyapadeśaḥ yathā sarvān bhojayediti kiṃvā
GS40caraka_u:1365: payaseti tṛtīyayeva sahārthe labdhe punaḥ sahetyabhidhānaṃ kevalāmlādiyuktasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:1366: virodhitopadarśanārthaṃ tena amlapayaḥsaṃyoge guḍādisaṃyoge sati viruddhatvaṃ na dugdhāmrādīnām // 8
GS40caraka_u:1370: vātaṃ cātikopayatīti vacanena pittakaphāv alpaṃ kopayatīti bodhayati evaṃ pittaṃ cātikopayati kaphaṃ cātikopayatītyetayorapi vācyam // 12
GS40caraka_u:1372: balākā vāruṇyā saha viruddhā tathā kulmāṣaiśca balākā viruddhā // 14
GS40caraka_u:1373: eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktamiti eraṇḍakāṣṭhāvasaktaṃ sīsako hi bhaṭitrakaraṇakāṣṭham ucyate // 15
GS40caraka_u:1375: matsyā nistālyante pacyante yasmin tanmatsyanistālanaṃ kiṃvā nistālanaṃ vasā jatūkarṇe'pyuktaṃ matsyavasā siddhāḥ pippalyaḥ iti // 17
GS40caraka_u:1378: yat kiṃcid doṣamāsrāvya na nirharati kāyataḥ /
GS40caraka_u:1384: anena vamanavirecanadravyāṇi nirākaroti tāni hi doṣānāsrāvya nirharanti // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1388: viruddhaṃ tacca na hitaṃ hṛtsampadvidhibhiśca yat // Car_1,26.87
GS40caraka_u:1392: śīte kāle tathoṣṇe ca kaṭukoṣṇādisevanam // Car_1,26.89
GS40caraka_u:1396: yattatsātmyaviruddhaṃ tu viruddhaṃ tv anilādibhiḥ // Car_1,26.91
GS40caraka_u:1400: viruddhaṃ vīryato jñeyaṃ vīryataḥ śītalātmakam // Car_1,26.93
GS40caraka_u:1403: mṛdukoṣṭhasya guru ca bhedanīyaṃ tathā bahu /
GS40caraka_u:1410: sevetoṣṇaṃ ghṛtādīṃśca pītvā śītaṃ niṣevate // Car_1,26.98
GS40caraka_u:1413: saṃyogato viruddhaṃ tadyathāmlaṃ payasā saha // Car_1,26.99
GS40caraka_u:1415: sampadviruddhaṃ tadvidyād asaṃjātarasaṃ tu yat // Car_1,26.100
GS40caraka_u:1417: jñeyaṃ vidhiviruddhaṃ tu bhujyate nibhṛte na yat /
GS40caraka_u:1420: yaccāpi deśakālāgnītyādigranthaṃ kecit paṭhanti sa ca vyakta eva // 1]
GS40caraka_u:1424: saṃtānadoṣasya tathaiva mṛtyor viruddhamannaṃ pravadanti hetum // Car_1,26.103
GS40caraka_u:1428: etacca vairodhikakathanaṃ viśeṣavacanena bādhyate tena laśunasya kṣīreṇa pānaṃ kvacin na virodhi yaduktaṃ sādhayecchuddhaśuṣkasya laśunasya catuṣpalam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1429: kṣīrodake'ṣṭaguṇite kṣīraśeṣaṃ ca pāyayet tathā mūlakasvarasaṃ kṣīram ityādiprayogeṣūnneyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:1430: kiṃvā anekadravyasaṃyogād atra virodhinām avirodhaḥ virodhimātrasaṃyoga eva virodhī bhavati // 5
GS40caraka_u:1431: yattu madhuna uṣṇena vamanena saṃyuktasya satyapi madanaphalādidravyasaṃyoge 'virodhārthamuktam
GS40caraka_u:1434: laśunādīnāṃ tu dravyāntarāsaṃyoge satyeva melako viruddha iti śāstravacanādunnīyate // 7]
GS40caraka_u:1435: eṣāṃ khalvapareṣāṃ ca vairodhikanimittānāṃ vyādhīnāmime bhāvāḥ pratikārā bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:1436: tadyathā vamanaṃ virecanaṃ ca tadvirodhināṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ saṃśamanārtham upayogaḥ tathāvidhaiśca dravyaiḥ pūrvam abhisaṃskāraḥ śarīrasyeti //
GS40caraka_u:1438: vamanaṃ śamanaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ vā hitasevanam // Car_1,26.105
GS40caraka_u:1450: parādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ ca lakṣaṇāni pṛthakpṛthak // Car_1,26.108
GS40caraka_u:1451: pañcātmakānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ ca rasānāṃ yena hetunā /
GS40caraka_u:1453: ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtve ca savibhaktā vibhaktayaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:1458: yadyadvirudhyate yasmādyena yatkāri caiva yat // Car_1,26.112
GS40caraka_u:1461: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte ślokasthāne ātreyabhadrakāpyīyo nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_1,26.114
GS40caraka_u:1463: saṃgrahe dravyasaṃkhyā rasāśrayā iti bhedaścaiṣām ityādinā rasasaṃkhyā hi paramārthato dravyasaṃkhyaiva nirguṇatvād rasānām iti bhāvaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:1464: kāraṇaṃ rasasaṃkhyāyā iti rasānāṃ tatra yogyatvād ityādinā vibhaktayo bhedaḥ tatra madhura ityādinā // 2
GS40caraka_u:1465: uddeśo dravyāṇāṃ śītaṃ vīryeṇa ityādinā apavādo dravyāṇāṃ madhuraṃ kiṃcit ityādinā // 3] ************************************************************
GS40caraka_u:1472: samprati sāmānyenoktānāṃ guṇakarmabhyāṃ prativyaktyanuktānāṃ prativyaktiprāya upayogidravyasya viśiṣṭaguṇakarmakathanārtham annapānavidhir adhyāyo'bhidhīyate
GS40caraka_u:1474: atrānne kāṭhinyasāmānyāt khādyaṃ pāne ca dravatvasāmānyāllehyam avaruddhaṃ jñeyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1475: annapānaṃ vidhīyate viśiṣṭaguṇakarmayogitayā pratipādyate 'nenetyannapānavidhiḥ dravyāṇāṃ guṇakarmakathanam eva cānnapānavidhiḥ yatastaddhi jñātvānnapānaṃ vidhīyate // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1477: kuśalāḥ pratyakṣaphaladarśanāt tadindhanā hy antaragneḥ sthitiḥ tat sattvam ūrjayati
GS40caraka_u:1482: iṣṭamiti abhimataṃ hitaṃ ca kiṃvā iṣṭaṃ priyaṃ hitaṃ tu vidhivihitaśabdenaiva prāpyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:1483: vidhir vakṣyamāṇarasavimāne tadetadāhāravidhānam ityādigranthavācyaḥ tathendriyopakramaṇīye nāratnapāṇiḥ ityādinoktaṃ vidhānaṃ tena vidhinā vihitaṃ vidhivihitam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1485: varṇādiṣu yadyat prathamam annapāne gṛhyate tattat pūrvam uktam // 5
GS40caraka_u:1486: rasastu sparśasya paścādgṛhyamāṇo'pi prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ sparśasyāgre kṛtaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:1487: prāṇinām ityanenaiva labdhe'pi prāṇisaṃjñakānām iti vacanaṃ sthāvaraprāṇipratiṣedhārthaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1488: vṛkṣādayo hi vanaspatisattvānukāropadeśācchastre prāṇina uktāḥ na tu loke prāṇisaṃjñakāḥ
GS40caraka_u:1490: iha ca manuṣyasyaivādhikṛtatve'pi sāmānyena sakalaprāṇiprāṇahetutayāhārakathanaṃ manuṣavyatirikte'pi prāṇinyāhārasya prāṇajanakatvopadarśanārtham
GS40caraka_u:1492: atha kathaṃ tat prāṇamācakṣata ityāha pratyakṣaphaladarśanāditi // 10
GS40caraka_u:1493: pratyakṣeṇaiva hy āhāraṃ vidhinā kurvatāṃ prāṇā anuvartanta iti tathā nirāhārāṇāṃ prāṇā nahy avatiṣṭhanta iti dṛśyata ityarthaḥ // 11
GS40caraka_u:1494: pratyakṣaśabdaś ceha sphuṭapramāṇe vartate yataḥ prāṇānām annakāryatvam anumānagamyameva // 12
GS40caraka_u:1495: ānnakāryatva eva prāṇānāṃ hetumāha tadindhanā hītyādinā // 13
GS40caraka_u:1496: yasmād antaragnisthitiś cānnapānahetunā agnisthitiśca prāṇahetuḥ tato'nnaṃ prāṇā iti bhāvaḥ uktaṃ hi balam ārogyamāyuśca prāṇāścāgnau pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GS40caraka_u:1497: kiṃvā pūrvamannapānasya prāṇahetutvamuktaṃ tadindhanā hītyādināgnihetutvaṃ varṇyate // 15
GS40caraka_u:1502: tat svabhāvād udaktaṃ kledayati lavaṇaṃ viṣyandayati kṣāraḥ pācayati madhu saṃdadhāti
GS40caraka_u:1503: sarpiḥ snehayati kṣīraṃ jīvayati māṃsaṃ bṛṃhayati rasaḥ prīṇayati surā jarjarīkaroti
GS40caraka_u:1504: sīdhur avadhamati drākṣāsavo dīpayati phāṇitamācinoti dadhi śophaṃ janayati piṇyākaśākaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1505: glapayati prabhūtāntarmalo māṣasūpaḥ dṛṣṭiśukraghnaḥ kṣāraḥ prāyaḥ pittalam amlam
GS40caraka_u:1506: anyatra dāḍimāmalakāt prāyaḥ śleṣmalaṃ madhuram anyatra madhunaḥ purāṇācca śāliṣaṣṭikayavagodhūmāt
GS40caraka_u:1507: prāyastikaṃ vātalamavṛṣyaṃ cānyatra vegāgrāmṛtāpaṭolapattrāt prāyaḥ kaṭukaṃ vātalam
GS40caraka_u:1510: annapānaṃ vidhīyate yena taṃ vidhiṃ dravyaguṇakarmarūpaṃ tathā caraśarīrāvayavādirūpaṃ cākhilena kārtsnyenopadekṣyāmaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:1511: yadyapi ceha dravyaṃ prati prati guṇakarmabhyāṃ na nirdekṣyati vakṣyati hi annapānaikadeśo'yamuktaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1512: prāyopayogikaḥ iti tathāpyanuktānām api dravyāṇāṃ caraśarīrāvayavādyupadeśena tathā
GS40caraka_u:1514: uktamakhileneti vakṣyati hi yathā nānauṣadhaṃ kiṃcid deśajānāṃ vaco yathā // 2
GS40caraka_u:1515: dravyaṃ tu tattathā vācyamanuktamiha yad bhavet tathā caraḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ ityādi
GS40caraka_u:1516: kiṃvā vidhiśabdo 'śitapītalīḍhakhāditaprakāravācī tena cāśitādayaḥ sarva evākhilena
GS40caraka_u:1517: vācyaḥ tatkāraṇabhūtāni tu dravyāṇi raktaśālyādīnyekadeśenoktāni ato vakṣyati annapānaikadeśo'yamuktaḥ iti // 3
GS40caraka_u:1518: annapāne ca vaktavye yaddravyaṃ prāya upayujyate tasya sāmānyaguṇamabhidhāya vargasaṃgraheṇa guṇamupadekṣyati // 4
GS40caraka_u:1519: udakābhidhānaṃ cāgre kṛtam udakasyānne pāne ca vyāpriyamāṇatvāt // 5
GS40caraka_u:1520: tad ityudāharaṇaṃ kiṃvā sa svabhāvo yasya sa tatsvabhāvaḥ tasmāt kledanasvabhāvād ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:1521: yadyapi udakamāśvāsakarāṇāṃ jalaṃ stambhanānām ityuktaṃ tathāpīhānuktakledanakarmābhidhānārthaṃ punarucyate // 7
GS40caraka_u:1522: iha jalalavaṇādīnāṃ yat karmocyate tatteṣāmitarakarmabhyaḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyam agryādhikāre tu tatkarmakartṛdravyāntarapraśastatā jñeyā // 8
GS40caraka_u:1523: kṣāraḥ pacantamagniṃ pācayati tena pācayatīti hetau ṇic // 9
GS40caraka_u:1524: snehayatītyādau tu tatkaroti tadācaṣṭe iti ṇic // 10
GS40caraka_u:1527: prīṇayatīti kṣīṇān puṣṇāti na tv atibṛhattvaṃ karoti tena māṃsakarmaṇā bṛṃhaṇena samaṃ naikyam // 13
GS40caraka_u:1528: jarjarīkarotīti ślathamāṃsādyupacayaṃ karoti yad uktaṃ hārīte surā jarjarīkarotyasṛṅmedobāhulyāt iti tathā hy atraivoktaṃ surā kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyartham iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:1529: avadhamayatīti vilikhatītyarthaḥ anekārthatvād dhātūnāṃ vacanaṃ hi lekhanaḥ śītarasikaḥ iti tathā hārīte 'pyuktaṃ sīdhur avadhamayati vāyvagniprabodhanāt iti // 15
GS40caraka_u:1530: ācinoti doṣān iti śeṣaḥ tantrāntaravacanaṃ hi vātapittakaphāṃstasmādācinoti ca phāṇitam iti // 16
GS40caraka_u:1531: piṇyākaḥ tilakalkaḥ nighaṇṭukāras tv āha piṇyāko haritaśigruḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:1533: prabhūtāntarmalasya purīṣasya kartā prabhūtāntarmalaḥ yadyapi māṣo bahumalaḥ iti
GS40caraka_u:1534: vakṣyati tathāpi māṣavikṛteḥ sūpasyeha guṇakathanaṃ tena na punaruktaṃ na cāvaśyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1535: prakṛtidharmo vikṛtimanugacchati yataḥ saktūnāṃ siddhapiṇḍikā gurvī eva bhavati tasmān
GS40caraka_u:1537: kṣārasya pācanatvaṃ guṇo'bhihitaḥ iha tu dṛṣṭiśukraghnatvaṃ doṣa iti pṛthagucyate // 20
GS40caraka_u:1539: evamanyatrāpi prāyaḥśabdo viśeṣārtho vācyaḥ kiṃvā prāyaḥśabdo'mlena sambadhyate // 22
GS40caraka_u:1540: atra pittam ādāv amlajanyatayoktaṃ doṣaprādhānyasyāniyatatvāt uktaṃ hi na te pṛthak
GS40caraka_u:1541: pittakaphānilebhya iti tathā samapittānilakaphā iti kiṃvā pittoṣmā vahniḥ sa cehānnapānapacane
GS40caraka_u:1543: tatrāgnir hetur āhārān nahy apakvād rasādayaḥ iti teneha vahnikāraṇapittajanakam evādāv ucyate yataśca pittajanakamagre vaktavyam ato rasapradhānamapi madhuro nādāv uktaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:1544: madhuna iti vicchedapāṭhena navānavasya madhunaḥ kaphākartṛtvaṃ darśayati // 25
GS40caraka_u:1545: iha ca ṣaḍrasasyaiva kathanametattrayeṇaiva anuktānāṃ lavaṇatiktakaṣāyāṇām api pākadvārā grahaṇāt yato lavaṇaḥ pākāt prāyo madhuraḥ tiktakaṣāyau kaṭukau pākato bhavataḥ // 26
GS40caraka_u:1546: prāyaḥ sarvaṃ tiktam ityādistu grantho hārītīyaḥ iha kenāpi pramādāl likhitaḥ // 27]
GS40caraka_u:1555: rasādinirdeśaśca yathāyogyatayā jñeyaḥ tena na sarvadravye sarvarasādyabhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati // 3
GS40caraka_u:1556: atra śūkadhānyam ādāv āhārapradhānatvāt śūkavanti dhānyāni śūkadhānyāni // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1558: tūrṇako dīrghaśūkaś ca gauraḥ pāṇḍukalāṅgulau // Car_1,27.8
GS40caraka_u:1560: pataṃgas tapanīyaśca ye cānye śālayaḥ śubhāḥ // Car_1,27.9
GS40caraka_u:1568: iha ca dravyanāmāni nānādeśaprasiddhāni tena nāmajñāne sāmarthyaṃ tathābhūtaṃ nāstyevānyeṣām
GS40caraka_u:1569: api ṭīkākṛtāṃ tena deśāntaribhyo nāma prāyaśo jñeyaṃ yattu pracarati gauḍe tal likhiṣyāmo
GS40caraka_u:1575: atra ca śālirhaimantikaṃ dhānyaṃ ṣaṣṭikādayaśca graiṣmikāḥ vrīhayaḥ śāradā iti vyavasthā // 6
GS40caraka_u:1577: mahāṃstasyānviti raktaśāleranu tena raktaśāliguṇā mahāśāler manāgalpāḥ evaṃ tasyānu kalama ityatrāpi vācyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:1579: tataḥ pare iti śakunāhṛtādayaḥ uttarottaramalpaguṇā ityarthaḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:1580: guṇāguṇair iti śālīnāṃ raktaśālyādīnāṃ ye guṇās tṛṣṇāghnatvatrimalāpahatvādayaḥ teṣām
GS40caraka_u:1581: aguṇais tadguṇaviparītair doṣair yavakādayo 'nukāraṃ kurvanti tataśca yavakās tṛṣṇātrimalādikarā iti // 11
GS40caraka_u:1584: ṣaṣṭikaḥ pravaro gauraḥ kṛṣṇagaurastato'nu ca // Car_1,27.13
GS40caraka_u:1588: bahupurīṣoṣmā tridoṣas tv eva pāṭalaḥ // Car_1,27.15
GS40caraka_u:1590: ṣaṣṭikaguṇe 'kārapraśleṣād agururiti boddhavyaṃ mātrāśitīye ṣaṣṭiko laghuḥ paṭhitaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:1592: varakoddālakādayaḥ ṣaṣṭikaviśeṣāḥ kecit kudhānyāni varakādīni vadanti // 3
GS40caraka_u:1595: tantrāntare'pi paṭhyate tridoṣastveva pāṭalaḥ iti suśrute pāṭalaśabdenaitadvyatirikto dhānyaviśeṣo jñeyaḥ tena tadguṇakathanena neha virodhaḥ
GS40caraka_u:1604: koradūṣaḥ kodravaḥ koradūṣasya kevalasya śleṣmapittaghnatvaṃ tena yaduktaṃ raktapittanidāne
GS40caraka_u:1605: yadā janturyavakoddālakakoradūṣaprāyāṇy annāni bhuṅkte ityādinā pittakartṛtvaṃ koradūṣasya
GS40caraka_u:1608: hastiśyāmākaḥ śyāmākabheda eva nīvāra uḍikā gavedhuko ghuluñcaḥ sa grāmyāraṇyabhedena dvividhaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:1609: praśāntikā uḍikaiva sthalajā raktaśūkā ambhaḥśyāmākā jalajā oḍikā loke ḍe ityucyate priyaṅguḥ kāṅganī iti prasiddhā // 5
GS40caraka_u:1610: mukundo vākasatṛṇa iti varukaḥ śaṇabījaṃ varakaḥ śyāmabījaṃ śibiras tīrabhuktau siddhaka ityucyate jūrṇāhvo jonāra iti khyātaḥ // 6]
GS40caraka_u:1616: yavasya gurorapi bahuvātatvaṃ rūkṣatvāt kiṃvā suśrute yavo laghuḥ paṭhitaḥ tenātrāpyagururiti mantavyaṃ balyaśca srotaḥśuddhikaratvāt prabhāvādvā
GS40caraka_u:1617: asya ca śītamadhurakaṣāyatvenānuktamapi pittahantṛtvaṃ labhyata eva tena suśrute kaphapittahantā ityuktamupapannam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:1619: jīvano bṛṃhaṇo vṛṣyaḥ snigdhaḥ sthairyakaro guruḥ // Car_1,27.21
GS40caraka_u:1621: ityayaṃ śūkadhānyānāṃ pūrvo vargaḥ samāpyate // Car_1,27.22
