GS40caraka_u:2156: evaṃ rasanirdeśenaiva vīrye labdhe'pi punarvīryākhyānamamlasyāmalakasya śītatādarśanād boddhavyam // 15
GS40caraka_u:2165: avadaṃśakṣamamiti lavalīphalaṃ prāśya dravyāntare rucir bhavati // 24
GS40caraka_u:2172: dāḍimaguṇe kaphapittāvirodhīti amladāḍimaṃ pittāvirodhi madhuraṃ tu kaphāvirodhi
GS40caraka_u:2173: evaṃ ca tridoṣaharatvamasyopapannaṃ yad uktaṃ suśrute dvividhaṃ tattu vijñeyaṃ madhuraṃ cāmlameva ca // 31
GS40caraka_u:2177: śeṣamiti tvaṅmāṃsam ato'nyatheti guru kiṃvā śūle 'rucāv ityādyuktakesaraguṇaviparītam // 35
GS40caraka_u:2181: ihāmrātakamamlaṃ grāhyaṃ pūrvaṃ tu madhuramāmrātakam uktam // 39
GS40caraka_u:2184: vārtākaṃ dakṣiṇāpathe phalavat khādyate yad goṣṭhavārtākasaṃjñakaṃ tasyeha guṇaḥ kiṃvā phalavadasiddhasyaiva vārtākasyopayojyasyāyaṃ guṇaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:2193: snigdhasiddhaṃ viśuṣkaṃ tu mūlakaṃ kaphavātajit // Car_1,27.168
GS40caraka_u:2205: svedane'bhyavahāre ca yojayet tam apittinām // Car_1,27.174
GS40caraka_u:2209: snigdhaścoṣṇaśca vṛṣyaśca laśunaḥ kaṭuko guruḥ // Car_1,27.176
GS40caraka_u:2210: śuṣkāṇi kaphavātaghnāny etāny eṣāṃ phalāni ca /
GS40caraka_u:2211: haritānāmayaṃ caiṣa ṣaṣṭho vargaḥ samāpyate // Car_1,27.177
GS40caraka_u:2213: haritānām apyārdrakādīnāṃ phalavadagnipākam antareṇa bhojanasya prāk paścāccopayogāt phalam anu haritakathanaṃ phalebhyastu paścādabhidhānaṃ haritasya tṛptyanādhāyakatvāt // 1
GS40caraka_u:2217: tantrāntaravacanaṃ hi yāvaddhi cāvyaktarasānvitāni navaprarūḍhāni ca mūlakāni bhavanti tāvallaghudīpanāni pittānilaśleṣmaharāṇi caiva // 5
GS40caraka_u:2218: vṛddhaṃ tridoṣamiti tadevapravṛddham enāmeva mūlakāvasthām abhipretya coktaṃ mūlakaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2219: kandānāmapathyatve prakṛṣṭatamam iti mārutāpahaṃ snigdhasiddhamiti sāmānyena bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca // 6
GS40caraka_u:2220: śuṣkāṇi kaphavātaghnānyetāni iti vakṣyamāṇagranthenaiva śuṣkakasya kaphavātahantṛtve labdhe punarvacanaṃ prakarṣaprāptyartham // 7
GS40caraka_u:2221: pūtigandhaheti śarīrasya tathā vyañjanārthaṃ māṃsasya ca pūtigandhatāṃ hanti // 8
GS40caraka_u:2223: śigruḥ viṭapaśobhāñjanaḥ śāleyaś cāṇakyamūlaṃ marau prasiddhaṃ kiṃvā śāleyam iti
GS40caraka_u:2224: misteyaṃ pāṭakaprasiddhaṃ vacanaṃ hi cāṇakyamūlamisteye śāleyābhikhyayā jaguḥ iti
GS40caraka_u:2226: gaṇḍīro dvividho raktaḥ śuklaśca tatra yo raktaḥ sa hi kaṭutvena haritavarge paṭhyate yastu śuklo jalajaḥ sa śākavarge paṭhita iti naikasya vargadvaye pāṭhaḥ // 11
GS40caraka_u:2228: śṛṅgaverī gojihvikā kiṃvā ārdrakākṛtiḥ śṛṅgaverī yaduktaṃ śṛṅgaveravad ākṛtyā śṛṅgaverīti bhāṣitā // 13
GS40caraka_u:2234: ayaṃ ca dhānyakādīnām ārdrāṇāṃ guṇaḥ śuṣkāṇāṃ tv āhārayogigaṇe kāravī kuñcikā ityādinā guṇaṃ nirdekṣyati // 19
GS40caraka_u:2237: śuṣkāṇītyādinā yadyapi śuṣkāṇām api śuṇṭhīprabhṛtīnāṃ guṇa ukto bhavati tathāpi viśeṣaguṇāntarakathanārthaṃ punastadabhidhānam āhārasaṃyogivarge bhaviṣyatīti na paunaruktyam // 22]
GS40caraka_u:2244: pūrvādhyāye annaṃ prāṇāḥ ityuktaṃ tadyena prakāreṇānnaṃ prāṇahetur bhavati tadabhidhānārthaṃ vividhāśitapītīyo 'bhidhīyate // 1
GS40caraka_u:2246: vividham aśitaṃ pītaṃ līḍhaṃ khāditaṃ jantorhitam antaragnisaṃdhukṣitabalena yathāsvenoṣmaṇā
GS40caraka_u:2248: kevalaṃ śarīramupacayabalavarṇasukhāyuṣā yojayati śarīradhātūn ūrjayati ca /
GS40caraka_u:2252: vividhamiti anenāśitādīnāmavāntarabhedaṃ darśayati aśitādiṣu yo yaḥ prāya upayujyate sa pūrvam uktaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2253: jantor hitam iti vacanam ahitasyāśitāder balavarṇādikartṛtvābhāvāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:2254: antaragninā jāṭhareṇa vahninā saṃdhukṣitaṃ balaṃ yasya tenāntaragnisaṃdhukṣitabalena // 4
GS40caraka_u:2255: yathāsvenoṣmaṇeti pṛthivyādirūpāśitādeyasya ya ūṣmā pārthivāgnyādirūpastena vacanaṃ hi bhaumāpyāgneyavāyavyāḥ pañcoṣmāṇaḥ sanābhasāḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2256: pañcāhāraguṇān svān svān pārthivādīn pacanti hi iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:2258: kiṃvā yathāsvenoṣmaṇeti yasya rudhirāder ya ūṣmā dhātvagnirūpastena samyagvipacyamānamaśitādi
GS40caraka_u:2259: rasatām āpannaṃ yadā raktādidhātūn pratipadyate tadā raktādyūṣmaṇaiva pacyate evaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2262: yathā kālo nityagatvenānavasthitaḥ tathānavasthitaḥ aviśrāntaḥ sarvadhātūnāṃ pāko
GS40caraka_u:2263: yasmin śarīre tattathā etena sarvadā svāgnipākakṣīyamāṇadhātoḥ śarīrasyāśitādinopacayādiyojanam
GS40caraka_u:2264: upapannamiti darśayati yadi hi pākakṣīyamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ na syāttadā svataḥ siddhe upacayādau
GS40caraka_u:2266: kiṃvā kālavadityaśitādiviśeṣaṇaṃ tena yathoktakālakṛtam aśitādītyarthaḥ akālabhojanasyopacayādyakārakatvāt // 11
GS40caraka_u:2267: tathā anavasthitasarvadhātupākamityetadapi aśitādiviśeṣaṇaṃ tena anavasthitaḥ sarvadhātuṣu
GS40caraka_u:2268: pāko yasyāśitādestattathā etena kvacidapi dhātau sthagitasyāśitāde rasarūpasya pākavigamanān
GS40caraka_u:2270: etacca vyākhyānaṃ nātisundaram asyārthasya anupahatetyādiśarīraviśeṣaṇenaiva labdhatvāt punaḥ śarīraviśeṣaṇam anupapannam // 13
GS40caraka_u:2271: anupahatetyādi anupahatāni sarvadhātūnām ūṣmamārutasrotāṃsi yasya tattathā yadā hi
GS40caraka_u:2272: eko 'pi dhātupācako'gnirupahataḥ māruto vā dhātupoṣakarasavāhī vyānarūpaḥ kvacid
GS40caraka_u:2273: upahato bhavati tathā sroto vā dhātupoṣakarasavaham upahataṃ syāt tadā aśitādikaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2275: kevalamiti kṛtsnaṃ śarīraṃ kiṃvā kevalamiti adharmarahitam adharmayukte hi śarīre viphalamaśitādi bhavatīti // 15
GS40caraka_u:2276: nanu śarīradhātūnāṃ prakṛtisthitānāṃ svata evopacayādyasti tat kimaśitādinā kriyata ityāha dhātavo hītyādi // 16
GS40caraka_u:2277: dhāturāhāro yeṣāṃ te dhātvāhārāḥ dhātavo rasādayo nityaṃ kṣīyamāṇā aśitādijanitadhātvāhārā eva santaḥ paraṃ svāsthyamanuvartante nānyathetyarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2278: tatrāhāraprasādākhyo rasaḥ kiṭṭaṃ ca malākhyam abhinirvartate /
GS40caraka_u:2279: kiṭṭāt svedapurīṣavātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ karṇākṣināsikāsyalomakūpaprajananamalāḥ keśaśmaśrulomanakhādayaś cāvayavāḥ puṣyanti /
GS40caraka_u:2280: puṣyanti tv āhārarasād rasarudhiramāṃsamedo'sthimajjaśukraujāṃsi pañcendriyadravyāṇi dhātuprasādasaṃjñakāni śarīrasaṃdhibandhapicchādayaś cāvayavāḥ
GS40caraka_u:2281: te sarva eva dhātavo malākhyāḥ prasādākhyāśca rasamalābhyāṃ puṣyantaḥ svaṃ mānamanuvartante yathāvayaḥśarīram /
GS40caraka_u:2282: evaṃ rasamalau svapramāṇāvasthitāv āśrayasya samadhātordhātusāmyam anuvartayataḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2283: nimittatastu kṣīṇavṛddhānāṃ prasādākhyānāṃ dhātūnāṃ vṛddhikṣayābhyām āhāramūlābhyāṃ rasaḥ sāmyam utpādayatyārogyāya kiṭṭaṃ ca malānāmevameva
GS40caraka_u:2284: svamānātiriktāḥ punarutsargiṇaḥ śītoṣṇaparyāyaguṇaiś copacaryamāṇā malāḥ śarīradhātusāmyakarāḥ samupalabhyante // Car_1,28.4
GS40caraka_u:2289: āhāraprasāda ityākhyā yasya sa tathā prasādaḥ sāraḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:2291: kiṭṭād iti kiṭṭāṃśāt tena annādyaḥ kiṭṭāṃśas tato mūtrapurīṣe bhavato vāyuśca rasāt pacyamānānmalaḥ kaphaḥ evamādi grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇam anusartavyaṃ vakṣyati hi /
GS40caraka_u:2293: pittaṃ māṃsasya svamalo malaḥ svedastu medasaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2294: syāt kiṭṭaṃ keśalomāsthno majjñaḥ sneho'kṣiviṭ tvacām /
GS40caraka_u:2297: yadyapi ca vāto'naśanād apyupalabhyate tathāpi rūkṣakiṭṭādibhojanamalāṃśād apyutpadyata
GS40caraka_u:2298: eveti kiṭṭādvātotpattiryuktaiva na cāyaṃ niyamo yanmalādevotpadyata iti vyāyāmādavagāhāderapi
GS40caraka_u:2306: atrāhārarasād raktādipoṣaṇe kecid bruvate yat raso raktarūpatayā pariṇamati raktaṃ ca māṃsarūpatayā evaṃ māṃsādayo 'pyuttarottaradhāturūpatayā pariṇamanti // 16
GS40caraka_u:2307: atrāpi ca pakṣe kecid bruvate kṣīrād yathā sarvātmanā dadhi bhavati tathā kṛtsno raso raktaṃ bhavati evaṃ raktādayo'pi māṃsādirūpā bhavanti
GS40caraka_u:2308: anye tv āhuḥ kedārīkulyānyāyena rasasya dhātupoṣaṇaṃ tatrānnādutpanno raso dhāturūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2309: rasamadhigamya kiyatāpyaṃśena taṃ rasaṃ vardhayati aparaśca rasarāśistatra gataḥ
GS40caraka_u:2310: san śoṇitagandhavarṇayuktatvācchoṇitam iva bhūtvā kiyatāpi śoṇitasamānenāṃśena dhāturūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2311: śoṇitaṃ puṣṇāti śeṣaśca bhāgo māṃsaṃ yāti tatrāpi śoṇitavadvyavasthā tathā medaḥprabhṛtiṣvapīti // 18
GS40caraka_u:2312: ata eva ca mukhyārtho 'yaṃ grantho bhavati yathā /
GS40caraka_u:2313: rasād raktaṃ tato māṃsaṃ māṃsānmedastato'sthi ca /
GS40caraka_u:2314: asthno majjā tataḥ śukraṃ śukrādgarbhaḥ prasādajaḥ // 19
GS40caraka_u:2315: iti tathā hārīte'pyuktaṃ rasaḥ saptāhādarvāk parivartamānaḥ śvetakapotaharitahāridrapadmakiṃśukālaktakarasaprakhyaś
GS40caraka_u:2316: cāyaṃ yathākramaṃ divasaparivartād varṇaparivartam āpadyamānaḥ pittoṣmoparāgācchoṇitatvam
GS40caraka_u:2317: āpadyate iti tathā suśrute 'pyuktaṃ sa khalvāpyo rasa ekaikasmin dhātau trīṇi trīṇi
GS40caraka_u:2318: kalāsahasrāṇi pañcadaśa ca kalā avatiṣṭhate evaṃ māsena rasaḥ śukrībhavati iti // 20
GS40caraka_u:2319: anye tv āhuḥ khalekapotanyāyenāyam annarasaḥ pṛthak pṛthag dhātumārge gataḥ san rasādīn
GS40caraka_u:2320: poṣayati na tv asya dhātupoṣako rasabhāgo dhātvantareṇa samaṃ sambandham apyanubhavati
GS40caraka_u:2321: rasādipoṣakāni srotāṃsyuttarottaraṃ sūkṣmamukhāni dīrghāṇi ca tenaiva rasapoṣakarasabhāgo
GS40caraka_u:2322: rasamārgacāritvād rasaṃ poṣayati evaṃ rasapoṣaṇakālād uttarakālaṃ raktapoṣako rasabhāgo
GS40caraka_u:2323: raktaṃ poṣayati tathā śoṇitapoṣaṇakālād uttarakālaṃ māṃsapoṣako rasabhāgo māṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2325: tena rasād raktaṃ tato māṃsam ityāder ayam artho yatra rasapuṣṭikālād uttarakālaṃ raktaṃ jāyate tathā raktapuṣṭikālād uttarakālaṃ māṃsaṃ prajāyate ityādi // 22
GS40caraka_u:2327: yacca raktaṃ vibaddhamārgatvān māṃsādīnna prapadyate iti rājayakṣmaṇi vakṣyati taddhṛdayacāriśoṇitābhiprāyeṇa na tu poṣakaśoṇitābhiprāyeṇa //
GS40caraka_u:2328: kiṃca pariṇāmapakṣe vṛṣyaprayogasya raktādirūpatāpattikrameṇāticireṇa śukraṃ bhavatīti
GS40caraka_u:2329: kṣīrādayaśca sadya eva vṛṣyā dṛśyante khalekapotapakṣe tu vṛṣyotpanno rasaḥ prabhāvācchīghrameva
GS40caraka_u:2330: śukreṇa sambaddhaḥ san tatpuṣṭiṃ karotīti yuktaṃ tathā rasaduṣṭau satyāṃ pariṇāmapakṣe
GS40caraka_u:2331: tajjanmanāṃ śoṇitādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva duṣṭiḥ syāt duṣṭakāraṇajātatvāt // 25
GS40caraka_u:2332: khalekapotapakṣe tu yaddhātupoṣako rasabhāgo duṣṭaḥ sa eva duṣyati na sarve taditareṣāmaduṣṭakāraṇatvāt
GS40caraka_u:2333: tathā medovṛddhau satyāṃ bhūrikāraṇatvenāsthnāpi bhūyasā bhavitavyaṃ dṛśyate ca bhūrimedasa
GS40caraka_u:2334: itaradhātuparikṣayaḥ vacanaṃ ca medasvino meda evopacīyate na tathetare dhātavaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2336: eṣu ca pakṣeṣu sarvātmapariṇāmavādo viruddha eva yena sarvātmapariṇāme tricaturopavāsenaiva nīrasatvāccharīrasya maraṇaṃ syāt māsopavāse kevalaṃ śukramayaṃ śarīraṃ syāt // 27
GS40caraka_u:2337: kedārīkulyānyāyas tu tulyabala eva khalekapotanyāyena yato yad uktaṃ vṛṣyaprabhāvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2338: prati tat kedārīkulyāpakṣe'pi prabhāvādeva śīghraṃ raktādidhātūnabhigamya śukraṃ
GS40caraka_u:2340: yattu rasaduṣṭau śoṇitadūṣaṇaṃ tanna bhavati dhātubhūtaśoṇitāṃśapoṣakasya rasabhāgasyāduṣṭatvāt iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // 29
GS40caraka_u:2341: atrāpi hi pakṣe na sarvo raso dhāturūpaśoṇitatām āpadyate kiṃ tarhi kaścideva śoṇitasamāno
GS40caraka_u:2342: bhāgaḥ śeṣastu śoṇitasthānagatatvena kiṃcicchoṇitasamānavarṇāditvācca śoṇitam ucyate
GS40caraka_u:2343: anena nyāyena medovṛddhau satyāmasthivṛddhir api nirastā yato na medasā asthi poṣyate
GS40caraka_u:2345: evamanayoḥ pakṣayormahājanādṛtatvena tulyanyāyatvena ca naikamapi niścitaṃ buddhivibhavānna pakṣabalābalam atra na kaścit kāryavirodha ityuparamyate
GS40caraka_u:2346: nanvāhārarasādayaḥ puṣyantīti vadatā dhāturasādāhārarasotpādaḥ pṛthak svīkriyate
GS40caraka_u:2347: tataśca tasya kiṃ sthānaṃ kiṃvā pramāṇam iti kimiti noktam ucyate na tasyāhārotkarṣāpakarṣāv
GS40caraka_u:2348: evaṃvidhau utkarṣāpakarṣasya niścitapramāṇatvābhāvāt sthānaṃ tu dhamanya eva // 32
GS40caraka_u:2349: poṣakāhārarasasya tasya ca pṛthagrasādidhātubhyaḥ pradeśāntaragrahaṇaṃ na kriyate rasādikāraṇarūpatayā rasādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇāt // 33
GS40caraka_u:2350: atra yadyapyojaḥ saptadhātusārarūpaṃ tena dhātugrahaṇenaiva labhyate tathāpi prāṇadhāraṇakartṛtvena
GS40caraka_u:2351: pṛthak paṭhitaṃ ye tu śukrajanyamoja icchanti teṣāmaṣṭamo dhāturojaḥ syāditi pakṣe
GS40caraka_u:2352: cātideśaṃ kṛtvā vakṣyati rasādīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ yat paraṃ tejaḥ tat khalvojaḥ iti // 34
GS40caraka_u:2353: upapāditapoṣaṇānāṃ dhātumalānāṃ prakṛtyanuvidhānam upasaṃharati te sarva ityādi // 35
GS40caraka_u:2354: malākhyā api svedamūtrādayaḥ svamānāvasthitā dehadhāraṇāddhātavo bhavantītyuktaṃ dhātavo malākhyā iti // 36
GS40caraka_u:2355: yathāvayaḥśarīram iti yasmin vayasi bālyādau yādṛśaṃ mānaṃ dhātūnāṃ tādṛśaṃ puṣyantaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2356: tathā yasmin śarīre prakṛtyā dīrghe hrasve kṛśe vā sthūle vā yādṛśaṃ mānaṃ dhātūnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2358: evam ityādau svapramāṇāvasthitāv iti anatiriktāv anyūnau ca // 38
GS40caraka_u:2359: āśrayasyeti śarīrasya yathāvatpakvau sarvāśrayaṃ paścāddhamanībhiḥ prapadyete sarvaśarīram ityarthaḥ // 39
GS40caraka_u:2363: vṛddhikṣayābhyām āhāramūlābhyām iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vṛddhakṣīṇāhārakṛtābhyām etenāhāraviśeṣakṛtavṛddhikṣayo rasaḥ sāmyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ // 43
GS40caraka_u:2364: dhātusāmyasyārogyatve siddhe'pi yadārogyāyeti brūte tena prākṛtadhātūnāṃ kṣayeṇa vātivṛddhyā vā sāmyaṃ nirākaroti asya sāmyasya rogakartṛtvād eva // 44
GS40caraka_u:2365: kiṭṭaṃ ca malānāmevam eveti yathā rasastathā kiṭṭamapyārogyāya malānāṃ sāmyaṃ pratipāditarasakrameṇa karoti // 45
GS40caraka_u:2367: utsargo bahirniḥsaraṇaṃ saṃśodhanarūpameṣāṃ śāstroktamasti utsargaṃ vā vahantītyutsargiṇaḥ // 47
GS40caraka_u:2369: paryayaḥ viparyayaḥ tena śītoṣṇaviparītaguṇair ityarthaḥ tena śītasamutthe male uṣṇaṃ tathoṣṇasamutthe śītamupacāro bhavati // 49
GS40caraka_u:2370: ādiśabdaś cātra luptanirdiṣṭaḥ tena snigdharūkṣādīnāmapi viparītaguṇānāṃ grahaṇam // 50
GS40caraka_u:2371: kiṃvā paryayaguṇā dvaṃdvaguṇāḥ snigdharūkṣamṛdutīkṣṇādayaḥ taiśca yathāyogyatayopacaryamāṇā iti jñeyam // 51
GS40caraka_u:2372: etena vṛddhamalānāṃ trividho 'pyupakramo nidānavarjanaśodhanaśamanarūpa ukto bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2374: vā boddhavyaṃ saṃśodhanaṃ ca utsargiṇa ityanenoktaṃ śamanaṃ ca śītoṣṇetyādi granthenoktam // 52]
GS40caraka_u:2381: ayanāni ca tāni mukhāni cetyayanamukhāni atra āyāntyanenetyayanāni mārgāṇi mukhāni
GS40caraka_u:2382: tu yaiḥ praviśanti etena malānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca yadevāyanaṃ tadeva praveśamukhamiti
GS40caraka_u:2383: nānyena praveśo nānyena ca gamanam ityuktaṃ bhavati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2385: kiṃvā ayanasya gamanasya mukhāni mārgāṇi tena ayanamukhāni gatimārgāṇītyarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2386: tāni ca srotāṃsi malaprasādapūritāni dhātūn yathāsvamiti yadyasya poṣyaṃ tacca tat pūrayati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2387: yathāvibhāgeneti yasya dhātoryo vibhāgaḥ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena pūrayati tādṛkpramāṇānyeva puṣyanti nādhikanyūnānītyarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2388: etacca prakṛtisthānāṃ karma vikṛtānāṃ tu nyūnātiriktadhātukaraṇam astyeveti boddhavyam // 6
GS40caraka_u:2389: uktaṃ cānyatra srotasā ca yathāsvena dhātuḥ puṣyati dhātunā iti // 7
GS40caraka_u:2392: hitarūpo'śitādiviśeṣaḥ śubharūpaviśeṣakārakaḥ ahitarūpastvaśitādiviśeṣo 'śubharūpaviśeṣakaro bhavati tena naikarūpāt kāraṇād viruddhakāryodaya iti bhāvaḥ // 10]
GS40caraka_u:2393: evaṃvādinaṃ bhagavantamātreyamagniveśa uvāca dṛśyante hi bhagavan hitasamākhyātam
GS40caraka_u:2394: apyāhāramupayuñjānā vyādhimantaś cāgadāś ca tathaivāhitasamākhyātam evaṃ dṛṣṭe kathaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2397: dṛśyante hi bhagavannityādau tathaivāhitasamākhyātam upayuñjānā vyādhimantaś cāgadāśceti sambandhaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2399: tamuvāca bhagavānātreyo na hitāhāropayoginām agniveśa tannimittā vyādhayo jāyante
GS40caraka_u:2400: na ca kevalaṃ hitāhāropayogādeva sarvavyādhibhayam atikrāntaṃ bhavati santi hy ṛte
GS40caraka_u:2401: 'pyahitāhāropayogād anyā rogaprakṛtayaḥ tadyathā kālaviparyayaḥ prajñāparādhaḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhāścāsātmyā iti /
GS40caraka_u:2402: tāśca rogaprakṛtayo rasān samyagupayuñjānamapi puruṣam aśubhenopapādayanti tasmāddhitāhāropayogino'pi dṛśyante vyādhimantaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2403: ahitāhāropayogināṃ punaḥ kāraṇato na sadyo doṣavān bhavatyapacāraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2404: na hi sarvāṇyapathyāni tulyadoṣāṇi na ca sarve doṣāstulyabalā na ca sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi vyādhikṣamatve samarthāni bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2405: tadeva hy apathyaṃ deśakālasaṃyogavīryapramāṇātiyogād bhūyastaram apathyaṃ sampadyate /
GS40caraka_u:2406: sa eva doṣa saṃsṛṣṭayonirviruddhopakramo gambhīrānugataś cirasthitaḥ prāṇāyatanasamuttho marmopaghātī kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaśca sampadyate
GS40caraka_u:2407: śarīrāṇi cātisthūlānyatikṛśāny aniviṣṭamāṃsaśoṇitāsthīni durbalāny asātmyāhāropacitāny alpāhārāṇy alpasattvāni ca bhavantyavyādhisahāni viparītāni punarvyādhisahāni /
GS40caraka_u:2408: ebhyaś caivāpathyāhāradoṣaśarīraviśeṣebhyo vyādhayo mṛdavo dāruṇāḥ kṣiprasamutthāścirakāriṇaśca bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2409: eva vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ sthānaviśeṣe prakupitā vyādhiviśeṣān abhinivartayantyagniveśa // Car_1,28.7
GS40caraka_u:2415: kāraṇata iti nimittāntarāt pratibandhāt tacca kāraṇaṃ tadeva hy apathyam ityādivakṣyamāṇagranthaviparītaṃ boddhavyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:2417: anenāpathyasya rogajananaṃ prati kālāntaravikārakartṛtvaṃ prāyo bhavatīti darśayati anyathā sadya ityanarthakaṃ syāt kālāntare 'pi doṣākartṛtvāt
GS40caraka_u:2419: apacāra iti ahitāhāropayogaḥ ukte kāraṇamāha nahītyādi /
GS40caraka_u:2423: atra yadyapi prastutatvād apathyapratibandhakāni kāraṇāni vaktavyāni tathāpi samānanyāyatayāpathyaśaktivardhakānyucyante // 12
GS40caraka_u:2424: tatra deśādīnāṃ yogāditi anuguṇadeśādiyogāt yathā vrīhiḥ pittakartṛtvenāpathyaḥ sa
GS40caraka_u:2425: cānūpadeśayogādbhūyastaram apathyo bhavati dhanvadeśe tu hīnabalo bhavati tathā śaratkālasyānuguṇasya
GS40caraka_u:2426: yogādbalavānbhavati hemante durbalaḥ saṃyogād yathā sa vrīhir dadhiphāṇitādiyukto
GS40caraka_u:2427: balavān madhvādiyuktaśca durbalaḥ vīryād yathā sa evoṣṇīkṛto balavān śītastu durbalaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2428: sa eva ca pramāṇātiyogād balī hīnamātrastvabalaḥ ityādyanusartavyam // 13
GS40caraka_u:2430: saṃsṛṣṭā militā bahavo yonayaḥ kāraṇāni yasya sa tathā kiṃvā saṃsṛṣṭayonir iti anuguṇadūṣyaḥ yathā pittasya raktaṃ dūṣyam āsādya kaṣṭatvaṃ kṣiprakāritvaṃ ca bhavati // 15
GS40caraka_u:2431: viruddhopakramo yathā pittaṃ mehārambhakaṃ vacanaṃ hi pittamehāḥ sarva eva yāpyāḥ
GS40caraka_u:2432: viruddhopakramatvāt iti viruddhatā copakramasyātra yat pittaharaṃ madhurādi tanmehapradhānadūṣyamedaso
GS40caraka_u:2433: viruddhaṃ medo'nuguṇaṃ tu kaṭvādi pitte viruddham iti // 16
GS40caraka_u:2434: gambhīrānugata iti gambhīramajjādidhātugataḥ vacanaṃ hi tvaṅmāṃsāśrayamuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ tv antarāśrayam iti // 17
GS40caraka_u:2435: cirasthita iti dehe cirakālāvasthānena kṛtamūlatvāt kaṣṭasādhyaḥ // 18
GS40caraka_u:2438: marmaghātitvenaiva marmaviśeṣaprāṇāyatanasamutthatve labdhe punastadvacanaṃ prāṇāyatanamarmāśrayiṇo viśeṣeṇa kaṣṭatvapratipādanārtham // 21
GS40caraka_u:2442: ca bhavantīti darśayati yathoktasarvahetumelake kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaś ca bhavatīti
GS40caraka_u:2443: jñeyaṃ kaṣṭatamatvādi ca yathāyogyatayā jñeyaṃ viruddhopakramo doṣaḥ kaṣṭa eva bhavati na kṣiprakārī // 24
GS40caraka_u:2445: aniviṣṭāni ślathāni māṃsādīni yeṣāṃ śarīriṇāṃ tāni tathā kiṃvā aniviṣṭānīti viṣamāṇi // 26
GS40caraka_u:2446: upacitānīti saṃvardhitāni asātmyapuṣṭaṃ hi śarīraṃ bhūridoṣabhāvitameva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 27
GS40caraka_u:2449: etacca śarīramadhikṛtya vaiparītyaṃ vyādhisahatve udāharaṇārtham upanyastaṃ tena
GS40caraka_u:2450: yathoktāpathyabalavaiparītyaṃ doṣabalavaiparītyaṃ ca na sadyo vyādhikārakaṃ bhavatītyetad
GS40caraka_u:2452: etad evāpathyāhāradoṣaśarīrāṇām evābalavattvabalavattvābhyāṃ lakṣaṇaviśeṣaṃ yathāyogyatayā mṛdvādivyādhikāraṇatvenopasaṃharann āha ebhyaś caivetyādi
GS40caraka_u:2453: viśeṣā yathoktā uktaviparītāśca tatroktaviparītaviśeṣān mṛdavastathā cirakāriṇaśca bhavanti yathoktāpathyādiviśeṣāttu dāruṇāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaśca bhavantīti mantavyam // 32
GS40caraka_u:2454: anena prasaṅgena vātādīnāṃ rasādisthānaviśeṣeṣu kupitānāṃ ye vyādhayo bhavanti tān darśayitum āha ta evetyādi // 33]
GS40caraka_u:2455: tatra rasādiṣu sthāneṣu prakupitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ yasmin sthāne ye ye vyādhayaḥ sambhavanti tāṃs tān yathāvad anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ // Car_1,28.8
GS40caraka_u:2457: tatra rasetyādau prakupitānāṃ doṣāṇāmiti aniyamena rase kupito vāyur vā pittaṃ vā śleṣmā vā saṃsṛṣṭā vā aśraddhādīni kurvanti // 1
GS40caraka_u:2458: satyapi doṣabhede 'trāśrayasyābhedād āśrayaprabhāveṇaivāśraddhādayo bhavanti paraṃ doṣabhede aśraddhādāv eva vātādiliṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:2459: kiṃvā yathāyogyatayā rasāśrayiṇā vātādinā aśraddhādikaraṇaṃ boddhavyaṃ yato na gauravaṃ vātaduṣṭarase bhavitumarhati etacca nātisundaraṃ tena pūrva eva pakṣo jyāyān // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2461: hṛllāso gauravaṃ tandrā sāṅgamardo jvaras tamaḥ // Car_1,28.9
GS40caraka_u:2462: pāṇḍutvaṃ srotasāṃ rodhaḥ klaibyaṃ sādaḥ kṛśāṅgatā /
GS40caraka_u:2465: aśraddhāyāṃ mukhapraviṣṭasyāhārasyābhyavaharaṇaṃ bhavatyeva paraṃ tv anicchā arucau tu mukhapraviṣṭaṃ nābhyavaharatīti bhedaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2472: nīlikā kāmalā vyaṅgaḥ pipplavas tilakālakāḥ // Car_1,28.12
GS40caraka_u:2475: raktapradoṣajeṣu kuṣṭhagrahaṇādeva dadrvādilābhe siddhe punastadvacanaṃ viśeṣaprādurbhāvapradarśanārtham // 1
GS40caraka_u:2484: ninditāni pramehāṇāṃ pūrvarūpāṇi yāni ca // Car_1,28.15
GS40caraka_u:2486: ninditāni pramehapūrvarūpāṇīti keśajaṭilatvādīni teṣāmeva ninditatvāt na tv āsyavairasyamadhuratvādīni // 1
GS40caraka_u:2487: kiṃvā ninditānīti atisthūlagatāny āyurhrāsādīny aṣṭauninditīyoktāni teṣāṃ ca ninditatvaṃ ninditātisthūlasambaddhatvena // 2
GS40caraka_u:2488: evaṃ pūrvasminvyākhyāne yāni ca iti cakāro niyame uttaravyākhyāne tu samuccaye // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2494: ruk parvaṇāṃ bhramo mūrchā darśanaṃ tamasastathā /
GS40caraka_u:2495: aruṣāṃ sthūlamūlānāṃ parvajānāṃ ca darśanam // Car_1,28.17
GS40caraka_u:2500: rogi vā klībamalpāyur virūpaṃ vā prajāyate // Car_1,28.18
GS40caraka_u:2501: na cāsya jāyate garbhaḥ patati prasravatyapi /
GS40caraka_u:2502: śukraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ sāpatyaṃ sadāraṃ bādhate naram // Car_1,28.19
GS40caraka_u:2506: śukraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ sāpatyaṃ sadāraṃ bādhate naramiti atrāpatyabādhā rogiklībādyapatyajanakatvena dārabādhā tu srāvigarbhādijanakatvena // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2510: upaghātetyādau upaghāto vināśaḥ upatāpastu kiṃcid vaikalyam // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2518: doṣā malānāṃ kurvanti saṅgotsargāv atīva ca // Car_1,28.22
GS40caraka_u:2520: malānityādau bhedaśoṣapradūṣaṇam iti yathāsambhavaṃ jñeyaṃ tatra bhedaḥ purīṣasya
GS40caraka_u:2521: śoṣastu viśeṣeṇa sarvamaleṣu sambhavati pradūṣaṇaṃ tu praduṣṭavarṇādiyuktatvena prākṛtavarṇādyupaghātaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2522: saṃgotsargāv atīva ceti atīva saṅgaḥ apravṛttiḥ atyutsargastu atipravṛttiḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2524: bhavantyete manuṣyāṇāṃ vikārā ya udāhṛtāḥ // Car_1,28.23
GS40caraka_u:2526: hitānyevāśitādīni na syus tajjās tathāmayāḥ // Car_1,28.24
GS40caraka_u:2534: annaṃ vyavāyavyāyāmau śuddhiḥ kāle ca mātrayā // Car_1,28.28
GS40caraka_u:2538: malajānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ siddhiś coktā kvacitkvacit // Car_1,28.30
GS40caraka_u:2540: sampratyahitāhārajanitān doṣān darśayan yathākartavyam upadiśati vividhādityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2542: pañcakarmāṇītyabhidhāyāpi vastaya iti vacanaṃ tiktopahitavaster viśeṣeṇa hitatvopadarśanārtham // 3
GS40caraka_u:2546: koṣṭhācchākhā malā yānti drutatvānmarutasya ca // Car_1,28.31
GS40caraka_u:2550: samprati rasādīnāṃ śākhārūpatvāt koṣṭhāśrayiṇo doṣā yathā śākhāṃ yānti tad āha vyāyāmetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2551: tatra vyāyāmakṣobhāt koṣṭhaṃ parityajya śākhāṃ malā yānti ūṣmaṇo vahnestīkṣṇatvād
GS40caraka_u:2553: jalāpūravad vṛddhaḥ svasthānamāplāvya sthānāntaraṃ yātīti yuktam // 2
GS40caraka_u:2554: drutatvānmārutasyeti calatvād vāyor vāyunā kṣipto yātītyarthaḥ vāyvantareṇa ca vāyor ākṣepaṇamupapannam eveti anyathā malā iti bahuvacanam asādhu
GS40caraka_u:2556: vilambante kadācid iti kadācidvyādhikaraṇe vilambaṃ kurvanti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2558: ye doṣā alpatvenābalavantaste hetvantareṇa samīritāḥ santaḥ kupyanti tathā ta eva nādeśa ityananuguṇadeśe tathā nākāla ityananuguṇakāle kupyantīti yojanā // 7
GS40caraka_u:2560: yasmādbhūyo hetupratīkṣiṇas te 'lpabalā doṣāstasmādīraṇādyapekṣante etena bhūyo ye 'hetupratīkṣiṇo bhavanti balavattvānna te īraṇādyapekṣante ata evoktaṃ kadāciditi // 9]
GS40caraka_u:2562: śākhā muktvā malāḥ koṣṭhaṃ yānti vāyośca nigrahāt // Car_1,28.33
GS40caraka_u:2564: samprati śākhābhyaḥ koṣṭhāgamanahetuṃ doṣāṇām āha vṛddhyetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2565: viṣyandanāditi vilayanāt vilīnaśca dravatvādeva koṣṭhe nimnaṃ yāti // 2
GS40caraka_u:2566: pākāditi pakvo doṣo 'baddhatvenaiva nimnaṃ koṣṭhaṃ yāti // 3
GS40caraka_u:2568: vāyornigrahāditi kṣepturvāyornigrahāt prākṛtaṃ sthānaṃ koṣṭhaṃ yāti // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2570: rogāṇāṃ yo vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ sukhārthī taṃ samācaret // Car_1,28.34
GS40caraka_u:2576: nanu yadi sukhārthā sarvaprāṇināṃ pravṛttistatkathaṃ ko 'pi amārge pravartata ityāha jñānetyādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:2577: ajñānād eva sukhasādhanamidam iti kṛtvā aparīkṣakāḥ pravartante na tu duḥkhakartṛtāsaṃdhānād iti bhāvaḥ // 4]
GS40caraka_u:2581: vāgviśuddhiḥ śamo dhairyam āśrayanti parīkṣakam // Car_1,28.37
GS40caraka_u:2583: tanmūlā bahavo yanti rogāḥ śārīramānasāḥ // Car_1,28.38
GS40caraka_u:2585: hitameveti āyativiśuddham eva tadātve duḥkhakaram api // 1
GS40caraka_u:2589: parīkṣakamāśrayantīti parīkṣake bhavanti kiṃvā buddhyādidevatāḥ parīkṣakamāśrayante yad uktaṃ viviśur jñānadevatāḥ iti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2592: saṃdhārayati vegāṃśca sevate sāhasāni ca // Car_1,28.39
GS40caraka_u:2594: rajyate na tu vijñātā vijñāne hy amalīkṛte // Car_1,28.40
GS40caraka_u:2596: yathā aparīkṣake rajastamomūlā rogā bhavanti tadāha prajñāparādhād ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2598: tadātvasukheṣviti vaktavye yat sukhasaṃjñeṣu iti karoti tattadātvasukhasyāpathyasya
GS40caraka_u:2606: ahitatvena jānann api rāgādeva kaścid duṣṭaḥ pravartate ajñānāccāhitatvājñānād eva kaściddhitādhyavasāyena pravartate etaddvayamapi niṣidhyate
GS40caraka_u:2611: āhārasya vidhau vidhāne'ṣṭau viśeṣāḥ prakṛtikaraṇasaṃyogādayo rasavimāne vaktavyā hetusaṃjñakāḥ kva hetusaṃjñakā ityāha śubhetyādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:2612: śubhāśubhasamutpattau iti te ca prakṛtyādayaḥ śubhāḥ śubhakarāḥ aśubhā aśubhakarāḥ iti jñeyam // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2614: bhavatyanṛṇatāṃ prāptaḥ sādhūnām iha paṇḍitaḥ // Car_1,28.43
GS40caraka_u:2616: parihartuṃ na tatprāpya śocitavyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // Car_1,28.44
GS40caraka_u:2618: nanu pathyasevāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyām api balavatprāktanādharmavaśādapi vyādhayo bhavanti tat kim anena pathyasevanenetyāha parihāryāṇītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2619: anṛṇatām iva prāpto'nṛṇatāṃ prāptaḥ etena parihāryaparihāreṇa puruṣakāre'naparādhaḥ puruṣo bhavatīti darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:2620: yastu daivāgatastasya vyādhistatra sādhavo naivaṃ pathyasevinaṃ garhayanti etadevāha yattvityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:2622: na śocitavyam iti puruṣakārasya daivajanye 'vaśyambhāvini vyādhāv akiṃcitkaratvād ityarthaḥ // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2626: viśeṣo rogasaṃghāś ca dhātujā ye pṛthakpṛthak // Car_1,28.46
GS40caraka_u:2627: teṣāṃ caiva praśamanaṃ koṣṭhācchākhā upetya ca /
GS40caraka_u:2628: doṣā yathā prakupyanti śākhābhyaḥ koṣṭhametya ca // Car_1,28.47
GS40caraka_u:2631: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte sūtrasthāne vividhāśitapītīyo nāmāṣṭāviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_1,28.49
GS40caraka_u:2634: sahatve cāsahatve cetyādinā śarīrāṇi cātisthūlāni ityādi viparītāni punar vyādhisahāni ityantaṃ granthaṃ jñāpayati // 2] *************************************************************
GS40caraka_u:2638: iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ // Car_2,7.2
GS40caraka_u:2639: iha khalu pañconmādā bhavanti tadyathā vātapittakaphasannipātāgantunimittāḥ // Car_2,7.3
GS40caraka_u:2640: tatra doṣanimittāś catvāraḥ puruṣāṇām evaṃvidhānāṃ kṣipram abhinirvartante tadyathā
GS40caraka_u:2641: bhīrūṇām upakliṣṭasattvānām utsannadoṣāṇāṃ samalavikṛtopahitāny anucitāny āhārajātāni
GS40caraka_u:2642: vaiṣamyayuktenopayogavidhinopayuñjānānāṃ tantraprayogam api viṣamam ācaratām anyāś
GS40caraka_u:2643: ca śarīraceṣṭā viṣamāḥ samācaratām atyupakṣīṇadehānāṃ vyādhivegasamudbhramitānām
GS40caraka_u:2645: vā manasy upahate buddhau ca pracalitāyām abhyudīrṇā doṣāḥ prakupitā hṛdayam upasṛtya
GS40caraka_u:2646: manovahāni srotāṃsy āvṛtya janayanty unmādam // Car_2,7.4
GS40caraka_u:2648: tasyemāni pūrvarūpāṇi tadyathā śirasaḥ śūnyatā cakṣuṣor ākulatā svanaḥ karṇayoḥ ucchvāsasyādhikyam
GS40caraka_u:2650: satataṃ lomaharṣaḥ jvaraś cābhīkṣṇam unmattacittatvam udarditvam arditākṛtikaraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2651: ca vyādheḥ svapne cābhīkṣṇaṃ darśanaṃ bhrāntacalitānavasthitānāṃ rūpāṇām apraśastānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2652: ca tilapīḍakacakrādhirohaṇaṃ vātakuṇḍalikābhiś conmathanaṃ nimajjanaṃ ca kaluṣāṇām
GS40caraka_u:2653: ambhasām āvarte cakṣuṣoś cāpasarpaṇam iti // Car_2,7.6
GS40caraka_u:2655: tatredam unmādaviśeṣavijñānaṃ bhavati tadyathā parisaraṇam ajasram akṣibhruvauṣṭāṃsahanvagrahastapādāṅgavikṣepaṇam
GS40caraka_u:2656: akasmāt satatam aniyatānāṃ ca girām utsargaḥ phenāgamanam āsyāt abhīkṣṇaṃ smitahasitanṛtyagītavāditrasaṃprayogāś
GS40caraka_u:2657: cāsthāne vīṇāvaṃśaśaṅkhaśamyātālaśabdānukaraṇam asāmnā yānam ayānaiḥ alaṅkaraṇam
GS40caraka_u:2658: analaṅkārikair dravyaiḥ lobhaś cābhyavahāryeṣv alabdheṣu labdheṣu cāvamānas tīvramātsaryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2659: ca kārśyaṃ pāruṣyam utpiṇḍitāruṇākṣatā vātopaśayaviparyāsād anupaśayatā ca iti vātonmādaliṅgāni bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2660: amarṣaḥ krodhaḥ saṃrambhaś cāsthāne śastraloṣṭakaśākāṣṭhamuṣṭibhir abhihananaṃ sveṣāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2661: pareṣāṃ vā abhidravaṇaṃ pracchāyaśītodakānnābhilāṣaḥ saṃtāpaś cātivelaṃ tāmrahāritahāridrasaṃrabdhākṣatā
GS40caraka_u:2662: pittopaśayaviparyāsād anupaśayatā ca iti pittonmadaliṅgāni bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2663: sthānam ekadeśe tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ alpaśaś caṅkramaṇaṃ lālāśiṅghāṇakasravaṇam anannābhilāṣaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2664: rahaskāmatā bībhatsatvaṃ śaucadveṣaḥ svapnanityatā śvayathur ānane śuklastimitamalopadigdhākṣatvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2665: śleṣmopaśayaviparyāsād anupaśayatā ca iti śleṣmonmādaliṅgāni bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2666: tridoṣaliṅgasannipāte tu sānnipātikaṃ vidyāt tam asādhyam ācakṣate kuśalāḥ // Car_2,7.7
GS40caraka_u:2669: bhojanavidhānaṃ ca yathāsvaṃ yuktyā yac cānyad api kiṃcin nidānaviparītam auṣadhaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2670: kāryaṃ tad api syād iti // Car_2,7.8
GS40caraka_u:2671: bhavati cātra unmādān doṣajān sādhyān sādhayed bhiṣaguttamaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2673: yas tu doṣanimittebhya unmādebhyaḥ samutthānapūrvarūpaliṅgavedanopaśayaviśeṣasamanvito bhavaty unmādas tam āgantukam ācakṣate /
GS40caraka_u:2674: kecit punaḥ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmāpraśastam icchanti tasya nimittam /
GS40caraka_u:2675: tasya ca hetuḥ prajñāparādha eveti bhagavān punarvasur ātreyaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2677: ācarati anyad vā kiṃcid evaṃvidhaṃ karmāpraśastam ārabhate tam ātmanā hatam upaghnanto
GS40caraka_u:2680: devagobrāhmaṇatapasvināṃ hiṃsārucitvaṃ kopanatvaṃ nṛśaṃsābhiprāyatā aratiḥ ojovarṇacchāyāvalavapuṣām
GS40caraka_u:2681: upanaptiḥ svapne ca devādibhir abhibhartsanaṃ pravartanaṃ ceti tato 'nantaram unmādābhinirvṛttiḥ // Car_2,7.11
GS40caraka_u:2682: tatrāyam unmādakarāṇāṃ bhūtānām unmādayiṣyatām ārambhaviśeṣo bhavati tad yathā avalokayanto
GS40caraka_u:2683: devā janayanty unmādaṃ guruvṛddhasiddhamaharṣayo 'bhiśapantaḥ pitaro darśayantaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2684: spṛśanto gandharvāḥ samāviśanto yakṣāḥ rākṣasās tv ātmagandham āghrāpayantaḥ piśācāḥ
GS40caraka_u:2686: tasyemāni rūpāṇi bhavanti tad yathā atyātmabalavīryapauruṣaparākramagrahaṇadhāraṇasmaraṇajñānavacanavijñānāni aniyataś conmādakālaḥ // Car_2,7.13
GS40caraka_u:2688: vā eṣv antareṣv abhigamanīyāḥ puruṣā bhavanti tad yathā pāpasya karmaṇaḥ samārambhe
GS40caraka_u:2689: pūrvakṛtasya vā karmaṇaḥ pariṇāmakāle ekasya vā śūnyagṛhavāse catuṣpathādhiṣṭhāne
GS40caraka_u:2690: vā sandhyāvelāyām aprayatabhāve vā parvasandhiṣu vā mithunībhāve rajasvalābhigamane
GS40caraka_u:2691: vā viguṇe vādhyayanabalimaṅgalahomaprayoge niyamavratabrahmacaryabhaṅge vā mahāhave
GS40caraka_u:2692: vā deśakulapuravināśe vā mahāgrahopagamane vā striyā vā prajananakāle vividhabhūtāśubhāśucisparśane
GS40caraka_u:2693: vā vamanavirecanarudhirasrāve aśucer aprayatasya vā caityadevāyatanābhigamane vā
GS40caraka_u:2695: vā dvijagurusurayatipūjyābhidharṣaṇe vā dharmākhyānavyatikrame vā anyasya vā karmaṇo
GS40caraka_u:2697: trividhaṃ tu khalūnmādakarāṇāṃ bhūtānām unmādane prayojanaṃ bhavati tad yathā hiṃsā ratiḥ abhyarcanaṃ ceti /
GS40caraka_u:2704: nidāne jñātahetvādipañcakasya cikitsopayogitayā doṣabheṣajādiviśeṣajñānam apekṣitaṃ bhavati ato vakṣyamāṇadoṣabheṣajādiviśeṣajñāpakaṃ vimānasthānaṃ brūte // 1
GS40caraka_u:2705: tatrāpi ca doṣabheṣajayoḥ prādhānyāt tadviśeṣajñāpakaṃ rasavimānaṃ prathamaṃ brūte // 2
GS40caraka_u:2707: viśeṣeṇa mīyate jñāyate doṣabheṣajādy aneneti vimānaṃ doṣabheṣajādīnāṃ prabhāvādiviśeṣa ityarthaḥ evaṃbhūtaṃvimānam abhidheyatayā yatra tiṣṭhati tad vimānasthānam // 4
GS40caraka_u:2711: mānam avahitamanasā yathāvaj jñeyaṃ bhavati bhiṣajā doṣādimānajñānāyattatvāt kriyāyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2712: na hy amānajño doṣādīnāṃ bhiṣag vyādhinigrahasamartho bhavati /
GS40caraka_u:2716: iha samprāptibhedasaṃkhyāprādhānyādigrahaṇenaiva samprāptim upadiśan saṃkhyādibhedena sarvaiva samprāptiḥ kathitā bhavatīti darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:2717: nimittādīnāṃ tu na tādṛśo bhedo 'lpagranthavaktavyo 'sti yena bhedena te 'pīha kathyeran ataste sāmānyenaivoktāḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2720: mānamiti prabhāvādiviśeṣaḥ etajjñāne hetum āha doṣādītyādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:2723: te samyagupayujyamānāḥ śarīraṃ yāpayanti mithyopayujyamānāstu khalu doṣaprakopāyopakalpante // Car_3,1.4
GS40caraka_u:2726: yadyapi ca doṣabheṣajetyādau doṣāpekṣatvād bheṣajasya doṣa ādau kṛtaḥ tathāpīha rasadravyarūpabheṣajasyāpekṣitarogapraśamakartṛtvena
GS40caraka_u:2727: tathā doṣasyāpi ca rasadravyayoreva kāraṇatvena bheṣajaśabdasūcite rasadravye evāgre
GS40caraka_u:2729: prakṛṣṭo bhāvaḥ prabhāvaḥ śaktirityarthaḥ sa cehācintyaścintyaś ca grāhyaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2730: yena tatra khalvanekaraseṣu ityādinā dravyavikārayoḥ prabhāvaṃ rasadvārā doṣadvārā ca cintyamapi vakṣyati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2734: te prakṛtibhūtāḥ śarīropakārakā bhavanti vikṛtimāpannāstu khalu nānāvidhair vikāraiḥ śarīram upatāpayanti // Car_3,1.5
GS40caraka_u:2738: tatra doṣamekaikaṃ trayastrayo rasā janayanti trayas trayaś copaśamayanti /
GS40caraka_u:2739: tadyathā kaṭutiktakaṣāyā vātaṃ janayanti madhurāmlalavaṇas tv enaṃ śamayanti kaṭvamlalavaṇāḥ
GS40caraka_u:2740: pittaṃ janayanti madhuratiktakaṣāyās tv enacchamayanti madhurāmlalavaṇāḥ śleṣmāṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2744: anena ca rasakarmopadeśena doṣāṇāmapi tattadrasotpādyatvaṃ tathā tattadrasopaśamanīyatvam uktaṃ bhavati // 2
GS40caraka_u:2745: kaṭutiktakaṣāyā vātaṃ janayantīti asati paripanthinīti jñeyaṃ tenārkāguruguḍūcyādīnāṃ tiktānāmapi vātājanakatve na doṣaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2746: tatra hy uṣṇavīryatā paripanthinī vidyate tena na te vātaṃ janayantītyādy anusaraṇīyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:2747: enam iti padena yaśca kaṭvādijo vāyustameva madhurādayaḥ sarvātmavaiparītyād viśeṣeṇa
GS40caraka_u:2748: śamayantīti darśayati jāgaraṇādije hi vāyau jāgaraṇādiviparītāḥ svapnādaya eva viśeṣeṇa pathyāḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2749: evaṃ pittaśleṣmaṇorapi enadenaṃ śabdayos tātparyaṃ darśayati // 6]
GS40caraka_u:2750: rasadoṣasaṃnipāte tu ye rasā yair doṣaiḥ samānaguṇāḥ samānaguṇabhūyiṣṭhā vā bhavanti te tān abhivardhayanti viparītaguṇā viparītaguṇabhūyiṣṭhā vā śamayantyabhyasyamānā iti /
GS40caraka_u:2751: etadvyavasthāhetoḥ ṣaṭtvam upadiśyate rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ tritvaṃ ca doṣāṇām // Car_3,1.7
GS40caraka_u:2753: atha kayā yuktyā rasā doṣāñjanayanti śamayanti cetyāha rasadoṣetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2755: tuśabdo viśeṣe tena viparītaguṇā eva viśeṣeṇa viparītaguṇabhūyiṣṭhāpekṣayā śamayantīti darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:2756: rasānāṃ tu yathā upācārādguṇā bhavanti tadabhihitaṃ guṇāguṇāśrayā noktāḥ ityādinā sūtre // 4
GS40caraka_u:2758: atha kasmādrasadoṣasaṃsargabhūyastvaṃ parityajya rasaṣaṭtvaṃ doṣatritvaṃ cocyate ityāha ityetadityādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:2761: saṃsargavikalpavistaro hy eṣām aparisaṃkhyeyo bhavati vikalpabhedāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // Car_3,1.8
GS40caraka_u:2764: yasmāt saṃsargabhedavistaro 'parisaṃkhyeyas tasmāt ṣaṭtvaṃ tritvaṃ cocyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:2765: vikalpabhedāparisaṃkhyeyatvād iti saṃsargavikalpasya bhedo vijātīyaprakāraḥ tasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:2766: etena yathā rasānām avāntaravyaktibhede 'pi madhuratvādisāmānyayogān madhurādivyapadeśena
GS40caraka_u:2768: sāmānyopasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā triṣaṣṭitvasaṃkhyāniyamo bhaviṣyatīti nirasyate yato madhurāmlādisaṃsarge
GS40caraka_u:2770: vacanaṃ hi rasās taratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi iti // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2771: tatra khalvanekaraseṣu dravyeṣvanekadoṣātmakeṣu ca vikāreṣu rasadoṣaprabhāvam ekaikaśyenābhisamīkṣya tato dravyavikārayoḥ prabhāvatattvaṃ vyavasyet
GS40caraka_u:2773: atha kathaṃ tarhi saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca prabhāvo jñeya ityāha tatra khalvityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2775: kathayan rasasaṃsargadoṣasaṃsargayor api tādṛśameva prabhāvaṃ kathayati yato rasadoṣasaṃsargaprabhāvāv
GS40caraka_u:2777: anena nyāyena sākṣādanukte'pi ekarasadravyaikadoṣavikārayor api prabhāvo 'saṃsṛṣṭarasadoṣaprabhāvakathanād ukta eva jñeyaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2778: ekaikaśyenābhisamīkṣyeti pratyekam uktarasādiprabhāveṇānekarasaṃ dravyam anekadoṣaṃ ca vikāraṃ samuditaprabhāvam abhisamīkṣya // 4]
GS40caraka_u:2780: na hi vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānāṃ nānātmakānāṃ paraspareṇa copahatānāmanyaiśca vikalpanair
GS40caraka_u:2781: vikalpitānām avayavaprabhāvānumānenaiva samudāyaprabhāvatattvam adhyavasātuṃ śakyam // Car_3,1.10
GS40caraka_u:2783: ayaṃ ca rasadoṣaprabhāvadvārā dravyavikāraprabhāvaniścayo na sarvatra dravye vikāre cetyāha na tv evaṃ khalu sarvatreti // 1
GS40caraka_u:2784: atraiva hetum āha na hītyādinādhyavasātuṃ śakyamityantena // 2
GS40caraka_u:2785: vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām iti vikṛtisamavetānāṃ tathā viṣamasamavetānāṃ ceti vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām // 3
GS40caraka_u:2787: tatra rasasya vikṛtisamavāyo yathā madhure taṇḍulīyake madhuro hi prakṛtyā snehavṛṣyatvādikaraḥ taṇḍulīyake tu vikṛtisamavetatvena tanna karoti
GS40caraka_u:2788: viṣamasamavetāstu tile kaṣāyakaṭutiktamadhurāḥ yadi hīme rasāḥ samayā mātrayā samavetāḥ
GS40caraka_u:2789: syustatastilo'pi pittaśleṣmaharastridoṣaharo vā syāt pittakaphakarastvayaṃ tenātra
GS40caraka_u:2790: rasānāṃ kvacit kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca kvaciditi vaiṣamyam unnīyate // 6
GS40caraka_u:2793: nānātmakānāmiti nānārūpahetujanitānāṃ tena hetubhedabalādeva rasadoṣayor vikṛto viṣamo vā melako bhavatītyarthaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2797: parasparaguṇopaghātastu yadyapi doṣāṇāṃ prāyo nāstyeva tathāpyadṛṣṭavaśāt kvacid bhavatīti jñeyaṃ rasānāṃ tu prabalenānyopaghāto bhavatyeva
GS40caraka_u:2798: anyaiśca vikalpanairiti anyaiśca bhedakaiḥ tatra rasasya bhedakāḥ svarasakalkādayaḥ ekasyaiva hi dravyasya kalpanāviśeṣeṇa guṇāntarāṇi bhavanti
GS40caraka_u:2800: yaduktaṃ sa eva kupito doṣaḥ samutthānaviśeṣataḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:2802: asminvyākhyāne rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca ya utkarṣāpakarṣakṛto viṣamasamavāyaḥ pṛthagucyate
GS40caraka_u:2803: sa na yujyate yato viṣamasamavāye 'pyutkṛṣṭasya rasasya tathā doṣasya cotkṛṣṭā guṇā
GS40caraka_u:2804: apakṛṣṭasya cāpakṛṣṭā guṇā bhavantīti kṛtvāvayavaprabhāvān anumānenaiva samudāyaprabhāvānumānaṃ śakyam // 18
GS40caraka_u:2805: athocyate viṣamamelake rasasya doṣasya ca na ta eva guṇā utkṛṣṭā apakṛṣṭā vā bhavanti kiṃtu guṇāntarameva bhavati hanta tarhi vikṛta evāyaṃ samavāyo visadṛśakāryakāraṇatvāt // 19
GS40caraka_u:2806: tadevaṃ dūṣaṇadarśanād anyathā vyākhyāyate yad dvividho melako bhavati rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2807: ca prakṛtyanuguṇaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaśca tatra yo militānāṃ prākṛtaguṇānupamardena
GS40caraka_u:2808: melako bhavati sa prakṛtisamasamavāyaśabdenocyate yastu prākṛtaguṇopamardena bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2809: sa vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyo 'bhidhīyate vikṛtyā hetubhūtayā viṣamaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2812: ye tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyau pṛthag eva kurvanti viṣamasamavāyasya vaiṣamyatāratamyenātibahuprapañcitatvād
GS40caraka_u:2813: viṣamāvayavaguṇānumānaṃ duḥśakam iti kṛtvā tadapi dravyavikāraprabhāveṇaiva vyapadiśanti // 22]
GS40caraka_u:2814: tathāyukte hi samudaye samudāyaprabhāvatattvamevam evopalabhya tato dravyavikāraprabhāvatattvaṃ vyavasyet // Car_3,1.11
GS40caraka_u:2816: atha kathaṃ tarhi vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyaprabhāvajñānam ityāha tathāyukte hītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2819: samadhṛte hi madhusarpiṣi sūryāvartākhye vā doṣasamudaye na saṃyujyamānamadhughṛtaguṇakramāgataṃ
GS40caraka_u:2820: mārakatvaṃ na ca vātādidoṣaprabhāvagataṃ sūryavṛddhyā vardhiṣṇutvaṃ sūryāvartasya
GS40caraka_u:2822: yacca gatidvayaṃ doṣarasamelakasya tena prakṛtisamasamavāyarūpaṃ saṃnipātaṃ jvaranidāne doṣaliṅgamelakenaivoktavān // 5
GS40caraka_u:2823: yaduktaṃ pṛthaguktalakṣaṇasaṃsargād dvāṃdvikam anyatamaṃ sāṃnipātikaṃ vā jvaraṃ vidyād iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:2824: yastu vikṛtiviṣamasamavetastridoṣakṛto jvaras tasya cikitsite kṣaṇe dāhaḥ kṣaṇe śītam ityādinā lakṣaṇam uktam // 7
GS40caraka_u:2825: na hi śyāvaraktakoṭhotpattyādi tatroktaṃ vātādijvare kvacid asti // 8
GS40caraka_u:2826: evaṃ rase'pi yatrāmrāte madhuratvaṃ prakṛtisamasamavetaṃ tatrāmrātaṃ madhuram etanmātram evoktaṃ tena madhurasāmānyaguṇāgataṃ tasya vātapittaharatvamapi labhyata eva // 9
GS40caraka_u:2827: yatra vārtāke kaṭutiktatvena vātakaratvaṃ prāptamapi ca vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyāttanna bhavati tatrācāryeṇa vārtākaṃ vātaghnam ityuktam eva // 10
GS40caraka_u:2829: yattu prakṛtisamasamavāyakṛtarasadoṣaguṇadvārā prāptamapi dravyaguṇaṃ vikāralakṣaṇaṃ ca brūte tat prakarṣārthaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ ceti jñeyam // 12]
GS40caraka_u:2830: tasmād rasaprabhāvataś ca dravyaprabhāvataś ca doṣaprabhāvataś ca vikāraprabhāvataś ca tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_3,1.12
GS40caraka_u:2834: yattu pūrvaṃ tatrādau rasadravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvān upadekṣyāmaḥ ityanena rasādiprabhāvavyākhyānapratijñānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2835: kṛtaṃ tattu rasaprabhāvānumānenaiva dravyaprabhāvakathanāt tathā doṣaprabhāveṇa ca
GS40caraka_u:2837: iha tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyātmake dravye vikāre vā rasadoṣaprabhāvānumānena na dravyavikāraprabhāvānumānam
GS40caraka_u:2838: astīti kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthagrasādiprabhāvatattvābhidhānapratijñānam iti na paunaruktyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:2839: iha dravyāṇāṃ vīryaprabhāvavipākaprabhāvau ca dravyaprabhāve rasaprabhāve vāntarbhāvanīyau // 5
GS40caraka_u:2840: tatra yau rasānuguṇau vīryavipākaprabhāvau tau rase yau tu rasakramoktavīryavipākaviparītau vīryavipākau tau dravyaprabhāve boddhavyau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2841: upadekṣyāma iti nikhilena tantreṇa rasādiprabhāvatattvaṃ pṛthag upadekṣyāma ityarthaḥ rasādiprabhāvaḥ prapañcena nikhile tantra eva vaktavyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2847: eṣa iti rasāḥ ṣaḍ ityādinā tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ ityantena granthenokta ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2849: anye tu tatraiṣa rasaprabhāva uddiṣṭo bhavati iti paṭhanti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2850: asmin pakṣe dravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvo 'pi 'tra uddiṣṭaḥ so 'pi rasadvārā tena rasasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:2851: prapañcābhihitatvāt tasyaivābhidhānam upasaṃharati na dravyādīnāmiti jñeyam dravyaprabhāvamityādau
GS40caraka_u:2852: punariti sāmānyena dravyaprabhāvakathanāt punaḥ śṛṅgagrāhikayā tailādidravyaprabhāvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2855: tatra tailaṃ snehauṣṇyagauravopapannatvād vātaṃ jayati satatamabhyasyamānaṃ vāto
GS40caraka_u:2856: hi raukṣyaśaityalāghavopapanno viruddhaguṇo bhavati viruddhaguṇasaṃnipāte hi bhūyasālpam
GS40caraka_u:2857: avajīyate tasmāttailaṃ vātaṃ jayati satatam abhyasyamānam /
GS40caraka_u:2858: sarpiḥ khalvevameva pittaṃ jayati mādhuryācchaityānmandatvācca pittaṃ hy amadhuram uṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca /
GS40caraka_u:2859: madhu ca śleṣmāṇaṃ jayati raukṣyāt taikṣṇyāt kaṣāyatvāc ca śleṣmā hi snigdho mando madhuraśca /
GS40caraka_u:2860: yac cānyadapi kiṃcid dravyamevaṃ vātapittakaphebhyo guṇato viparītaṃ syāt tac caitāñjayaty abhyasyamānam // Car_3,1.14
GS40caraka_u:2865: nanu viruddhaguṇayor madhye bhūyasālpaṃ jīyate tat kathaṃ tailaṃ vātaṃ jayati na hy asya vātaṃ prati bhūyastvaṃ yuktamityāha satatam abhyasyamānam iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2866: satatopayogena hi tailaṃ vātād adhikaṃ bhavati tena vātaṃ jayatītyarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2867: sarpiḥ khalvevameveti sarpirapi satatam abhyasyamānam ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2869: iha ca prabhāvaśabdena sāmānyena dravyaśaktir ucyate nācintyaśaktiḥ tena tailādīnāṃ snehauṣṇyādiguṇādapi vātādiśamanaṃ dravyaprabhāvādeva bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2870: sarpiṣi ca yadyapi madhuro rasaḥ pittapraśame vyāpriyate tathāpi mādhuryaśaityamandatvaiḥ pittaśamanaṃ sarpiḥkāryameva tena dravyaprabhāva eva vācyaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2871: yadā tu rasadvārā kāryaṃ dravyasya cintyate tadā rasaprabhāva iti vyapadeśo bhavati // 10
GS40caraka_u:2872: evaṃ kaṣāyānurase madhuni ca samādhānaṃ vācyam // 11
GS40caraka_u:2873: anye tu bruvate yattailādīnāṃ vātādiśamanatvaṃ pratyacintya eva prabhāvo 'yamucyate
GS40caraka_u:2874: tatra ca tailavātayor viruddhaguṇayor melake tailameva vātaṃ jayati na tu vātas tailam
GS40caraka_u:2875: iti tailasyācintyaprabhāvaḥ evaṃ sarpirmadhunor api pittaśleṣmaharaṇe prabhāvājjñeye // 12
GS40caraka_u:2876: etaccānye necchanti yatas tailādīnāṃ satatam abhyasyamānamiti padenādhikyameva vātādijayakāraṇamuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2877: tathā yaccānyad api kiṃcid dravyam ityādigranthena dravyācintyaprabhāvaṃ parityajya
GS40caraka_u:2879: atha khalu trīṇi dravyāṇi nātyupayuñjītādhikam anyebhyo dravyebhyaḥ tadyathāpippalī kṣāraḥ lavaṇamiti // Car_3,1.15
GS40caraka_u:2882: adhikamanyebhya iti vacanādanyadapi citrakabhallātakādyevaṃjātīyaṃ nātyupayoktavyaṃ pippalyādidravyaṃ tv anyebhyo 'pyadhikam atyupayoge varjanīyamiti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2883: pippalyo hi kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākā gurvyo nātyarthaṃ snigdhoṣṇāḥ prakledinyo
GS40caraka_u:2884: bheṣajābhimatāś ca tāḥ sadyaḥ śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavanti āpātabhadrāḥ prayogasamasādguṇyāt
GS40caraka_u:2885: doṣasaṃcayānubandhāḥ satatam upayujyamānā hi guruprakleditvācchleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti
GS40caraka_u:2886: auṣṇyāt pittaṃ na ca vātapraśamanāyopakalpante 'lpasnehoṣṇabhāvāt yogavāhinyastu
GS40caraka_u:2889: kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākāḥ ityādi pippalīguṇakathanam anabhyāsaprayoge doṣavaiparītyena
GS40caraka_u:2894: śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavantīti sadyaḥ śubhakāriṇyaḥ atyabhyāsaprayoge tv aśubhakāriṇyaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:2896: prayogasamasādguṇyād iti samasya prayogasya sadguṇatvāt same 'lpakāle alpamātre ca pippalyādiprayoge sadguṇā bhavantītyarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2899: pippalīdharmakathanaprastāvād guṇāntaram āha yogavāhinyas tv ityādi // 9
GS40caraka_u:2900: yogavāhitvena kaṭukānāmapi pippalīnāṃ vṛṣyaprayogeṣu yogaḥ tathā jvaragulmakuṣṭhaharādiprayogeṣu jvarādīn hanti pippalī // 10
GS40caraka_u:2902: tena pippalīrasāyanaprayogas tathā gulmādiṣu ca pippalīvardhamānakaprayogo na virodham āvahati // 12
GS40caraka_u:2903: ukte hi viṣaye yathoktavidhānena nirdoṣā eva pippalya iti ṛṣivacanād unnīyate /
GS40caraka_u:2904: anye tu annasaṃskaraṇe pippalyādīnām atiprayogo na tu svātantryeṇeti bruvate /
GS40caraka_u:2905: satatamupayujyamānā iti atimātratvena tathā satataprayogeṇa ceti jñeyam // 13]
GS40caraka_u:2906: kṣāraḥ punar auṣṇyataikṣṇyalāghavopapannaḥ kledayatyādau paścādviśoṣayati sa pacanadahanabhedanārtham upayujyate so 'tiprayujyamānaḥ keśākṣihṛdayapuṃstvopaghātakaraḥ saṃpadyate /
GS40caraka_u:2907: ye hy enaṃ grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate ta āndhyaṣāṇḍhyakhālityapālityabhājo
GS40caraka_u:2908: hṛdayāpakartinaśca bhavanti tadyathā prācyāś cīnāśca tasmātkṣāraṃ nātyupayuñjīta // Car_3,1.17
GS40caraka_u:2911: lavaṇaṃ punarauṣṇyataikṣṇyopapannam anatiguru anatisnigdham upakledi visraṃsanasamartham
GS40caraka_u:2912: annadravyarucikaram āpātabhadraṃ prayogasamasādguṇyāt doṣasaṃcayānubandhaṃ tad rocanapācanopakledanavisraṃsanārtham upayujyate /
GS40caraka_u:2913: tad atyartham upayujyamānaṃ glāniśaithilyadaurbalyābhinirvṛttikaraṃ śarīrasya bhavati /
GS40caraka_u:2914: ye hy enad grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatamupayuñjate te bhūyiṣṭhaṃ glāsnavaḥ śithilamāṃsaśoṇitā aparikleśasahāś ca bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2915: tadyathā vāhlīkasaurāṣṭrikasaindhavasauvīrakāḥ te hi payasāpi saha lavaṇam aśnanti /
GS40caraka_u:2916: ye 'pīha bhūmer atyūṣarā deśāsteṣvoṣadhivīrudvanaspativānaspatyā na jāyante'lpatejaso vā bhavanti lavaṇopahatatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:2918: ye hy atilavaṇasātmyāḥ puruṣāsteṣāmapi khālityapālityāni valayaścākāle bhavanti // Car_3,1.18
GS40caraka_u:2921: na kevalaṃ lavaṇātiyogaḥ śarīropaghātakaraḥ kiṃtu bhūmer apyupaghātakara ityāha ye 'pīhetyādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:2923: lavaṇaṃ nātyupayuñjīteti nātimātraṃ lavaṇaṃ satatam upayuñjīta annadravyasaṃskārakaṃ tu stokamātram abhyāsenāpyupayojanīyam eva // 4
GS40caraka_u:2924: vāhlīkādivyatirikte 'pi deśe ye 'tilavaṇam aśnanti teṣāmapi doṣānāha ye hītyādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:2925: etena cānyatrāpi deśe 'timātralavaṇasātmyānāṃ lavaṇātyupayogakṛta eva śaithilyādidoṣa unnīyate na deśasvabhāvakṛtaḥ // 6]
GS40caraka_u:2927: sātmyamapi hi krameṇopanivartyamānam adoṣam alpadoṣaṃ vā bhavati // Car_3,1.19
GS40caraka_u:2930: tatsātmyata iti atimātrakṣārād atimātralavaṇāc ca sātmyāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:2933: alpadoṣam adoṣaṃ veti pakṣadvaye 'tyarthasātmyam alpadoṣaṃ bhavati anyattvadoṣam iti vyavasthā // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2934: sātmyaṃ nāma tad yad ātmanyupaśete sātmyārtho hy upaśayārthaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2935: tattrividhaṃ pravarāvaramadhyavibhāgena saptavidhaṃ tu rasaikaikatvena sarvarasopayogācca /
GS40caraka_u:2936: tatra sarvarasaṃ pravaram avaramekarasaṃ madhyaṃ tu pravarāvaramadhyastham /
GS40caraka_u:2937: tatrāvaramadhyābhyāṃ sātmyābhyāṃ krameṇaiva pravaram upapādayet sātmyam /
GS40caraka_u:2938: sarvarasamapi ca sātmyam upapannaḥ prakṛtyādyupayoktraṣṭamāni sarvāṇyāhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanānyabhisamīkṣya hitam evānurudhyeta // Car_3,1.20
GS40caraka_u:2945: saptavidhaṃ tu ekaikarasena ṣaṭ saṃsṛṣṭarasopayogāccaikam evaṃ saptavidham // 6
GS40caraka_u:2952: upapāditasarvarasasātmyenāpi cāhāraḥ praśastaprakṛtyādisampanna eva kartavya ityāha sarvarasam ityādi // 13
GS40caraka_u:2954: hitameveti padena yadeva prakṛtyādinā hitaṃ tad evānurudhyeta sevetetyarthaḥ // 15]
GS40caraka_u:2955: tatra khalvimānyaṣṭāv āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni bhavanti tadyathā prakṛtikaraṇasaṃyogarāśideśakālopayogasaṃsthopayoktraṣṭamāni bhavanti // Car_3,1.21
GS40caraka_u:2957: āhārasya vidhiḥ prakāro vidhānaṃ vā ityāhāravidhiḥ tasya viśeṣo hitatvamahitatvaṃ ca tasyāyatanāni hetūn ity āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni // 1
GS40caraka_u:2960: tatra prakṛtir ucyate svabhāvo yaḥ sa punarāhārauṣadhadravyāṇāṃ svābhāviko gurvādiguṇayogaḥ tadyathā maṣamudgayoḥ śūkaraiṇayośca /
GS40caraka_u:2964: māṣamudgayor iti prakṛtyā māṣe gurutvaṃ mudge ca laghutvaṃ śūkare gurutvam eṇe ca laghutvam // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2969: dravyāṇām iti vaktavye svābhāvikānām iti yat karoti tenotpattikāle janakabhūtaiḥ svaguṇāropaṇaṃ saṃskārastūtpannasyaiva toyādinā guṇāntarādhānamiti darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2970: tacca prākṛtaguṇopamardenaiva kriyate yathā toyāgnisaṃnikarṣaśaucais taṇḍulasthaṃ gauravam upahatya lāghavam anne kriyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:2971: yaduktaṃ sudhautaḥ prasrutaḥ svinnaḥ saṃtaptaś caudano laghuḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2973: manthanādguṇādhānaṃ yathā śothakṛd dadhi śothaghnaṃ sasnehamapi manthanāt iti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2974: deśena yathā bhasmarāśer adhaḥ sthāpayet ityādau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2976: bhāvanayā ca svarasādikṛtayā sthitasyaivāmalakāder guṇasyotkarṣo bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:2978: bhājanena yathā traiphalenāyasīṃ pātrīṃ kalkenālepayet ityādau // 10
GS40caraka_u:2980: nanu saṃskārādheyena guṇena kathaṃ svābhāvikaguṇanāśaḥ kriyate yataḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2981: ityuktaṃ yadi hi saṃskāreṇa svābhāvikagurutvaṃ pratikriyate tadā svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2982: iti kathaṃ brūmaḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ iti svabhāvo bhāvānām utpattau nānyathā kriyate // 12
GS40caraka_u:2983: tena jātipratibaddhaṃ māṣādīnāṃ gurutvaṃ na tajjātau sphoṭayituṃ pāryate saṃskāreṇa tu tadanyathākaraṇamanumatameva dṛṣṭatvāt // 13
GS40caraka_u:2984: kaścit tu guṇo dravyāṇāṃ saṃskārādināpi nānyathā kriyate yathā vahner auṣṇyaṃ vāyoścalatvaṃ tailasya sneha ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:2987: uktaṃ hi guṇo dravyavināśād vā vināśam upagacchati // 17
GS40caraka_u:2989: yatra tu saṃskāreṇa vrīherlājalakṣaṇaṃ dravyāntarameva janyate tatra guṇāntarotpādaḥ suṣṭhveva // 19]
GS40caraka_u:2990: saṃyogaḥ punar dvayor bahūnāṃ vā dravyāṇāṃ saṃhatībhāvaḥ sa viśeṣamārabhate yaṃ punar naikaikaśo dravyāṇyārabhante tad yathā madhusarpiṣoḥ madhumatsyapayasāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2993: sa viśeṣamārabhata iti saṃyujyamānadravyaikadeśe 'dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam ārabhata ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2994: yaṃ naikaikaśa iti yaṃ viśeṣaṃ pratyekasaṃyujyamānāni dravyāṇi nārabhanta ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2995: madhusarpiṣī hi pratyekamamārake milite tu mārake bhavataḥ kṣīramatsyādisaṃyogaśca kuṣṭhādikaro bhavati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2996: saṃyogas tv iha prādhānyenaivopalabhyamānadravyamelako vivakṣitas tena bhāvanādiṣvapi
GS40caraka_u:2997: yadyapi saṃyogo 'sti tathāpi tatra bhāvanādravyāṇāṃ prādhānyenānupalabdher na saṃyogena grahaṇam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2999: tatra sarvasyāhārasya pramāṇagrahaṇam ekapiṇḍena sarvagrahaḥ parigrahaḥ punaḥ pramāṇagrahaṇam ekaikaśyenāhāradravyāṇām /
GS40caraka_u:3000: sarvasya hi grahaḥ sarvagrahaḥ sarvataśca grahaḥ parigraha ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:3003: mātrāmātraphalaviniścayārtha iti mātrāvadāhārauṣadhasya ca yat phalaṃ śubham amātrasya hīnasyātiriktasya vā yat phalam aśubham // 2
GS40caraka_u:3004: yaduktaṃ tasya jñānārtham ucitapramāṇam anucitapramāṇaṃ ca rāśisaṃjñaṃ bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:3008: ekaikaśyeneti annasya kuḍavaḥ sūpasya palaṃ māṃsasya dvipalamityādyavayavamānapūrvakaṃ samudāyamānam // 7
GS40caraka_u:3009: sarvagrahe pratyavayavamānaniyamo nāsti tena yena kenacid āhāreṇa pratyekamaniyatamānena sampūrṇāhāramātrāniyamanaṃ sarvagrahaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:3012: deśaḥ punaḥ sthānaṃ sa dravyāṇāmutpattipracārau deśasātmyaṃ cācaṣṭe /
GS40caraka_u:3017: tatrotpattyā himavati jātaṃ guṇavadbhavati marau jātaṃ laghu bhavati ityādi // 4
GS40caraka_u:3018: pracāreṇa laghu bhakṣyāṇāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā dhanvapracāriṇāṃ bahukriyāṇāṃ ca lāghavaṃ viparyaye ca gauravaṃ gṛhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:3019: deśasāmyena ca deśaviparītaguṇaṃ sātmyaṃ gṛhyate yathānūpe uṣṇarūkṣādi dhanvani ca śītasnigdhādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:3021: kālo hi nityagaś cāvasthikaśca tatrāvasthiko vikāramapekṣate nityagastu ṛtusātmyāpekṣaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3025: vikāramapekṣata iti bālyādikṛtaṃ tu śleṣmavikāraṃ jvarādikaṃ cāhāraniyamārthamapekṣata ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:3029: evamāhāropayogaḥ kartavya evaṃ na kartavya ityupayoganiyamaḥ sa jīrṇalakṣaṇāpekṣa iti prādhānyenoktaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:3030: teneha ajalpann ahasan nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ityādyupayoganiyamamapyapekṣata eva ajīrṇabhojane tu mahāṃstridoṣakopalakṣaṇo doṣo bhavatītyayam evodāhṛtaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:3034: yadāyattam okasātmyam iti bhoktṛpuruṣāpekṣaṃ hy abhyāsasātmyaṃ bhavati kasyaciddhi kiṃcid evābhyāsāt pathyamapathyaṃ vā sātmyaṃ bhavati // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3035: eṣāṃ viśeṣāḥ śubhāśubhaphalāḥ parasparopakārakā bhavanti tān bubhutseta buddhvā ca
GS40caraka_u:3036: hitepsureva syāt na ca mohāt pramādādvā priyam ahitam asukhodarkam upasevyam āhārajātam
GS40caraka_u:3039: eṣāmityādau śubhaphalā viśeṣā aśubhaphalāśca parasparopakārakā bhavantīti jñeyam // 1
GS40caraka_u:3040: tatra prakṛtyā lāghavādiḥ śubhaphalaḥ gurvādiś cāśubhaphalaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:3043: evaṃ kālāsātmyamaśubhaphalaṃ cājīrṇabhojanādi tathā okāsātmyaṃ cāśubhamaśubhaphalamiti jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ tu śubhaphalam // 5
GS40caraka_u:3044: mohāditi ajñānāt pramādāditi jñātvāpi rāgād ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:3047: asukhaṃ duḥkharūpam udarka uttarakālīnaṃ phalaṃ yasya sa tathā // 9
GS40caraka_u:3050: bhuñjānānāṃ bhavati uṣṇaṃ snigdhaṃ mātrāvat jīrṇe vīryāviruddham iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3051: nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ajalpan ahasan tanmanā bhuñjīta ātmānamabhisamīkṣya samyak // Car_3,1.24
GS40caraka_u:3055: āturāṇāṃ ca keṣāṃciditi padena raktapittināṃ śītameva kapharogiṇāṃ rūkṣameva hitamityādiviparyayaṃ darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:3056: keṣāṃcidbhuñjānānām idam āhāravidhividhānaṃ hitatamaṃ bhavatīti yojanā // 4
GS40caraka_u:3057: prakṛtyaiveti svabhāvenaiva hitatamaṃ hitatamam ityuktaṃ tena yat prakṛtyā hitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3058: tat kadācideva kaṃcideva puruṣam āsādyāhitaṃ bhavati tacca kādācitkatvād anādṛtaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3059: tena prāyikatvādenaṃ hitatamaṃ vakṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:3061: tasya sādguṇyam upadekṣyāma uṣṇam aśnīyād uṣṇaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cāgnim
GS40caraka_u:3062: audaryam udīrayati kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati vātam anulomayati śleṣmāṇaṃ ca parihrāsayati
GS40caraka_u:3064: snigdhamaśnīyāt snigdhaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cānudīrṇam agnim udīrayati
GS40caraka_u:3065: kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati vātamanulomayati śarīramupacinoti dṛḍhīkarotīndriyāṇi balābhivṛddhim
GS40caraka_u:3071: mātrāvadaśnīyāt mātrāvaddhi bhuktaṃ vātapittakaphān apīḍayad āyur eva vivardhayati
GS40caraka_u:3072: kevalaṃ sukhaṃ gudam anuparyeti na coṣmāṇamupahanti avyathaṃ ca paripākameti tasmānmātrāvad aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3074: mātrāvaditi praśaṃsāyāṃ matup tena praśastamātram ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:3075: apīḍayaditi anatimātratvena svasthānasthitaṃ sadvātādīn sthānāpīḍanād aprakopayat // 2
GS40caraka_u:3078: jīrṇe 'śnīyāt ajīrṇe hi bhuñjānasyābhyavahṛtam āhārajātaṃ pūrvasyāhārasya rasam apariṇatam
GS40caraka_u:3079: uttareṇāhārarasenopasṛjat sarvān doṣān prakopayatyāśu jīrṇe tu bhuñjānasya svasthānastheṣu
GS40caraka_u:3080: doṣeṣvagnau codīrṇe jātāyāṃ ca bubhukṣāyāṃ vivṛteṣu ca srotasāṃ mukheṣu viśuddhe
GS40caraka_u:3081: codgāre hṛdaye viśuddhe vātānulomye visṛṣṭeṣu ca vātamūtrapurīṣavegeṣvabhyavahṛtam
GS40caraka_u:3082: āhārajātaṃ sarvaśarīradhātūn apradūṣayad āyur evābhivardhayati kevalaṃ tasmājjīrṇe 'śnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3086: āhāraraseneti āhārapariṇāmagatena madhurādinā kiṃvā āhārajena rasena // 3
GS40caraka_u:3088: vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt aviruddhavīryam aśnan hi viruddhavīryāhārajairvikārair nopasṛjyate tasmād vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3091: iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt iṣṭe hi deśe bhuñjāno nāniṣṭadeśajairmanovighātakarair
GS40caraka_u:3092: bhāvair manovighātaṃ prāpnoti tathaiveṣṭaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ tasmādiṣṭe deśe tatheṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3094: manovighātakarairbhāvairiti trividhakukṣīye vakṣyamāṇaiḥ kāmādibhiś cittopatāpakaraiś cittavikārair ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:3095: tatheṣṭaiśca sarvopakaraṇair bhuñjāno manovighātaṃ na prāpnotīti yojanā aniṣṭabhojanāder manovighāto bhavati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:3096: nātidrutamaśnīyāt atidrutaṃ hi bhuñjānasyotsnehanamavasādanaṃ bhojanasyāpratiṣṭhānaṃ ca bhojyadoṣasādguṇyopalabdhiś ca na niyatā tasmānnātidrutam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3101: bhojyagatānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ keśādīnāṃ sādguṇyasya ca svādutvādeḥ upalabdhir na niyatā bhavati kadācidupalabhyate kadācin neti // 4
GS40caraka_u:3102: tatra doṣānupalabdhyā sadoṣasyaiva bhakṣaṇaṃ sādguṇyānupalabdhyā ca prītyabhāvaḥ // 5]
GS40caraka_u:3103: nātivilambitam aśnīyāt ativilambitaṃ hi bhuñjāno na tṛptim adhigacchati bahu bhuṅkte śītībhavaty āhārajātaṃ viṣamaṃ ca pacyate tasmānnātivilambitam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:3105: viṣamaṃ ca pacyata iti cirakālabhojanenāgnisambandhasya vaiṣamyāditi bhāvaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3106: ajalpannahasan tanmanā jalpato hasato 'nyamanasa vā bhuñjānasya ta eva hi doṣā bhavanti ya evātidrutam aśnataḥ tasmād ajalpannahasaṃstanmanā bhuñjīta /
GS40caraka_u:3108: ya evātidrutam aśnato doṣā iti utsnehanādayaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3109: ātmānam abhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyag idaṃ mamopaśete idaṃ nopaśeta ityevaṃ viditaṃ hy asyātmana ātmasātmyaṃ bhavati tasmādātmānamabhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyagiti // Car_3,1.25
GS40caraka_u:3111: nopaśeta itītyatra itiśabdena sātmyāsātmyavidhānopadarśakena vicāraphalamokasātmyasevanaṃ darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:3112: ātmana iti padenātmanaivātmasātmyaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ jñāyate na śāstropadeśeneti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:3114: veda yo deśakālau ca śarīraṃ ca sa no bhiṣak // Car_3,1.26
GS40caraka_u:3117: sa no bhiṣagiti no 'smākaṃ saṃmata ityarthaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3119: dravyāṇi nātisevyāni trividhaṃ sātmyameva ca // Car_3,1.27
GS40caraka_u:3122: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte vimānasthāne rasavimānaṃ nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_3,1.29
GS40caraka_u:3124: doṣavikārau ca yadyapi trividhakukṣīye prabhāvavistāreṇa vaktavyau tathāpīha saṃkṣepeṇoktāv eva tena doṣavikāraprabhāvāv apyuktāv iti yaducyate saṃgrahe tat sādhu // 1
GS40caraka_u:3125: tailādidravyatrayakathanaṃ ca dravyaprabhāvagṛhītamiti kṛtvā na pṛthak saṃgrahe paṭhitam // 2] ***************************************************************
GS40caraka_u:3129: iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ // Car_5,1.2
GS40caraka_u:3131: puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ kasmāt prabhavaḥ puruṣasya kaḥ // Car_5,1.3
GS40caraka_u:3132: kim ajño jñaḥ sa nityaḥ kiṃ kim anityo nidarśitaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3133: prakṛtiḥ kā vikārāḥ ke kiṃ liṅgaṃ puruṣasya ca // Car_5,1.4
GS40caraka_u:3134: niṣkriyaṃ ca svatantraṃ ca vaśinaṃ sarvagaṃ vibhum /
GS40caraka_u:3135: vadanty ātmānam ātmajñāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā // Car_5,1.5
GS40caraka_u:3136: niṣkriyasya kriyā tasya bhagavan vidyate katham /
GS40caraka_u:3137: svatantraś ced aniṣṭāsu kathaṃ yoniṣu jāyate // Car_5,1.6
GS40caraka_u:3138: vaśī yady asukhaiḥ kasmād bhāvair ākramyate balāt /
GS40caraka_u:3139: sarvāḥ sarvagatatvāc ca vedanāḥ kiṃ na vetti saḥ // Car_5,1.7
GS40caraka_u:3141: kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetram athavā kiṃ pūrvam iti saṃśayaḥ // Car_5,1.8
GS40caraka_u:3142: jñeyaṃ kṣetraṃ vinā pūrvaṃ kṣetrajño hi na yujyate /
GS40caraka_u:3143: kṣetraṃ ca yadi pūrvaṃ syāt kṣetrajñaḥ syād aśāśvataḥ // Car_5,1.9
GS40caraka_u:3144: sākṣibhūtaś ca kasyāyaṃ kartā hy anyo na vidyate /
GS40caraka_u:3145: syāt kathaṃ cāvikārasya viśeṣo vedanākṛtaḥ // Car_5,1.10
GS40caraka_u:3146: atha cārtasya bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ kāṃ cikitsati /
GS40caraka_u:3147: atītāṃ vedanāṃ vaidyo vartamānāṃ bhaviṣyatīm // Car_5,1.11
GS40caraka_u:3149: sāṃpratikyā api sthānaṃ nāsty arteḥ saṃśayo hy ataḥ // Car_5,1.12
GS40caraka_u:3150: kāraṇaṃ vedanānāṃ kiṃ kim adhiṣṭhānam ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:3151: kva caitā vedanāḥ sarvā nivṛttiṃ yānty aśeṣataḥ // Car_5,1.13
GS40caraka_u:3153: ekaḥ praśānto bhūtātmā kair liṅgair upalabhyate // Car_5,1.14
GS40caraka_u:3154: ity agniveśasya vacaḥ śrutvā matimatāṃ varaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3155: sarvaṃ yathāvat provāca praśāntātmā punarvasuḥ // Car_5,1.15
GS40caraka_u:3157: cetanādhātur apy ekaḥ smṛtaḥ puruṣasaṃjñakaḥ // Car_5,1.16
GS40caraka_u:3159: mano daśendriyāṇy arthāḥ prakṛtiś cāṣṭadhātukī // Car_5,1.17
GS40caraka_u:3160: lakṣaṇaṃ manaso jñānasyābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:3161: sati hy ātmendriyārthānāṃ sannikarṣe na vartate // Car_5,1.18
GS40caraka_u:3162: vaivṛttyān manaso jñānaṃ sānnidhyāt tac ca vartate /
GS40caraka_u:3163: aṇutvam atha caikatvaṃ dvau guṇau manasaḥ smṛtau // Car_5,1.19
GS40caraka_u:3164: cintyaṃ vicāryam ūhyaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ saṃkalpyam eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:3165: yat kiṃcin manaso jñeyaṃ tat sarvaṃ hy arthasaṃjñakam // Car_5,1.20
GS40caraka_u:3167: ūho vicāraś ca tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.21
GS40caraka_u:3170: cintyaṃ kartavyatayā akartavyatayā vā yanmanasā cintyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:3172: ūhyaṃ ca yat sambhāvanayā ūhyate evametadbhaviṣyati iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:3177: ete ca mano'rthāḥ śabdādirūpā eva tena ṣaṣṭhārthakalpanayā na caturviṃśatisaṃkhyātirekaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:3178: sukhādayas tu śabdādivyatiriktā mano'rthā buddhibhedagrahaṇenaiva grāhyāḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:3180: indriyābhigrahaḥ indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ manasaḥ karma tathā svasya nigraho manasaḥ karma
GS40caraka_u:3181: mano hy aniṣṭaviṣayaprasṛtaṃ manasaiva niyamyate manaśca guṇāntarayuktaṃ sadviṣayāntarān
GS40caraka_u:3184: niyantum ahitād arthād dhṛtirhi niyamātmikā iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:3185: tena dhṛtyā kāraṇabhūtayā ātmānaṃ niyamayatīti na svātmani kriyāvirodhaḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:3187: atroha ālocanajñānaṃ nirvikalpakam vicāro heyopādeyatayā vikalpanam // 17
GS40caraka_u:3188: caturvidhaṃ hi vikalpakāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyā manyante tatra bāhyam indriyarūpam ābhyantaraṃ tu mano'haṃkāro buddhiśceti tritayam // 18
GS40caraka_u:3189: tatrendriyāṇyālocayanti nirvikalpena gṛhṇantītyarthaḥ manastu saṃkalpayati heyopādeyatayā
GS40caraka_u:3190: kalpayatītyarthaḥ ahaṃkāro 'bhimanyate mamedamahamatrādhikṛta iti manyata ityarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:3191: buddhir adhyavasyati tyajāmyenaṃ doṣavantam upādadāmyenaṃ guṇavantam ityadhyavasāyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3193: ūhas tu yadyapi bāhyacakṣurādikarma tathāpi tatrāpi mano'dhiṣṭhānam astīti manaḥkarmatayoktaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:3194: vacanaṃ hi sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt // 21
GS40caraka_u:3195: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi iti // 22
GS40caraka_u:3196: tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartata iti ūhavicārānantaraṃ buddhir adhyavasāyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ // 23
GS40caraka_u:3197: ahaṃkāravyāpāraś cābhimananam ihānukto 'pi buddhivyāpāreṇaiva sūcito jñeyaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:3198: buddhirhi tyajāmyenamupādadāmīti vādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatī ahaṃkārābhimata eva viṣaye bhavati tena buddhivyāpāreṇaivāhaṃkāravyāpāro 'pi gṛhyate
GS40caraka_u:3203: kalpyate manasā tūrdhvaṃ guṇato doṣato'thavā // Car_5,1.22
GS40caraka_u:3205: vyavasyati tayā vaktuṃ kartuṃ vā buddhipūrvakam // Car_5,1.23
GS40caraka_u:3214: vyavasyatīti anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti udyukto bhavatītyarthaḥ buddhyadhyavasitamarthaṃ vaktuṃ kartuṃ vānutiṣṭhatīti yāvat // 8
GS40caraka_u:3215: buddhipūrvakamityanena yadeva buddhipūrvakam anuṣṭhānaṃ tad evaivaṃvidhaṃ bhavati nonmattādyanuṣṭhānamiti darśayati // 9]
GS40caraka_u:3217: pañca karmānumeyāni yebhyo buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.24
GS40caraka_u:3219: mano'bhidhāyendriyāṇyabhidhatte tatrāpi jyāyastvād buddhīndriyāṇi prāgāha ekaiketyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:3220: khādīnāṃ madhye ekaikenādhikena bhūtena yuktānīndriyāṇi pañca cakṣurādīni ekaikādhikapadena pañcāpi pāñcabhautikāni paraṃ cakṣuṣi tejo'dhikamityādyuktaṃ sūcayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:3222: yebhyo buddhiḥ pravartata iti yāni buddhīndriyāṇi tānīmāni pañceti darśayati // 4
GS40caraka_u:3223: yadyapi ca sāṃkhye āhaṃkārikāṇīndriyāṇi yaduktaṃ sāttvika ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtād
GS40caraka_u:3224: ahaṃkārād iti tathāpi matabhedādbhautikatvam indriyāṇāṃ jñeyaṃ kiṃvā aupacārikam
GS40caraka_u:3225: etadbhautikatvam indriyāṇāṃ jñeyam upacārabījaṃ ca yad guṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ yad indriyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3226: gṛhṇāti tattadbhūyiṣṭham ityucyate cakṣustejo gṛhṇāti tena taijasam ucyate ityādi jñeyam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:3230: jihvāvāgindriyaṃ vāk ca satyā jyotistamo'nṛtā // Car_5,1.26
GS40caraka_u:3236: jyotiriva jyotiḥ dharmakartṛtvenobhayalokaprakāśakāritvāt etadviparyayeṇa tamaḥ anṛtā // 5]
GS40caraka_u:3237: mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpaḥ kṣitistathā /
GS40caraka_u:3238: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca tadguṇāḥ // Car_5,1.27
GS40caraka_u:3240: sampratyuddeśakramānurodhādarthe 'bhidhātavye 'rthānāṃ prakṛtigrahaṇagṛhītapañcabhūtaguṇatayā parādhīnatvād aṣṭadhātuprakṛtigṛhītāni bhūtānyeva tāvadāha mahābhūtānītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:3241: śabdādayo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ khādīnāṃ naisargikā guṇā jñeyāḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:3242: yastu guṇotkarṣo 'bhidhātavyaḥ sa hi anupraviṣṭabhūtasambandhād eva // 3
GS40caraka_u:3243: tena pṛthivyāṃ caturbhūtapraveśāt pañcaguṇatvam evaṃ jalādāv api caturguṇatvādi jñeyam // 4]
GS40caraka_u:3245: pūrvaḥ pūrvaguṇaścaiva kramaśo guṇiṣu smṛtaḥ // Car_5,1.28
GS40caraka_u:3247: naisargikaṃ guṇamabhidhāya bhūtāntarapraveśakṛtaṃ guṇam āha teṣām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:3248: ekaguṇaḥ pūrva iti pūrvo dhātuḥ kharūpaḥ śabdaikaguṇaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:3249: puṃliṅgatā ca khādīnāṃ dhāturūpatābuddhisthīkṛtatvāt uktaṃ hi khādayaś cetanāṣaṣṭhā dhātavaḥ iti // 3
GS40caraka_u:3250: yathā yathā ca paratvaṃ tathā tathā ca guṇavṛddhir yathāsaṃkhyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:3251: nanu etāvatā 'py ekaguṇatvadviguṇatvādi na niyamena jñāyate ko guṇaḥ kva bhūte ityāha pūrva ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:3252: guṇiṣu khādiṣu dhātuṣu pūrvo guṇaḥ krameṇa yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vartate na kevalaṃ pūrvaḥ kiṃtu pūrvasyāpi yo guṇaḥ sa ca pūrvaguṇa uttare bhūte vartate
GS40caraka_u:3253: tena khe pūrve pūrvaḥ śabdaguṇo vartate vāyau tu sparśaḥ kramaprāptaḥ pūrvo bhavati pūrvaguṇaśca śabda iti dviguṇatvam evamagnyādau ca jñeyam
GS40caraka_u:3254: gandhas tūttaraguṇāntarābhāvānna pūrvo bhavati tathāpi gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥ iti granthe
GS40caraka_u:3255: tadguṇā itipadāpekṣayā gandhasya pūrvatvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ kiṃvā pūrva iti chattriṇo gacchantīti
GS40caraka_u:3256: nyāyenoktaṃ tenāpūrvo 'pi gandhaḥ kramāgataḥ pṛthivyāṃ jñeyaḥ // 8]
GS40caraka_u:3263: apratīghātaḥ apratihananam asparśatvam iti yāvat sparśavaddhi gativighātakaṃ bhavati nākāśaḥ asparśavattvāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:3268: yad indriyaṃ yadgṛhṇāti tattasyābhāvamapi gṛhṇāti tena ākāśasyāsparśatvam api sparśanendriyagrāhyam iti yuktam // 7
GS40caraka_u:3269: dravatvaṃ calatvaṃ ca sāṃkhyamate sparśanagrāhyatvāt sthūlabhūtavātadharmaḥ sparśa eva yaddhi sparśanena gṛhyate tat sarvaṃ mahābhūtavātapariṇāma eva // 8
GS40caraka_u:3270: etāni ca khādīni sūkṣmāṇi tanmātrarūpāṇi jñeyāni sthūlabhūtāni tu khādīni vikāratayā tatroktāni // 9
GS40caraka_u:3272: vacanaṃ hi tanmātrāṇyaviśeṣās tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ // 11
GS40caraka_u:3273: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca iti tenehāpi khādīni tanmātraśabdoktāni sūkṣmāṇi boddhavyāni // 12] ******************************************************************
GS40caraka_u:3280: pūrvasthānoktalakṣaṇābhāvenāvadhāritāyuṣmadbhāvena cikitsā dharmārthayaśaskarī kartavyetyanantaraṃ cikitsābhidhāyakaṃ sthānam ucyate // 1

GS40caraka_u:3673: atra ca kalkopalepādi nopakṣīṇamapi yadavaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati tadeva grāhyaṃ vacanabalāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:3674: sauvarṇādipātreṣu yathāpūrvaṃ varaguṇatvam anyathā samānaguṇatve sarveṣāṃ mṛtpātrasya sulabhatvenātidurlabhataraṃ sauvarṇapātraṃ nopadeśam arhati
GS40caraka_u:3678: anātapaśuṣkam anasthi cūrṇīkṛtaṃ caturguṇābhyāṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ saṃnīya śarkarācūrṇacaturbhāgasamprayuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3680: tasyottarakālamagnibalasamāṃ mātrāṃ khādet paurvāhṇikaḥ prayogo nāparāhṇikaḥ sātmyāpekṣaścāhāravidhiḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3681: asya prayogād varṣaśatamajaraṃ vayas tiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.7
GS40caraka_u:3684: kṣārodakottaramiti yathā kṣārodakaṃ bhāvyādupari bhavati tathā kartavyamiti darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:3689: prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśau nidadhyāt tadvarṣānte sātmyapathyāśī prayojayet asya prayogād
GS40caraka_u:3690: varṣaśatam ajaram āyus tiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.8
GS40caraka_u:3692: sarpistailamadhvāḍhakaiḥ ṣaḍbhir ekīkṛtaṃ ghṛtabhājanasthaṃ prāvṛṣi bhasmarāśāv iti
GS40caraka_u:3693: sarvaṃ samānaṃ pūrveṇa yāvad āśīḥ // Car_6,2.9
GS40caraka_u:3695: yāvad āśīr iti āśīḥ phalaśrutiḥ tena tadvarṣānte ityādi granthoktavidhividhānaṃ darśayati // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3697: āraṇyagomayāgnibhir upasvedayet tāni susvinnaśītāny uddhṛtakulakāny āpothyāḍhakena
GS40caraka_u:3698: pippalīcūrṇānāmāḍhakena ca viḍaṅgataṇḍulacūrṇānām adhyardhena cāḍhakena śarkarāyā
GS40caraka_u:3699: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyām āḍhakābhyāṃ tailasya madhunaḥ sarpiṣaśca saṃyojya śucau dṛḍhe ghṛtabhāvite
GS40caraka_u:3700: kumbhe sthāpayed ekaviṃśatirātram ata ūrdhvaṃ prayogaḥ asya prayogādvarṣaśatam ajaram
GS40caraka_u:3704: dhanvani kuśāstīrṇe snigdhakṛṣṇamadhuramṛttike suvarṇavarṇamṛttike vā vyapagataviṣaśvāpadapavanasalilāgnidoṣe
GS40caraka_u:3706: jātāny anupahatāny anadhyārūḍhāny abālāny ajīrṇāny adhigatavīryāṇi śīrṇapurāṇaparṇāny
GS40caraka_u:3707: asaṃjātāny aparṇāni tapasi tapasye vā māse śuciḥ prayataḥ kṛtadevārcanaḥ svasti vācayitvā
GS40caraka_u:3708: dvijātīn cale sumuhūrte nāgabalāmūlāny uddharet teṣāṃ suprakṣālitānāṃ tvakpiṇḍam
GS40caraka_u:3709: āmramātram akṣamātraṃ vā ślakṣṇapiṣṭamāloḍya payasā prātaḥ prayojayet cūrṇīkṛtāni
GS40caraka_u:3710: vā pibet payasā madhusarpirbhyāṃ vā saṃyojya bhakṣayet jīrṇe ca kṣīrasarpirbhyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:3712: saṃvatsaraprayogādasya varṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.11
GS40caraka_u:3722: svarasānāmalābhe tv ayaṃ svarasavidhiś cūrṇānām āḍhakam āḍhakam udakasyāhorātrāsthitaṃ mṛditapūtaṃ svarasavat prayojyam // Car_6,2.12
GS40caraka_u:3724: punarnavāntā daśa ṣaḍvirecanaśatāśritīye amṛtābhayā dhātrī yuktā śreyasī śvetātirasā maṇḍūkaparṇī sthirā punarnavā iti sarvā vayaḥsthāpanoktāḥ
GS40caraka_u:3730: śucau śukre vā māse saṃgṛhya yavapalle māṣapalle vā nidhāpayet tāni caturmāsasthitāni
GS40caraka_u:3731: sahasi sahasye vā māse prayoktum ārabheta śītasnigdhamadhuropaskṛtaśarīraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3732: pūrvaṃ daśabhallātakānyāpothyāṣṭaguṇenāmbhasā sādhu sādhayet teṣāṃ rasamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ pūtaṃ sapayaskaṃ pibet sarpiṣāntar mukham abhyajya
GS40caraka_u:3733: tāny ekaikabhallātakotkarṣāpakarṣeṇa daśabhallātakāny ā triṃśataḥ prayojyāni nātaḥ paramutkarṣaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3735: jīrṇe ca sasarpiṣā payasā śāliṣaṣṭikāśanam upacāraḥ prayogānte ca dvis tāvat payasaivopacāraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3736: tatprayogādvarṣaśatamajaraṃ vayas tiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.13
GS40caraka_u:3738: śuciḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ śukrastu āṣāḍhaḥ saha āgrahāyaṇaḥ sahasyaḥ pauṣaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:3739: etacca bhallātakaṃ māsacatuṣṭayasthitaṃ yavapallādau uddhṛtamātraṃ na prayojyaṃ kiṃtu yathokta eva kāle śītaguṇayukte // 2
GS40caraka_u:3741: nātaḥ paramiti triṃśataḥ pareṇa prayogo na bhallātakasya // 4
GS40caraka_u:3742: sahasraparo bhallātakaprayoga iti upayuktabhallātakasaṃpiṇḍanayā yadā sahasraṃ pūryate
GS40caraka_u:3743: tadaivoparamaḥ kartavyaḥ sahasrādarvāgapi ca prayogaparityāgaḥ prakṛtyādyapekṣayā bhavatyeva // 5
GS40caraka_u:3744: sahasrasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ cehaikena vardhanahrāsakrameṇa na bhavati tena punar āvṛttyā
GS40caraka_u:3745: ca triṃśatparyantaṃ prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ yathā hi bhallātakaprayogābhyāsena sahasrasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3747: anye tv atra suśrute arśaścikitsitoktaśataparyantaṃ bhallātakaprayogeṇa samaṃ virodhaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3750: kiṃca sahasradvayasya tatropayogo vihitaḥ atra sahasraparyantaḥ prayogaḥ tena vyādhiviṣayo'nya eva sa prayogaḥ ayaṃ tu rasāyanaviṣayaḥ // 8]
GS40caraka_u:3751: bhallātakānāṃ jarjarīkṛtānāṃ piṣṭasvedanaṃ pūrayitvā bhūmāv ākaṇṭhaṃ nikhātasya snehabhāvitasya
GS40caraka_u:3753: teṣāṃ yaḥ svarasaḥ kumbhaṃ prapadyeta tam aṣṭabhāgamadhusamprayuktaṃ dviguṇaghṛtam
GS40caraka_u:3754: adyāt tatprayogādvarṣaśatamajaraṃ vayastiṣṭhatīti samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.14
GS40caraka_u:3756: piṣṭasvedanaṃ tat yatrasthaṃ piṣṭakam upasvedyate tadupari yat pidhānapātraṃ tacceha sacchidraṃ grāhyam anyathoparisthabhallātakatāpāc cyutaḥ sneho nādho yāti // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3757: bhallātakatailapātraṃ sapayaskaṃ madhukena kalkenākṣamātreṇa śatapākaṃ kuryāditi samānaṃ pūrveṇa // Car_6,2.15
GS40caraka_u:3765: atra ca yathāyogyatayā bhallātakena sarpirādīnāṃ saṃskāraḥ saṃyogaśca jñeyaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:3767: evaṃ ca sarpiḥkṣīrayūṣatailānāṃ saṃskāro yathānyāyaṃ bhallātakena kṣaudrapalalasaktutarpaṇānāṃ bhallātakena yogaḥ guḍalavaṇayostu saṃskāraḥ saṃyogo vā // 4
GS40caraka_u:3768: lavaṇe saṃskārapakṣe hi lavaṇasamaṃ bhallātakam antardhūmadagdhaṃ grāhyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:3769: anye tu sarpirādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva bhallātakena saṃskāraṃ vyākhyānayanti // 6
GS40caraka_u:3775: kaphajo na sa rogo'sti na vibandho'sti kaścana /
GS40caraka_u:3776: yaṃ na bhallātakaṃ hanyācchīghraṃ medhāgnivardhanam // Car_6,2.19
GS40caraka_u:3778: rasāyanaiḥ śivair etair babhūvur amitāyuṣaḥ // Car_6,2.20
GS40caraka_u:3780: dīrghāyuṣo yathākāmaṃ saṃbhṛtya tridivaṃ gatāḥ // Car_6,2.21
GS40caraka_u:3788: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rasāyanādhyāye prāṇakāmīyo nāma rasāyanapādo dvitīyaḥ // Car_6,2.24
GS40caraka_u:3790: pādānusaṃgrahe saptatriṃśatprayogā uktāḥ tatra balādibhiraṣṭābhiḥ punarnavāntaiśca daśabhiraṣṭādaśaprayogāḥ apare tu vyāhṛtā vyaktā eva // 1]
GS40caraka_u:3800: phālgune vā māse triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ svarasaparipītānāṃ punaḥ śuṣkacūrṇīkṛtānām āḍhakam
GS40caraka_u:3801: ekaṃ grāhayet atha jīvanīyānāṃ bṛṃhaṇīyānāṃ stanyajananānāṃ śukrajananānāṃ vayaḥsthāpanānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:3804: daśaguṇenāmbhasā sādhayet tasminnāḍhakāvaśeṣe rase supūte tāny āmalakacūrṇāni dattvā
GS40caraka_u:3805: gomayāgnibhir vaṃśavidalaśaratejanāgnibhir vā sādhayed yāvad apanayādrasasya tam
GS40caraka_u:3806: anupadagdham upahṛtyāyasīṣu pātrīṣvāstīrya śoṣayet suśuṣkaṃ tat kṛṣṇājinasyopari
GS40caraka_u:3807: dṛṣadi ślakṣṇapiṣṭam ayaḥsthālyāṃ nidhāpayet samyak taccūrṇam ayaś cūrṇāṣṭabhāgasamprayuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3817: māghe phālgune vetigrahaṇavacanāt tathaiva gṛhītānāmadhikāra ityāgamādunnīyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:3821: iha gomayāgnyādyupakaraṇaniyamenaiva śaktyutkarṣo bhavatīti ṛṣivacanād unnīyate // 6
GS40caraka_u:3822: yaduktam ṛṣayas tv eva jānanti yogasaṃyogajaṃ phalam iti // 7
GS40caraka_u:3827: sthitā maharṣayaḥ pūrvaṃ nahi kiṃcid rasāyanam /
GS40caraka_u:3830: samprati rasāyanasya tapobrahmacaryadhyānādiyuktasyaiva mahāphalatvaṃ bhavatīti darśayannāha tapasetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:3831: kālayuktena cāyuṣeti aniyatakālayuktena cāyuṣetyarthaḥ niyatakālāyuṣaṃ prati tu na rasāyanaṃ phalavadityuktam eva // 2
GS40caraka_u:3833: viparyayeṇa tapaḥprabhṛtivirahe rasāyanasyāphalatām āha na hītyādi // 4]
GS40caraka_u:3835: sāvitrīṃ manasā dhyāyan brahmacārī yatendriyaḥ // Car_6,1.3.9
GS40caraka_u:3836: saṃvatsarānte pauṣīṃ vā māghīṃ vā phālgunīṃ tithim /

GS40caraka_u:3850: na drumamārohet ityasyeha āruhya drumamiti vacanenāpavādaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:3855: triphalāyā rase mūtre gavāṃ kṣāre ca lāvaṇe /
