GS40caraka_u:3868: sa dhṛṣyaḥ syādgajaprāṇaḥ sadā cātibalendriyaḥ // Car_6,1.3.21
GS40caraka_u:3877: lauhānāmityanenaiva lohāntarniviṣṭayoḥ suvarṇarajatayor grahaṇe siddhe punas tayor vacanaṃ tayor viśeṣeṇādaropadarśanārtham // 4
GS40caraka_u:3880: pippalyo lavaṇaṃ hema śaṅkhapuṣpī viṣaṃ ghṛtam // Car_6,1.3.24
GS40caraka_u:3882: dvau yavau tatra hemnastu tilaṃ dadyādviṣasya ca // Car_6,1.3.25
GS40caraka_u:3884: ghṛtaprabhūtaṃ sakṣaudraṃ jīrṇe cānnaṃ praśasyate // Car_6,1.3.26
GS40caraka_u:3888: nainat prasahate kṛtyā nālakṣmīrna viṣaṃ na ruk // Car_6,1.3.28
GS40caraka_u:3889: śvitraṃ sakuṣṭhaṃ jaṭharāṇi gulmāḥ plīhā purāṇo viṣamajvaraśca /
GS40caraka_u:3892: matsyākhyako macchu iti loke khyātaḥ anye tu aindrībhedaṃ matsyākhyakam āhuḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:3896: maṇḍūkaparṇyāḥ svarasaḥ prayojyaḥ kṣīreṇa yaṣṭīmadhukasya cūrṇam /
GS40caraka_u:3897: raso guḍūcyāstu samūlapuṣpyāḥ kalkaḥ prayojyaḥ khalu śaṅkhapuṣpyāḥ // Car_6,1.3.30
GS40caraka_u:3899: medhyāni caitāni rasāyanāni medhyā viśeṣeṇa ca śaṅkhapuṣpī // Car_6,1.3.31
GS40caraka_u:3907: jetuṃ kāsaṃ kṣayaṃ śoṣaṃ śvāsaṃ hikkāṃ galāmayān // Car_6,1.3.34
GS40caraka_u:3909: vaisvaryaṃ pīnasaṃ śophaṃ gulmaṃ vātabalāsakam // Car_6,1.3.35
GS40caraka_u:3911: pañcetyādau saṃkhyāvyatikrameṇānuktasaṃkhyānām api pippalīnām upayogaṃ sūcayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:3912: yadāpi trīṇi dravyāṇi nātyupayuñjīta pippalīṃ kṣāraṃ lavaṇam ityuktaṃ tathāpīha dravyāntarasaṃyuktānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:3917: vardhayet payasā sārdhaṃ tathaivāpanayet punaḥ // Car_6,1.3.36
GS40caraka_u:3918: jīrṇe jīrṇe ca bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikaṃ kṣīrasarpiṣā /
GS40caraka_u:3920: piṣṭās tā balibhiḥ sevyāḥ śṛtā madhyabalair naraiḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3921: cūrṇīkṛtā hrasvabalair yojyā doṣāmayān prati // Car_6,1.3.38
GS40caraka_u:3923: prayogo yas triparyantaḥ sa kanīyān sa cābalaiḥ // Car_6,1.3.39
GS40caraka_u:3925: vayasaḥ sthāpanaṃ medhyaṃ pippalīnāṃ rasāyanam // Car_6,1.3.40
GS40caraka_u:3927: bhuktvā tu madhusarpirbhyāṃ catvāryāmalakāni ca // Car_6,1.3.41
GS40caraka_u:3929: jīved varṣaśataṃ pūrṇam ajaro 'vyādhireva ca // Car_6,1.3.42
GS40caraka_u:3931: tam ahorātrikaṃ lepaṃ pibet kṣaudrodakāplutam // Car_6,1.3.43
GS40caraka_u:3933: ajaro 'ruk samābhyāsāj jīvec caiva samāḥ śatam // Car_6,1.3.44
GS40caraka_u:3935: triphalā sitayā cāpi yuktā siddhaṃ rasāyanam // Car_6,1.3.45
GS40caraka_u:3937: viḍaṅgapippalībhyāṃ ca triphalā lavaṇena ca // Car_6,1.3.46
GS40caraka_u:3940: anamlaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ ca kaṭu pāke śilājatu /
GS40caraka_u:3943: rasāyanaṃ tadvidhibhistad vṛṣyaṃ tacca roganut // Car_6,1.3.49
GS40caraka_u:3945: vīryotkarṣaṃ paraṃ yāti sarvairekaikaśo 'pi vā // Car_6,1.3.50
GS40caraka_u:3947: śilājaturasāyanaṃ darśayituṃ śilājatuno 'bhyarhitasya guṇāneva tāvadāha anamlam ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:3949: suśrute yadyapi trapusīsambhavaṃ prakṣipya ṣaḍvidhaśilājatu sāmānyena roge rasāyanādhikāre coktaṃ tathāpīha rasāyanādhikāre tadadhikṛtacaturvidham evoktam // 3]
GS40caraka_u:3950: prakṣiptoddhṛtam apy enat punas tat prakṣiped rase /
GS40caraka_u:3951: koṣṇe saptāhametena vidhinā tasya bhāvanā // Car_6,1.3.51
GS40caraka_u:3953: tatpītaṃ payasā dadyād dīrghamāyuḥ sukhānvitam // Car_6,1.3.52
GS40caraka_u:3958: palamardhapalaṃ karṣo mātrā tasya tridhā matā /
GS40caraka_u:3963: prayogaḥ saptasaptāhā iti saptasaptāhavyāpakaprayoga ityarthaḥ evaṃ trayaś caikaśca saptaka ityatrāpi boddhavyam // 4]
GS40caraka_u:3964: jāterviśeṣaṃ savidhiṃ tasya vakṣyāmyataḥ param // Car_6,1.3.55
GS40caraka_u:3966: jatvābhaṃ mṛdu mṛtsnācchaṃ yanmalaṃ tacchilājatu // Car_6,1.3.56
GS40caraka_u:3968: kaṭurvipāke śītaśca sa suvarṇasya nisravaḥ // Car_6,1.3.57
GS40caraka_u:3969: rūpyasya kaṭukaḥ śvetaḥ śītaḥ svādu vipacyate /
GS40caraka_u:3972: kaṭurvipāke śītaśca sarvaśreṣṭhaḥ sa cāyasaḥ // Car_6,1.3.59
GS40caraka_u:3979: śilājatuvidhānaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vātapitte ityādigranthena vaktavyam // 2
GS40caraka_u:3980: hemādiśabdeneha hemādisambhavasthānabhūtaśilocyate yato na sākṣāt suvarṇādibhya eva śilājatu sravati // 3
GS40caraka_u:3982: yastu rūpyabhave kaṭurase viruddhaḥ svāduḥ pāka uktaḥ sa utsargāpavādanyāyena jñeyaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:3983: vīryaṃ tu tāmrabhavasyoṣṇasya tathā trayāṇāṃ ca śītatvayuktānām atyuṣṇaśītavīryatāyā
GS40caraka_u:3984: avakāśo nāsti ataḥ sāmānyaguṇakathane nātyuṣṇaśītam itipadena uṣṇasya śītasya ca
GS40caraka_u:3985: vīryasya prakarṣo niṣidhyate tenānuṣṇāśītatvaṃ vidhīyate tataśca śilājatuni vīryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:3986: śītam uṣṇaṃ vābhihitamapi na balavadbhavatīti labhyate // 6]
GS40caraka_u:3989: te hy atyantaviruddhatvād aśmano bhedanāḥ param /
GS40caraka_u:3991: payāṃsi takrāṇi rasāḥ sayūṣās toyaṃ samūtrā vividhāḥ kaṣāyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:3992: āloḍanārthaṃ girijasya śastās te te prayojyāḥ prasamīkṣya kāryam // Car_6,1.3.64
GS40caraka_u:3993: na so 'sti rogo bhuvi sādhyarūpaḥ śilāhvayaṃ yaṃ na jayet prasahya /
GS40caraka_u:3994: tat kālayogairvidhibhiḥ prayuktaṃ svasthasya corjāṃ vipulāṃ dadāti // Car_6,1.3.65
GS40caraka_u:3995: karapracitike pāde daśa ṣaṭ ca maharṣiṇā /
GS40caraka_u:3997: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rasāyanādhyāye karapracitīyo nāma rasāyanapādastṛtīyaḥ // Car_6,1.3.67
GS40caraka_u:4002: kecit tu yāvajjīvaṃ kulatthavarjanam āhuḥ yaduktaṃ suśrute tadbhāvitaḥ kapotāṃśca kulatthāṃśca vivarjayet iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:4011: āyurvedasamutthānīyo nāma rasāyanapādaḥ pāriśeṣyād ucyate āyurvedasamutthānam asminn astīti matvarthīyacchapratyayeṇāyurvedasamutthānīyaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:4012: ṛṣayaḥ khalu kadācicchālīnā yāyāvarāśca grāmyauṣadhyāhārāḥ santaḥ sāmpannikā mandaceṣṭā nātikalyāśca prāyeṇa babhūvuḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4013: te sarvāsām itikartavyatānām asamarthāḥ santo grāmyavāsakṛtamātmadoṣaṃ matvā pūrvanivāsam
GS40caraka_u:4014: apagatagrāmyadoṣaṃ śivaṃ puṇyam udāraṃ medhyam agamyam asukṛtibhir gaṅgāprabhavam
GS40caraka_u:4024: tān indraḥ sahasradṛg amaragurur abravītsvāgataṃ brahmavidāṃ jñānatapodhanānāṃ brahmarṣīṇām /
GS40caraka_u:4025: asti nanu vo glānir aprabhāvatvaṃ vaisvaryaṃ vaivarṇyaṃ ca grāmyavāsakṛtam asukham
GS40caraka_u:4026: asukhānubandhaṃ ca grāmyo hi vāso mūlam aśastānāṃ tat kṛtaḥ puṇyakṛdbhir anugrahaḥ
GS40caraka_u:4027: prajānāṃ svaśarīramavekṣituṃ kālaḥ kālaścāyamāyurvedopadeśasya brahmarṣīṇām ātmanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:4028: prajānāṃ cānugrahārtham āyurvedamaśvinau mahyaṃ prāyacchatāṃ prajāpatiraśvibhyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:4029: prajāpataye brahmā prajānām alpam āyur jarāvyādhibahulam asukham asukhānubandham
GS40caraka_u:4031: jarāvyādhipraśamanam ūrjaskaram amṛtaṃ śivaṃ śaraṇyamudāraṃ bhavanto mattaḥ śrotumarhatāthopadhārayituṃ
GS40caraka_u:4032: prakāśayituṃ ca prajānugrahārthamārṣaṃ brahma ca prati maitrīṃ kāruṇyam ātmanaś cānuttamaṃ
GS40caraka_u:4034: tacchrutvā vibudhapativacanam ṛṣayaḥ sarva evāmaravaram ṛgbhis tuṣṭuvuḥ prahṛṣṭāśca tadvacanamabhinananduśceti // Car_6,1.4.5
GS40caraka_u:4038: kṛtaḥ prajānāmanugraha iti grāme sthitvā āyurvedoktārogyasādhanadharmādiprakāśanena prajānugrahaḥ kṛta evetyarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:4043: alpastapaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ saṃcayo'smin alpe āyuṣi tat tathā // 8
GS40caraka_u:4046: tena maitrīkāruṇyādīnyadhikṛtya yaṃ brahmā prajāpataye'dāt tamanuśrotum arhateti yojanā // 11
GS40caraka_u:4047: yadyapi ca ṛṣayo bharadvājadvārā indrādadhigatāyurvedāḥ tathāpi grāmyavāsakṛtamanoglānyā na tathā sphuṭārtho vartata iti śaṅkayā punarindras tānupadiśati // 12]
GS40caraka_u:4048: athendras tadāyurvedāmṛtam ṛṣibhyaḥ saṃkramyovāca etatsarvamanuṣṭheyam ayaṃ ca śivaḥ
GS40caraka_u:4049: kālo rasāyanānāṃ divyāścauṣadhayo himavatprabhavāḥ prāptavīryāḥ tadyathā aindrī brāhmī
GS40caraka_u:4050: payasyā kṣīrapuṣpī śrāvaṇī mahāśrāvaṇī śatāvarī vidārī jīvantī punarnavā nāgabalā
GS40caraka_u:4051: sthirā vacā chattrā aticchatrā medā mahāmedā jīvanīyāścānyāḥ payasā prayuktāḥ ṣaṇmāsāt
GS40caraka_u:4052: paramāyurvayaśca taruṇamanāmayatvaṃ svaravarṇasampadam upacayaṃ medhāṃ smṛtimuttamabalam
GS40caraka_u:4057: brahmasuvarcalā nāmauṣadhir yā hiraṇyakṣīrā puṣkarasadṛśapattrā ādityaparṇī nāmauṣadhiryā
GS40caraka_u:4058: sūryakāntā iti vijñāyate suvarṇakṣīrā sūryamaṇḍalākārapuṣpā ca nārīnāmauṣadhiḥ aśvabalā
GS40caraka_u:4059: iti vijñāyate yā bilvajasadṛśapattrā kāṣṭhagodhā nāmauṣadhir godhākārā sarpānāmauṣadhiḥ
GS40caraka_u:4060: sarpākārā somo nāmauṣadhirājaḥ pañcadaśaparvā sa soma iva hīyate vardhate ca padmā
GS40caraka_u:4061: nāmauṣadhiḥ padmākārā padmaraktā padmagandhā ca ajānām auṣadhiḥ ajaśṛṅgī iti vijñāyate
GS40caraka_u:4062: nīlā nāmauṣadhistu nīlakṣīrā nīlapuṣpā latāpratānabahuleti āsāmoṣadhīnāṃ yāṃ yāmevopalabheta
GS40caraka_u:4063: tasyās tasyāḥ svarasasya sauhityaṃ gatvā snehabhāvitāyām ārdrapalāśadroṇyāṃ sapidhānāyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:4064: digvāsāḥ śayīta tatra pralīyate ṣaṇmāsena punaḥ sambhavati tasyājaṃ payaḥ pratyavasthāpanaṃ
GS40caraka_u:4065: ṣaṇmāsena devatānukārī bhavati vayovarṇasvarākṛtibalaprabhābhiḥ svayaṃ cāsya sarvavācogatāni
GS40caraka_u:4066: prādurbhavanti divyaṃ cāsya cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca bhavati gatir yojanasahasraṃ daśavarṣasahasrāṇy
GS40caraka_u:4071: aśvabaleti jñāyata iti ṛṣibhirevānena nāmnā jñāyate nalaukikaiḥ lokāprasiddhatvāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:4072: soma iva vardhate hīyata iti yathāsomavṛddhikṣayau tathā tatkālameva tasya vṛddhikṣayau bhavataḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:4073: pralīyata iti druto bhavati anye tu mūrchatīti varṇayanti // 5
GS40caraka_u:4078: oṣadhīnāṃ prabhāveṇa tiṣṭhatāṃ sve ca karmaṇi /
GS40caraka_u:4081: śakyā oṣadhayo hy etāḥ sevituṃ viṣayābhijāḥ // Car_6,1.4.10
GS40caraka_u:4083: etaddivyaṃ rasāyanamṛṣibhistadvidhair vā sevyam iti darśayann āha divyānām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4084: viṣayābhijā iti svocitapuṇyadeśe jātā ityarthaḥ apuṇye tu deśe divyauṣadhijanmaiva na bhavati bhavantyo 'pi nirvāryā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:4086: mṛduvīryatarās tāsāṃ vidhirjñeyaḥ sa eva tu // Car_6,1.4.11
GS40caraka_u:4087: paryeṣṭuṃ tāḥ prayoktuṃ vā ye 'samarthāḥ sukhārthinaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4090: samprati brahmasuvarcalādīnāṃ yathā mṛduvīryatvaṃ bhavati tadāha yās tv ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4093: madhyamena ca karmaṇeti asamyakprayogeṇa kiṃvā anatimahatādṛṣṭena // 4]
GS40caraka_u:4094: balyānāṃ jīvanīyānāṃ bṛṃhaṇīyāś ca yā daśa /
GS40caraka_u:4095: vayasaḥ sthāpanānāṃ ca khadirasyāsanasya ca // Car_6,1.4.13
GS40caraka_u:4099: ṛddhyā nāgabalāyāśca dvāradāyā dhavasya ca // Car_6,1.4.15
GS40caraka_u:4102: rasāḥ pṛthak pṛthag grāhyāḥ palāśakṣāra eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:4103: eṣāṃ palonmitān bhāgān payo gavyaṃ caturguṇam // Car_6,1.4.17
GS40caraka_u:4104: dve pātre tilatailasya dve ca gavyasya sarpiṣaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4105: tat sādhyaṃ sarvam ekatra susiddhaṃ snehamuddharet // Car_6,1.4.18
GS40caraka_u:4109: tugākṣīryāḥ sapippalyāḥ sthāpyaṃ saṃmūrchitaṃ ca tat // Car_6,1.4.20
GS40caraka_u:4111: mātrāmagnisamāṃ tasya tata ūrdhvaṃ prayojayet // Car_6,1.4.21
GS40caraka_u:4115: jīrṇe jīrṇe ca bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikaṃ kṣīrasarpiṣā // Car_6,1.4.23
GS40caraka_u:4120: siddhārthatāṃ cābhinavaṃ vayaśca prajāpriyatvaṃ ca yaśaśca loke /
GS40caraka_u:4121: prayojyam icchadbhiridaṃ yathāvad rasāyanaṃ brāhmamudāravīryam // Car_6,1.4.26
GS40caraka_u:4129: ṣoḍaśīṃ mātrāmiti āmalakādicūrṇayuktaghṛtāpekṣayā ṣoḍaśabhāgo hemādicūrṇād grāhyaḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:4132: ato'nyathā tu ye teṣāṃ sauryamārutiko vidhiḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4133: tayoḥ śreṣṭhataraḥ pūrvo vidhiḥ sa tu suduṣkaraḥ // Car_6,1.4.28
GS40caraka_u:4135: yathāsvamauṣadhaṃ teṣāṃ kāryaṃ muktvā rasāyanam // Car_6,1.4.29
GS40caraka_u:4137: kuṭīprāveśikarasāyanaviṣayān vātātapikarasāyanaviṣayāṃśca puruṣān āha samarthānām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4150: guṇair etaiḥ samuditaiḥ prayuṅkte yo rasāyanam /
GS40caraka_u:4151: rasāyanaguṇān sarvān yathoktān sa samaśnute // Car_6,1.4.35
GS40caraka_u:4158: rasāyanaguṇair jantur yujyate na kadācana // Car_6,1.4.36
GS40caraka_u:4162: arujebhyo 'dvijātibhyaḥ śuśrūṣā yeṣu nāsti ca // Car_6,1.4.38
GS40caraka_u:4164: manaḥśuddhyaiva prayatātmatāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ punas tadabhidhānam itaramānasaguṇeṣu prayatātmatāyā abhyarhitatopadarśanārtham // 1
GS40caraka_u:4165: arujebhyo 'dvijātibhyo yeṣu ca puruṣeṣu śuśrūṣā nāsti teṣu caitan na vācyamiti yojanā // 2]
GS40caraka_u:4169: aśvināv iva devendraḥ pūjayed atiśaktitaḥ // Car_6,1.4.40
GS40caraka_u:4171: yajñasya hi śiraśchinnaṃ punastābhyāṃ samāhitam // Car_6,1.4.41
GS40caraka_u:4172: praśīrṇā daśanāḥ pūṣṇo netre naṣṭe bhagasya ca /
GS40caraka_u:4176: bhārgavaścyavanaḥ kāmī vṛddhaḥ san vikṛtiṃ gataḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4180: grahāḥ stotrāṇi mantrāṇi tathā nānāhavīṃṣi ca /
GS40caraka_u:4183: sautrāmaṇyāṃ ca bhagavānaśvibhyāṃ saha modate // Car_6,1.4.47
GS40caraka_u:4184: indrāgnī cāśvinau caiva stūyante prāyaśo dvijaiḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4185: stūyante vedavākyeṣu na tathānyā hi devatāḥ // Car_6,1.4.48
GS40caraka_u:4189: kiṃ punarbhiṣajo martyaiḥ pūjyāḥ syur nātiśaktitaḥ // Car_6,1.4.50
GS40caraka_u:4191: prāṇibhirguruvatpūjyaḥ prāṇācāryaḥ sa hi smṛtaḥ // Car_6,1.4.51
GS40caraka_u:4193: samprati rasāyanādisiddhir vaidyādhīnā tena vaidyastutim ārabhate ya ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4194: prāṇācāryamityatra prāṇivaryam iti vā pāṭhaḥ tatra prāṇināṃ varyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prāṇivaryaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:4198: somābhipatita iti somābhipatanayogena pīḍita ityarthaḥ somātipacita iti vā pāṭhaḥ tatrāpyatipacanena somapānātiyogaṃ darśayati // 6
GS40caraka_u:4200: stotrāṇi stavāḥ stāvakavācaḥ śastrāṇīti kecit saṃśasyate 'neneti kṛtvā sāmaṛgvyatiriktaṃ stotramāhuḥ śastrāṇi astrāṇyeva vaṣaḍyuktāni śastrāṇi ca yajñe kalpyanta eva // 8
GS40caraka_u:4201: dhūmrāś ca paśava iti dhūmravarṇapaśavaḥ evaṃvarṇāś ca paśavaḥ śreṣṭhā bhavanti // 9
GS40caraka_u:4206: aśnute vaidyaśabdaṃ hi na vaidyaḥ pūrvajanmanā // Car_6,1.4.52
GS40caraka_u:4208: dhruvam āviśati jñānāttasmād vaidyo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ // Car_6,1.4.53
GS40caraka_u:4210: prāṇācāryaṃ budhaḥ kaścid icchann āyur anitvaram // Car_6,1.4.54
GS40caraka_u:4213: tena vidyāyogād vaidyatvaṃ tathā vidyāsamāptilakṣaṇajanmanā dvijatvaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati // 2
GS40caraka_u:4214: brāhmaṃ vā ārṣaṃ vā iti vikalpo vaidyaviśeṣābhiprāyād bhavati tayor yo naiṣṭhikacikitsārthastasya brāhmam itarasya tu lokānugrāhiṇa ārṣamiti vyavasthā // 3]
GS40caraka_u:4216: nopākaroti vaidyāya nāsti tasyeha niṣkṛtiḥ // Car_6,1.4.55
GS40caraka_u:4218: ābādhebhyo hi saṃrakṣed icchan dharmam anuttamam // Car_6,1.4.56
GS40caraka_u:4222: vartate yaścikitsāyāṃ sa sarvam ativartate // Car_6,1.4.58
GS40caraka_u:4224: te hitvā kāñcanaṃ rāśiṃ pāṃśurāśimupāsate // Car_6,1.4.59
GS40caraka_u:4226: chittvā vaivasvatān pāśān jīvitaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // Car_6,1.4.60
GS40caraka_u:4228: na hi jīvitadānāddhi dānam anyad viśiṣyate // Car_6,1.4.61
GS40caraka_u:4229: paro bhūtadayā dharma iti matvā cikitsayā /
GS40caraka_u:4230: vartate yaḥ sa siddhārthaḥ sukham atyantam aśnute // Car_6,1.4.62
GS40caraka_u:4234: te hitvetyādau dharmārthaṃ kriyamāṇacikitsā mahāphalatvena kāñcanarāśitulyā itarā tv asārakalpā pāṃśurāśitulyā // 3
GS40caraka_u:4240: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne rasāyanādhyāye āyurvedasamutthānīyo nāma rasāyanapādaścaturthaḥ // Car_6,1.4.65
GS40caraka_u:4243: āyurvedasamutthāne prakāśitatayā divyauṣadhividhyādi yaduvāca brahmacāribhyo'mareśvaraḥ tat saṃprakāśitam iti yojanā // 2] ***********************************************************************
GS40caraka_u:4251: svasthorjaskaratvasāmānyāt rasāyanamanu vājīkaraṇaṃ vācyaṃ tatrāpi vājīkaraṇe pravṛttyupadarśakaprakaraṇayuktatvād ādau saṃyogaśaramūlīya ucyate
GS40caraka_u:4254: tadāyattau hi dharmārthau prītiśca yaśa eva ca // Car_6,2.1.3
GS40caraka_u:4257: avājī vājīvātyarthaṃ maithune śaktaḥ kriyate yena tad vājīkaraṇam // 1
GS40caraka_u:4258: uktaṃ hi vājīvātibalo yena yātyapratihataḥ striyam ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:4259: anvicchediti rasāyanānmahāphalāt tadapekṣayālpaphalaṃ vājīkaraṇaṃ paścād icchet // 3
GS40caraka_u:4260: puruṣa iti padena taruṇapuruṣagrāhiṇā bālavṛddhau niṣiddhavyavāyau nirākaroti // 4
GS40caraka_u:4264: śuṣkaṃ rūkṣaṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jantujagdhaṃ vijarjaram /
GS40caraka_u:4265: spṛṣṭamāśu viśīryeta tathā vṛddhaḥ striyo vrajan iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:4266: nityamityanena na rasāyanavat saṃprayogo vṛṣyasya kiṃtv āhāravat sarvadoṣayoga iti darśayati // 7
GS40caraka_u:4267: ātmavānityanena durātmano vṛṣyakaraṇaṃ niṣedhati sa hi vṛṣyopayogādupacitadhātuḥ sann agamyāgamanamapi kuryāt // 8
GS40caraka_u:4268: dharmādayo vṛṣyāyattā eva yathā bhavanti tadāha putrasyetyādi // 9
GS40caraka_u:4270: ete guṇā iti dharmādayaḥ vṛṣyaprayogajanitaḥ putro dharmādīn pituḥ sampādayatītyarthaḥ // 11
GS40caraka_u:4271: vājīkaraṇasevayā ceha yuktayaiva ṛtukāle ca maithunaṃ prādhānyenābhipretaṃ tena tisraiṣaṇīye
GS40caraka_u:4272: traya upastambhāḥ ityādigranthena brahmacaryaṃ yaduktaṃ tad ṛtukāle yathāvidhikṛtamaithunāpratiṣedhakam
GS40caraka_u:4274: vājīkaraṇam agryaṃ ca kṣetraṃ strī yā praharṣiṇī // Car_6,2.1.4
GS40caraka_u:4275: iṣṭā hy ekaikaśo 'py arthāḥ paraṃ prītikarāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4276: kiṃ punaḥ strīśarīre ye saṃghātena pratiṣṭhitāḥ // Car_6,2.1.5
GS40caraka_u:4279: strīṣu prītirviśeṣeṇa strīṣv apatyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // Car_6,2.1.6
GS40caraka_u:4280: dharmārthau strīṣu lakṣmīśca strīṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4281: surūpā yauvanasthā yā lakṣaṇairyā vibhūṣitā // Car_6,2.1.7
GS40caraka_u:4282: yā vaśyā śikṣitā yā ca sā strī vṛṣyatamā matā /
GS40caraka_u:4286: arthā iti śabdādayaḥ te ca strīgatādhararasakalaviṅkarutarūpādayaḥ prasiddhā eva // 3
GS40caraka_u:4287: dharmārthau strīṣviti sahaiva patnyā dharmaścarya ityādyupadeśād dharmaḥ tathānuraktā gṛhiṇī artharakṣaṇādi karotītyartha ityarthaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:4288: striyā lakṣmyāḥ saṃyoge dhanasampad bhavatīti strīṣu lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitetyarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:4291: nānābhaktyā tu lokasya daivayogācca yoṣitām // Car_6,2.1.8
GS40caraka_u:4292: taṃ taṃ prāpya vivardhante naraṃ rūpādayo guṇāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4294: praviśatyāśu hṛdayaṃ daivād vā karmaṇo 'pi vā /
GS40caraka_u:4296: samānasattvā yā vaśyā yā yasya prīyate priyaiḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4297: yā pāśabhūtā sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ parairguṇaiḥ // Car_6,2.1.11
GS40caraka_u:4298: yayā viyukto nistrīkam aratir manyate jagat /
GS40caraka_u:4299: yasyā ṛte śarīraṃ nā dhatte śūnyam ivendriyaiḥ // Car_6,2.1.12
GS40caraka_u:4301: yāti yāṃ prāpya visrambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyatyatīva yām // Car_6,2.1.13
GS40caraka_u:4303: gatvā gatvāpi bahuśo yāṃ tṛptiṃ naiva gacchati // Car_6,2.1.14
GS40caraka_u:4304: sā strī vṛṣyatamā tasya nānābhāvā hi mānavāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4305: atulyagotrāṃ vṛṣyāṃ ca prahṛṣṭāṃ nirupadravām // Car_6,2.1.15
GS40caraka_u:4308: rūpādivyatirekeṇāpi kācit kasyacit karmavaśādvṛṣyā strī bhavatīti darśayannāha nānetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4312: uktaṃ ca bharatena prakāśarūpakaṃ sattvaṃ sattvotplavāḥ samudgatāḥ // 5

GS40caraka_u:4765: tathāsyāpyāyate bhūyaḥ śukraṃ ca balameva ca // Car_6,2.4.38
GS40caraka_u:4767: labhyate tadvikāśāttu tathā śukraṃ hi dehinām // Car_6,2.4.39
GS40caraka_u:4768: narte vai ṣoḍaśād varṣāt saptatyāḥ parato na ca /
GS40caraka_u:4769: āyuṣkāmo naraḥ strībhiḥ saṃyogaṃ kartumarhati // Car_6,2.4.40
GS40caraka_u:4772: śuṣkaṃ rūkṣaṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jantudagdhaṃ vijarjaram /
GS40caraka_u:4773: spṛṣṭamāśu viśīryeta tathā vṛddhaḥ striyo vrajan // Car_6,2.4.42
GS40caraka_u:4782: bhāvita iti vacanāt prayogeṇa śarīrabhāvanāyāṃ satyāṃ strīsevā sambhavatīti darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:4784: bālasya taḍāgadṛṣṭāntena punarapi śukrasadbhāvaṃ kaphaprādhānyaṃ ca darśayati vṛddhasya
GS40caraka_u:4785: tu jantujagdhatvādidṛṣṭāntena vinaṣṭasyāpunarbhāvaṃ śukrasya tathābhūyiṣṭhatāṃ ca darśayati // 4
GS40caraka_u:4786: nanu tṛptasya śarīrabalaṃ bhavatyeva tat kiṃ tṛptasya striyo gantumasāmarthyam ityāha dehetyādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:4787: etena satyapi tṛptijanite bale kṣayādinā dehamanasor upahatatvāddharṣo na bhavati harṣābhāvād vyavāyaśaktir na bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati // 6]
GS40caraka_u:4788: rasa ikṣau yathā dadhni sarpistailaṃ tile yathā /
GS40caraka_u:4789: sarvatrānugataṃ dehe śukraṃ saṃsparśane tathā // Car_6,2.4.46
GS40caraka_u:4794: aṣṭābhya ebhyo hetubhyaḥ śukraṃ dehāt prasicyate /
GS40caraka_u:4797: samprati sambhavati śukraṃ yathā dehe sthitaṃ yathā ca pravartate tadāha rasa ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4799: saṃsparśana iti saṃsparśanavati tena keśādau saṃsparśanāvyāpteḥ śukramapi nāstīti darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:4801: ceṣṭā vyavāyaceṣṭā saṃkalpo yoṣidanurāgaḥ pīḍanaṃ nārīpuruṣayoḥ parasparasammūrchanam atra ca nārīpuruṣasaṃyogaḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatsahakārīṇi ceṣṭādīni // 5
GS40caraka_u:4808: drutatvān mārutasya ceti śukraprerakasya vāyor abhidravaṇaśīlatvād ityarthaḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:4809: ete ca yadyapi hetavastathāpi prādhānyāt prathamapratipāditastrīpuruṣasaṃyogādirūpahetūnāṃ samaṣṭau naivāmī gaṇitāḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:4812: tathā hy ātmaparyāyeṣūktaṃ viśvakarmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ iti // 16
GS40caraka_u:4814: etena avyaktasyātmano vyaktaśarīranirvṛttau śukraṃ hetur ityuktaṃ bhavati // 18
GS40caraka_u:4815: śukraṃ ceha prakaraṇāgatatvenoktaṃ tena ārtavamapyātmano rūpadravyaṃ jñeyam // 19]
GS40caraka_u:4816: bahalaṃ madhuraṃ snigdham avisraṃ guru picchilam /
GS40caraka_u:4824: vrajeccābhyadhikam iti punaḥ punargacchet vyajyate iti vā pāṭhaḥ tatrāpi bhūyo gamanena nārīṣu puṃstvena vyajyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:4825: vyajyāt iti pāṭhe'pi sa evārtho vidvadbhiḥ sucintanīyaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:4826: anena niruktena trividhamapi vṛṣyamavarudhyate yathā śukravṛddhikaraṃ ca māṣādi tathā srutikaraṃ saṃkalpādi śukrasrutivṛddhikaraṃ kṣīrādi //
GS40caraka_u:4829: trividhamapi hīdaṃ vyavāye balavattvaṃ punaḥ punarvyavāyaśaktiṃ ca karoti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:4831: yat pūrvaṃ maithunāt sevyaṃ sevyaṃ yanmaithunād anu // Car_6,2.4.52
GS40caraka_u:4832: yadā na sevyāḥ pramadāḥ kṛtsnaḥ śukraviniścayaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:4834: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne vājīkaraṇādhyāye pumāñjātabalādiko nāma vājīkaraṇapādaścaturthaḥ // Car_6,2.4.54
GS40caraka_u:4845: visarpe prāyeṇa tṛṣṇā upadravarūpā bhavatīti visarpānantaraṃ tṛṣṇācikitsitam ucyate // 1]
GS40caraka_u:4847: tṛṣṇānāṃ praśamārthaṃ cikitsitaṃ prāha pañcānām // Car_6,22.3
GS40caraka_u:4849: jñānetyādau jñānaṃ tattvajñānaṃ praśamaḥ śāntiḥ tapaḥ cāndrāyaṇādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:4850: cikitsitaṃ cikitsāvidhāyako granthaḥ nidānādyabhidhānaṃ ca cikitsārthameva nidānādijñānapūrvakatvāc cikitsāyāḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:4851: pañcānāmiti vacanena pañcānāmapi cikitsāviṣayatvaṃ darśayati nahi kāsaśvāsavadasyāsādhyatvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:4852: kasyāścid atretyarthaḥ tathā suśrutoktātiriktatṛṣṇādvayāntarbhāvaṃ pañcasveva sūcayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:4853: uktaṃ hi suśrute tisraḥ smṛtāstāḥ kṣatajā caturthī kṣayāttathā hy āmasamudbhavā ca // 4
GS40caraka_u:4858: pittānilau pravṛddhau saumyān dhātūṃś ca śoṣayataḥ // Car_6,22.5
GS40caraka_u:4860: saṃśoṣya nṛṇāṃ dehe kurutastṛṣṇāṃ mahābalāvetau // Car_6,22.6
GS40caraka_u:4861: pītaṃ pītaṃ hi jalaṃ śoṣayatastāvato na yāti śamam /
GS40caraka_u:4864: kṣobhād ityādyuktanidānasya yathāyogyatayā vātakartṛtvaṃ vātapittakartṛtvaṃ conneyam // 1
GS40caraka_u:4869: dehe ityanena etāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ śarīratvaṃ darśayati // 6
GS40caraka_u:4870: yā hi mānasī tṛṣṇā sā śarīre icchādveṣātmikā tṛṣṇā sukhaduḥkhāt pravartate ityādāv uktā iyaṃ tu dehāśrayadoṣakāraṇā satī dehajaiveti bhāvaḥ
GS40caraka_u:4871: svābhāvikatṛṣṇāyām api vātapitte ārambhake eva tat kiṃ sāpyatra na gṛhyate // 8
GS40caraka_u:4872: maivaṃ tasyā ucitadravapānenaivābhipretena praśamād iha asvābhāvikavyādhiprakaraṇe nādhikāra iti hṛdi kṛtvā // 9
GS40caraka_u:4873: svābhāvikatṛṣṇākaravātapittābhyāṃ vakṣyamāṇatṛṣṇārambhakavātapittayor viśeṣamāha pītaṃ pītam ityādi // 10
GS40caraka_u:4874: prakṛtatṛṣṇārambhakau pittavātau pītaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ śoṣayataḥ ato jalaśoṣaṇatvāddhetor na śamaṃ yāti puruṣaḥ svābhāvikyāṃ jalaṃ pītvā śāntimadhigacchatīti bhāvaḥ // 11
GS40caraka_u:4881: prāgrūpakathane eva madhye tṛṣṇānāmavyabhicārilakṣaṇam āha svalakṣaṇam ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:4882: svalakṣaṇam iti avyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ yathā jvarasya saṃtāpaḥ śvayathor utsedhaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:4883: punaḥ prakṛtaṃ prāgrūpam āha liṅgānāṃ lāghavamapāya iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:4884: liṅgānāṃ vakṣyamāṇavātādijatṛṣṇāliṅgānāṃ lāghavam alpatvaṃ keṣāṃcic cābhāvaḥ pūrvarūpaṃ tṛṣṇānām ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:4885: tena pūrvarūpāvasthāyāṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni kānicin na bhavantyeva yāni ca bhavanti tānyalpatayāsphuṭāni bhavanti // 6
GS40caraka_u:4886: uktaṃ ca avyaktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya pūrvarūpam iti smṛtam iti // 7
GS40caraka_u:4887: kiṃvā yadetat prāgrūpaṃ mukhaśoṣaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadāmbukāmitvam etat prāgrūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:4888: svalakṣaṇaṃ ca tṛṣṇānāṃ tena mukhaśoṣāmbukāmitve svalakṣaṇe tathā pūrvarūpe ca bhavataḥ
GS40caraka_u:4890: ye tu prāgrūpaṃ mukhaśoṣaḥ svarakṣayaḥ sarvadāmbukāmitvam iti paṭhanti teṣāṃ mate tṛṣṇāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ noktaṃ syāt // 9
GS40caraka_u:4891: uktaṃ ca hārīte'pi tṛṣṇāsvalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tu tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvadāmbupipāsitā iti // 10
GS40caraka_u:4892: kiṃvā mukhaśoṣasvarakṣaye eva pūrvarūpaṃ sarvadāmbukāmitvaṃ ca svalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:4893: ca lāghavaṃ rogarūpāyās tṛṣṇāyā apāyo gamanamityarthaḥ ayameva tṛṣṇāvyuparamo yad
GS40caraka_u:4894: vakṣyamāṇaliṅgānām alpatvaṃ sarvathocchedo hi tṛṣṇālakṣaṇānāṃ na bhavatyeva sahajatṛṣṇāgrastatvenaitallakṣaṇānām
GS40caraka_u:4896: kaiścit tu liṅgānāṃ lāghavam āśūtpādaḥ sa ca apāyo maraṇam iti kṛtvā tṛṣṇānāmasādhyatālakṣaṇamidamucyate tannātimanoharam // 12]
GS40caraka_u:4900: tṛṣṇodbhūtā kurute pañcavidhāṃ liṅgataḥ śṛṇu tām // Car_6,22.10
GS40caraka_u:4904: ye tu mukhaśoṣādīni lakṣaṇānyāhustanmate tṛṣṇopadravānām abhidhānaṃ na syāt upadravāścādhyāyasaṃgrahe
GS40caraka_u:4905: saṃgṛhītāḥ tenātiśayavṛddhā mukhaśoṣādaya upadravāḥ vṛddhāstu liṅgam iti vyavasthā // 3]
GS40caraka_u:4906: abdhātuṃ dehasthaṃ kupitaḥ pavano yadā viśoṣayati /
GS40caraka_u:4912: nidrānāśaḥ śiraso bhramastathā śuṣkavirasamukhatā ca sroto'varodha iti ca syālliṅgaṃ vātatṛṣṇāyāḥ // Car_6,22.12
GS40caraka_u:4915: pittaṃ matamāgneyaṃ kupitaṃ cet tāpayaty apāṃ dhātum /
GS40caraka_u:4916: saṃtaptaḥ sa hi janayettṛṣṇāṃ dāholbaṇāṃ nṛṇām // Car_6,22.13
GS40caraka_u:4921: śarīrasaṃkhyāśarīre pittamāpyam uktaṃ yad dravasarasnigdhamandamṛdupicchilaṃ rasarudhiravasākaphapittasvedādi
GS40caraka_u:4922: tad āpyaṃ raso rasanaṃ ca ityanena tathā tatraiva yat pittasya yo yā ca śarīre bhāḥ
GS40caraka_u:4923: tat sarvam āgneyam ityanena dvayātmakatvaṃ pittasya yadyapyuktaṃ tathāpyāgneyākāratvād
GS40caraka_u:4924: bāhulyāt pittam āgneyam eveti darśayannāha pittaṃ matam āgneyam iti dvayātmakatve
GS40caraka_u:4928: saṃtaptaṃ hi iti pāṭhapakṣe pittameva janayediti yojyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:4929: yadābdhātur janayati tadā pittasaṃtapta eva janayatīti pittasyaiva kartṛtvam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:4931: liṅgaṃ tasyāś cārucir ādhmānakaphaprasekau ca // Car_6,22.15
GS40caraka_u:4934: āmaśabdena ceha lakṣaṇayā āmasamānacikitsita āmasamānalakṣaṇaś ca kapho 'pi gṛhyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:4935: tenāmaprabhavāyā vyutpādanena kaphajāpi suśrutoktā gṛhītaiveha sāpyāgneyetyanena pūrvaparijñātaṃ sarvāsāṃ vātapittajanyatvaṃ samunnayati //
GS40caraka_u:4936: vātaśca tṛṣṇākāraṇatvenokto'pyatrāpradhānaṃ pittameva ye pradhānam itīha vātākathanād unnīyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:4940: deho rasajo'mbubhavo rasaśca tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi /
GS40caraka_u:4944: āhārarasāt sarvadhātupoṣako dhāturasa utpadyate sa ca raso dehapoṣako 'mbubhava iti āpya ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:4945: tasya kṣayāditi rasakṣayāt tṛṣyate rasakṣayād ambukṣayo bhavati tena cāmbukṣayeṇa puruṣaḥ pānīyaprārthanārūpatṛṣṇayā yukto bhavatīti yuktam iti darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:4946: uktaṃ hi suśrute doṣadhātumalakṣīṇo balakṣīṇo'pi mānavaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:4947: svayonivardhanaṃ yat tad annapānaṃ prakāṅkṣati iti ihāpi coktaṃ tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi iti // 5]
GS40caraka_u:4948: bhavati khalu yopasargāttṛṣṇā sā śoṣiṇī kaṣṭā /
GS40caraka_u:4954: evaṃ prāksūtritavātapittāmāmbukṣayopasargātmikāḥ pañca tṛṣṇā vyāhṛtāḥ atraiva suśrutoktā
GS40caraka_u:4955: kaphajā āmajāyām avaruddhā kṣatajā upasargātmikāyām avaruddhā annajā cāmajāyām evāntarbhāvanīyā // 4]
